title: Airbnb
description:
AIRBNB MORE THAN AN AIRBNB
The world is endlessly interesting and with Airbnb, you can explore it in more ways than ever. Find remarkable homes, unforgettable experiences, and incredible services all in one app. Get inspired, book, and go.

BOOK A HOME AND GO WHERE HOTELS CAN‚ÄôT
Explore 8+ million vacation rentals in 240+ countries and regions to find the perfect stay for every kind of trip, whether you‚Äôre traveling alone or with a group. Use over 80 filtering options to find the amenities you want, like a pool, a kitchen, or accessibility features like step-free entry. View all the details of a place at a glance on the listing page and check out the ratings and reviews to see what other guests who‚Äôve stayed there think about it, too.

DON‚ÄôT JUST SEE A PLACE, EXPERIENCE IT
Find thousands of experiences around the world, hosted by locals who know their city best‚Äîall vetted for quality based on a host‚Äôs expertise, reputation, and authenticity. Uncover unique perspectives on landmarks and museums. Get a taste of local cuisine through cooking classes and food tours. Enjoy the great outdoors, an art workshop, a live performance, and much more. Plus, check out Airbnb Originals‚Äîextraordinary experiences hosted by the world‚Äôs most interesting people, designed exclusively for Airbnb.

MAKE YOUR STAY EVEN MORE SPECIAL WITH INCREDIBLE SERVICES
Make the most of your stay by booking incredible services right at your Airbnb, like private chefs, photography, catering, prepared meals, hair styling, nail treatments, makeup, massages, personal training, and spa treatments‚Äîeach offered by experienced service hosts who have been vetted for quality. You can book thousands of professional services at nearly every price, all in one app, all over the world. Best of all, you don‚Äôt need to stay at an Airbnb or even be on a trip to get these services. Schedule a blowout, training session, and more right at home.

GET A TRAVEL APP THAT TRAVELS WITH YOU
After you book a home, you‚Äôll get personalized recommendations on the homepage suggesting services and experiences for your trip, tailored to where you‚Äôre staying and who you‚Äôre traveling with. And the redesigned Profile gives you a snapshot of all the places you‚Äôve been to on Airbnb, and the people you‚Äôve met along the way.

FIND ALL YOUR TRIP INFO IN ONE PLACE
Quickly find or share the details of your reservation‚Äîmaking it easier for everyone to get there, get inside, and get connected to wifi with just a tap. Our in-app messaging means every guest on the trip can easily communicate with hosts to say hi, ask questions, and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates. You can also share photos, videos, and even customize an Airbnb Service, all in the same chat. And with a day-by-day view of everything you booked in the updated Trips tab, it‚Äôs simple to keep track of your plans and get key details like check-in times, special instructions, and entry codes all in one place, even when you‚Äôre offline.

WANT TO HOST? AIRBNB MAKES IT EASY.
Whether you want to host a home, experience, or service, you can reach millions of people traveling and grow your business on Airbnb. List your home in a few simple steps. Or, you can apply to host an experience or service and once approved, you‚Äôre ready to welcome the world.

YOU‚ÄôVE COME THIS FAR‚ÄîNOW GO FARTHER
Stop reading and fire up the app to book yourself a one-of-a-kind trip on Airbnb.

The world is endlessly interesting and with Airbnb, you can explore it in more ways than ever. Find remarkable homes, unforgettable experiences, and incredible services all in one app. Get inspired, book, and go.

summary: Now you can book homes, experiences, and services‚Äîall in our redesigned app.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is great for finding unique affordable places to stay. So far I haven't had a bad stay experience. My only grip is that, sometimes the stay suggests can be quite a distant away from the target area you are looking for. I wish the filter options had a spot where you can put in the distant you are willing go from target area to the stay (ex: 5 miles, 10 miles, 20 miles ect). Because sometimes I don't want to drive 30-40 minutes to explore the town I want see.

App hides total price in fineprint "details" section -- which could be 50% higher than "shown" price on map. (What's the point of showing a fake cost that means nothing anyway??) Also, it cuts shown price (not total) into "due now" and another sum due "later"! JUST. SHOW. TOTAL. PRICE. ON. MAP! The hiding of total payment -- between due now, due later, taxes, fees, cleaning, etc, etc, all hidden deep in details -- almost makes this app a scam. Just go to a hotel. It's usually cheaper.

The app has got frustrating. I use Airbnb a great deal for my travels. But they've changed the default. The last few times I've entered my dates and searched it brings up results for Experiences! I've no interest in that. I know I can click on a different tab and search for homes, but I have to input the location and dates again. it's so annoying.

The app is fairly easy to navigate, except when trying to get in contact with support. In order to get in contact with support, there are so many steps and it's never useful. They request every time that a new ticket be opened and they give you the run around. By the time I was able to get in contact with someone, my issue was closed and given an automated response. Extremely horrible user experience. I would stay away in case your stay doesn't go as planned, you'll never be given help.

I used to love the app, but now it doesn't work right. Won't show my trips. I travel for work andnuse Airbnb for all of it. Now that they have combined all the taxes and fees it has limited my options since I can not exceed a certain amount per night, taxes and fees not included so I used to be able to find more homes with all the costs separated, now Im limited. If it aint broke, dont fix it

At first, I was really excited to book a place and go through the listing, but then airbnb changed their layout on the options like luxe, mansions, cabins, etc... and had replaced it with just homes, services, and experiences, I'm now very limited to where or what I want to book as my listing does not come up anymore. If this was an update, it is a horrible update. What a way to restrict places. such a disappointment... truly.

AirBNB's programming gremlins strike again. Every time there's an app update, features disappear and everything gets glitchier. This time they've made the app totally unusable as a guest and a host. As a host, we've lost the price calculator, so we have no idea what pricing is for a range of dates and can't adjust it. As a result we're pulling most of our listings from AirBNB in favor of other platforms. As a guest, the map doesn't work right, so we're just opting to stay at hotels this year.

Edit: I use this service all the time, but I updated the version today, and suddenly nothing worked! üò± Every screen says my request encountered an error. I'm in the middle of a trip! How am I supposed to check in tomorrow? Thank heavens my backup phone still works, but I just wasted an hour restarting, uninstalling, and freaking out. Horrible update! üëéüëé

functional, good user interface, and the search filters sorta work. doesn't lie about bedrooms like VRBO. But please, PLEASE stop with the patronizing exaggerations regarding the availability of rentals. Not every place is a "rare find," or a "guest favorite." I don't need other guests to make my mind up for me, and very few of these are rare. And stop with the pop ups. I'm already using your app. why the hell would you bombard me with pop up ads FOR AN APP IM ALREADY USING??!

sometimes when I search it doesn't want to work and it's not because it isn't updated so idk what's up with that but otherwise the app seems well put together. as far as how they monitor the listings I'm not sure it's right. the prices for some places are just outrageous. with rent already being high it's just ridiculous people are not made of money. Also, I should not have to reach out to support because my host has failed to deliver on their listing. Everyone should go through a process.

*ETA App doesn't even work at all, now. The app hasn't worked since the most recent update. I'm in the middle of a cross-country trip and have to go through my browser to check bookings/answer messages/find places to stay because the app just says "something went wrong, refresh page." I even uninstalled/reinstalled and it's still broken.

The most recent update is horrible. The app is no longer easy to explore nor fun. The removal of the different categories is such a disappointment. We would sometimes use that to plan our trips! I don't even like opening the app anymore because it's just a let down instead of a way to "escape" and plan the next adventure.

This app is horrible. I've been locked out of my account of 11 years because the email verification emails literally don't send, and they use phone number as a primary ID but phone numbers are recycled - mine is associated with someone else's account and they won't reset it. Customer service is nonexistent, a bunch of randos from India bounce you between each other for weeks and do nothing. You guys are doing all this nonsense with this app but won't make it functional. I loathe this company.

please stop changing the app every month! I can't keep up. it's so hard to navigate the app when it is constantly changing. why did you get rid of the feature that tells you how much a selected group of days would cost for the traveler and pay for the host? it was a very useful tool for adjusting costs based on market needs and for some reason it's gone. thanks a lot

this app has been working wonderfully for me for the past 6 months as I travel for work. Even customer service has been attentive. They seem to be committed to not fixing their software issues, for whatever reason. I literally cannot book a stay due to their app not letting me hit the "next" button after I choose my dates and location. I can't be the only one...

i've been a user of Airbnb for 7 years. my experience was always great, but lately a combination of poor app design choices, coupled with apalling customer support have driven me off the app. We had a recent stay that was not as advertised and caused us major safety concerns, we provided photo evidence but airbnb support were useless. We were charged the full amount after leaving 1 hour into a week long stay. No protection for users, and disgusting practices. I'm going back to hotels.

it was a good app and usually I use this app to book for my accommodation when travel for free&easy. I doesn't like the recent change of the app, it is a good ideas to allow quick choice in selecting type of app/house, but equally if we doesn't want those choice for open selection, this becoming a issue. you may missed out a lot of choice. similarly, host also missed a potential customer.

their filters are atrocious. can't even filter between a studio and a 1 bedroom. Also can't sort by rating or filter by guest favorites. Also many other things you should be able to filter on but cannot. If they add more granular filtering, I'll change my rating. But for now... it seems almost intentionally done.

Customer service is VERY VERY BAD! I am super frustrated! I can't add in my phone no. As there is some sort of bug that says I have tried all of my attempts, even tho it is my first time, called helplineÿå they insisted that should try after 24 hrs, I did no help, if anything they were not even trying to get into the matter they were brushing me off. Very very disappointing!

Although you can find good deals for long stays in this app, its totally useless because their commission plus absurd cost of "cleaning" adds up to paying around 200-300 more! on top of that, you can't get the address, so you can't even check the area and surroundings until you actually pay for the reservation. The good deals you find turn into expensive after the commission n Cleaning costs. Not useful unless Airbnb reduces its high commission.

I've been resisting to book through Airbnb for years. it confirms my belief today: SCAM! Hosts attract clients by showing very low price, it's only when you click Reserve to find out the ridiculous fees, cleaning$$$, taxes,... Why can't you simply list only the final price to pay when searching? After all, the client will pay for the final price, not only the list price per room/house per day.

What is the point of having filters if most of them are not applied. Put in your maximum price, and it still shows more expensive ones. Put in swimming pool and it shows you ones without. And don't even get me started on BEACHFRONT when it shows properties miles away from the beach. Absolutely ridiculous app üôÑ Despite continuing updates, this app is still completely flawed. Now, you can't even clear your filters. You need to upgrade your app designer immediately.

very nice. was really straight forward and easy fo fill out. I thought it was going to be confusing and it even let's you back out of the reservation with your money back ! simply amazing ! I JUST LOVE AIR B N B . they have saved my life so much whe. it comes to last minute reservations. and guess what else ?!?! I got a place that wasn't haunted and it only cost me 125 a night. and the next night it costs 20 dollars . although it was only an air mattress in a really small den area. I loved it.

Unreliable to book accommodation. Client needs to pay substantial fees when cancelling, but when host cancels, no compensation is paid for ruining the travel plans. My place was cancelled just 10 minutes before the agreed arrival time and when I was literally around the corner to arrive. Though the customer support was supportive in words, no actual help from them either. The proposed alternatives were really far and way too expensive.

I had one of the worst experiences with Airbnb recently. My booking was confirmed and paid for, but when I reached the property, the host had already given the room to someone else offline. To cover up, he falsely claimed a ‚Äúrefrigerator issue‚Äù to cancel the booking. I was left stranded at night, had to find another place last minute, and faced unnecessary stress and extra expenses. Even though Airbnb later processed the refund and reimbursement, it took too long

Mobile calender has been broken for a year. I try to block nights but it won't let me saying there is a 30 night minimum and the nights are unavailable. In actuality I have 30+ days of calendar open but it won't let me block it. Being unable to block my calendar as I wish while on the go is terrible. FIX YOUR CALENDAR.

Airbnb is a Mob operation. App navigation is broken and UI sucks. No way to see transactions for a reservation, impossible to see the "resolutions" list for booking. For hosts, the protection policy is so restrictive that you will sustain losses parties or fake support pets. If a guest damages or steals an item, air bnb devalues the item refunded. For a 15% fee, I expect better coverage. I would prefer a third party insurance, like VRBO has. Support is all overseas and they don't have a clue.

Not sure why it auto cancelled my reservation for not completing my verification, when I uploaded the information hours beforehand. It should know not to cancel when it is in process especially if its going to take hours to do. When I went back to rebook the next morning the cost was up by $20.

Unfortunately the app doesn't really work well in some countries (Asia, Sud America...), and the support should be ashamed of the job that they are doing, they literally take their time to respond to any inquiries... I spent 3 days talking with them for a re-found... Can a person spend 3 days of his time because of a scammer on their app, and then have to discuss with the support for 3 days in order to receive his money...

Good app helps find better deals the small hotel room rates. Update..... very disappointing there is so many listings are fraudulent showing as available you go through the whole booking process get excited because you have your stay covered only to find out it is not available. Attempting to book a trip to Las Vegas, literally out of the six facilities I have tried to book only one is actually available. So frustrating and wrong. Come on AirBandB do better.

I'm a co-host. Airbnb sends co-hosts message, booking cancellations and enquiry notifications, it does NOT send co-hosts booking request notifications, why? ... accepting bookings is the whole point of listing property on airbnb, it's just weird the app won't tell me i have one. .... overall a clunky app with many limitations, I use it out of necessity, but I don't like it.

Registration asks for too much private data. I had to give it because its an emergency. But with this kind of data collection, I will not recommended registering on Airbnb to anyone else. It did help me find a good property though. Hence two stars (not one). My trip is yet to come up, so hopefully the experience will be good.

Bring back search by categories! I loved the feature where you could search by type of home and it would bring up homes from all over. I was able to find unique homes and now it makes it specific to location. It's very frustrating. Not sure why this feature was discontinued!! I've never had any issues with this app until now.

it's good for staying but when it says it's the final price for a stay that's a lie because there have been places that Airbnb said final price but then the host includes a bunch of fees for background checks, an extra cleaning fee that wasn't part of the final price. The app updated and the message to restart the app never went away even when I restarted the app, forced closed the app and the message stayed.

***BEWARE*** I would not recommend being a using this App. They will not look out for your home or your best interests. Many tech glitches. Wasted much time dealing with inept service agents. They hide behind their legals/policies and their service is horrible. They will penalize you $750 for silly things, but dont penalize themselves for their errors. OVERRATED

I feel like the app is very user friendly and easy to use. I love all of the options of places to stay and the transparency of the app. I also think it's great that they now have the fee advertised up front. on one hand, it is nice that they show you the available airbnbs in the surrounding towns you're looking for, it would also be nice if they would have an option to just show you airbnbs in the specific town you searched.

Scam after scam all around the World. Poor or no customer support. Last minute cancelations from hosts who try to get more money out of your pocket in any form of security deposits, wifi charges, etc. Unfortunately Airbnb doesn't really care about the fact that tons of hosts operate multiple properties under one listing. Often the addresses don't respond to the property listed. I can keep on going. Poor selection and control of hosts and properties. I feel bad about those hosts trying their best

After the removal of the categories area to favour "services" I can confidently say the app is no longer with the space as it feels like every other app out there, and nothing unique anymore. It's better to use Google or redit if you're looking for interesting and unique places to stay like I am.. I will truly miss the OMG category üò≠

Piece of garbage app. How can you allow dates to be booked for the same day then "Typical response time is 6 hours" after 6 hours the host declines. Then another one 4 hours, no man either you are doing AirBnB or not. Now its 18h40, all hosts have declined. Like you either have rooms available or not. Now I also cant cancel from my side otherwise I lose my money.

The app doesn't respect price filters anymore, making searches for a place to book a giant waste of time, showing over 1000 places priced higher than I want, not the 67 it says meets my criteria. Then when I try to contact support about it, the page goes blank. It seems they really aren't interested in hearing about issues.

3 stars because you took the best thing from your search. The selection of "Experiences" as off-grid, castles, beach and all those similar things. if you're an older Airbnb user, you know what I mean, please, please, bring that back, please.

I am not contacting you through a international number as my provider doesn't allow it anyway, I know you won't pay for the call & I know you won't get help. Like Meetup & Uber, Airbnb was good now bad & only interested in making money not helping their users, as logging in with my email doesn't work and using my phone number it claims tried too many times even with only 2 tries and with one of them a Airbnb fault. PS Why does Google ask does the app help you find recipes and restaurants?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we suggest re-attempting logging in after one hour. In case additional help is needed, please contact us at +1-415-800-5959 or message us via X/Twitter (@AirbnbHelp) or Facebook account. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: App is great, found a lot of great hidden gems to stay for a good price. but customer service is pain, its all written in the terms of service how screwed you are if you need something. be carefull while booking!!

The phone number verification is absolutely frustrating to get through alongside waiting 24 hours to try again just to figure out the issue as to why I can't seem to receive the verification code make the experience of using this app aggravating.

They canceled my trip that a booked and reserved it, for my birthday January 8th ta the 12th. now they are sending my money back i gotta wait 15 days to reserve it again and might lose my spot now for my birthday, cause Airbnb took my account down cause I "wasn't verified". Even tho it said im verified on my account on the Airbnb app had to go online an verifie my account on the wed, why doesn't it work through the app üôÉ üò°

It's frustrating as hell to not be able to change dates quickly and not to find the same places available on the app as on the website. I don't know why the website treats me like a new customer when I log in to my account, and it wants ID verification again when I have been a member for 13 years! You guys really need to fix this and make it easier to use and make simple changes.

They updated the app and replaced "unique stays" with services. Why would anyone rather search for services INSTEAD of unique stays? If they wanted to add something that draws more profit, then ADD it. Don't take away the coolest part of this app. Now, there is no way to search by type. There was a Castles feature, a tree house feature, & all different types of cool places before. you could browse by type and choose an adventure purely based on that. now thats just gone. so is the "go anywhere"

This app has so many basic features that are not user-friendly. So annoying for a company of this size. You can't message somebody after the first message without confirming the booking. It often bumps you on to "experiences" when you're trying to look for "homes". It's really hard to work out how to change the date of a search.

Airbnb has improved a lot over the last few years. The pricing is much better/more clearly represented, and the location accuracy on sesrch is a bit better than it was. Their customer service is incredible! I just had an unpleasant encounter with a host, and Airbnb's response was a prompt phone call and they did what they could, even though the host remained uncooperative. I recommend 100%.

I have installed this application to book a room, later after paying the amount for the room it is asking for verification, now I had to wait to come to my room to collect documents for verification, and later while scanning my I'd, it is continuously giving me error, that light is not sufficient to scan. it all feels like a complete scam.

title: Personify Health
description:
Virgin Pulse is now Personify Health.¬†

The first and only personalized health platform company that brings holistic health and wellbeing, comprehensive navigation and advocacy, and flexible health plan administration, all in one place.¬†

Seamlessly sync your daily activities with our built-in activity tracker, monitoring steps taken and sleep patterns. Stay connected on the go with Max Buzz integration, displaying incoming calls and text messages directly on your device. Elevate your wellbeing journey with personalized insights and convenient notifications - your all-in-one solution for a healthier, connected lifestyle.
descriptionHTML:
Virgin Pulse is now Personify Health.¬†

The first and only personalized health platform company that brings holistic health and wellbeing, comprehensive navigation and advocacy, and flexible health plan administration, all in one place.¬†

Seamlessly sync your daily activities with our built-in activity tracker, monitoring steps taken and sleep patterns. Stay connected on the go with Max Buzz integration, displaying incoming calls and text messages directly on your device. Elevate your wellbeing journey with personalized insights and convenient notifications - your all-in-one solution for a healthier, connected lifestyle.
summary: Personify Health's personalized health platform makes healthiness happen.

scraped_reviews.content: Keeps unlinking to Google Fit so that steps and workouts aren't counted. Has login problems - like it always authenticates via my work email (which I don't have access to on my phone), the security code takes forever to get emailed, and then it makes you do this almost every time you sign in. Setting up biometric authentication does nothing. No phone number/texting option for authorization. Very behind Rewards are achievable, but often the app stops you from achieving them regularly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello and thank you for your review!
Our Support team can provide the best assistance on your inquiry further. Feel free to contact us via email (support@virginpulse.com), Live Chat (2AM-9PM EST, Monday - Friday) or Phone (8AM-9 PM EST, Monday - Friday). Thank you very much!

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app, but for some reason lately it will randomly have problems syncing with Samsung health and I can't get it to reconnect. I literally have to uninstall and then reinstall the app to get it to sync up again. This has been a daily thing starting this week. I don't know if some update broke the app, but changed my review to 1 star until its fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Could you please reach out to our Support team so we can address your inquiry in further detail? You can contact us via email (support@personifyhealth.com), Live Chat (2AM-9PM EST, Monday - Friday) or Phone (8AM-9 PM EST, Monday - Friday). Thank you very much!

scraped_reviews.content: App is ok when working. Only use because of work but it's ok. Customer service when they break things?? Terrible. You have to send data to prove things which they then reconcile and disagree with-so they had the data all along. Well over a month and still don't have missing points. If it's working, all good. If not, good luck. Then, they change their mind and determine you already maxed out for the quarter so you don't get any points after all. Terrible customer service. zero stars if I could!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We encourage you to forward the suggestions on how to improve the app to our Support team as we strive toward app improvement and implementation of new features! You can contact us via email (support@personifyhealth.com), Live Chat (2AM-9PM EST, Monday - Friday) or Phone (8AM-9 PM EST, Monday - Friday).

scraped_reviews.content: This app earns points that reduce the cost of health insurance. I started late, so I had a lot of points to earn. I earned 11,400 points on the first of the month (double points day). It took a couple weeks but they finally gave me the double points. Several weeks later into the next month, they took the points away from me. I contacted customer service multiple times with little result. They lied about my point balance and offered me no recourse. The time and effort is not worth the savings!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how you feel. We appreciate your feedback. Please rest assured members' opinions matter to us and we suggest forwarding the suggestions on how to improve the app to our Support team, via email (support@personifyhealth.com), Live Chat (2AM-9PM EST, Monday - Friday) or Phone (8AM-9 PM EST, Monday - Friday)

scraped_reviews.content: Highly inaccurate in syncing with smart devices and tracking steps. There are days I do over 10k steps, measured in my smart watch that is connected to the app with all the permissions needed to sync. The app doesn't sync. I have had to manually put in a weeks worth of steps due to the app not syncing. The app also just doesn't grant points when the milestones for points are hit.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We would kindly ask you to contact our Support Team at e-mail (support@personifyhealth.com), LiveChat (2AM - 9PM EST, Monday - Friday) or Phone (8AM - 9 PM EST, Monday - Friday) so we can address the matter in question.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is horrible and as bad as virgin pulse. Doesn't sync steps that I get points for if it doesn't take them it's days later before they show up. The app says it is experiencing difficulty. That's been the last 5 days and apparently still can't get it fixed. new update I've been trying to get on this app for 2 days to log my steps in that I get points for. not able to get on site.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We would kindly ask you to contact our Support Team at e-mail (support@personifyhealth.com), LiveChat (2AM - 9PM EST, Monday - Friday) or Phone (8AM - 9 PM EST, Monday - Friday) so we can address the matter in question.

scraped_reviews.content: The entire platform is awful. My Garmin isn't a supported device and, according to an incredibly unhelpful customer service agent, it could take up to a year to have it added assuming enough people request it be added. title: Google Messages
description:
Google Messages is the official Google app for messaging. Google Messages is revolutionizing how a billion users connect and is powered by Rich Communication Services (RCS), the industry standard for texting that replaces SMS and MMS. With RCS, you can share high resolution photos and videos, enjoy dynamic group chats, and seamlessly connect with other RCS users including your iPhone friends. 

        ‚Ä¢        Rich Communication: Share high-quality photos and videos, see when friends are typing, and enjoy dynamic group chats that now seamlessly include your iPhone friends.
        ‚Ä¢        Personal Touch: Make conversations uniquely yours with features like custom chat bubble colors or fun selfie gifs. 
        ‚Ä¢        Privacy Matters: Rest easy knowing your personal chats are protected with end-to-end encryption between Google Messages users, so no one (including Google and third parties) can read or view your messages and attachments except the person you‚Äôre messaging. Plus, enjoy advanced spam protection. 
        ‚Ä¢        AI-Powered Messaging: Craft the perfect message with Magic Compose suggestions and our latest AI features.
        ‚Ä¢        Seamless Across Devices: Start a chat on your phone and continue it effortlessly on your tablet or computer. The app is also available on Wear OS.

Google Messages is more than just messaging; it's a richer, safer, and more expressive way to connect.

App is also available on Wear OS. Availability of RCS varies by region and carrier and a data plan may be required. Availability of features varies by market and device and sign up for beta testing may be required.

We'll pass this along to the team so they can continue iterating on your feedback to make Messages even better. We ask that you submit feedback within the Messages app by clicking the Menu > Help and Feedback > Send Feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: The app only imported the other people's side of the conversation. It didn't import anything I sent. That makes it totally useless. Update: Text cannot be copied to clipboard. So when someone sends me a long text string, like the model number on a piece of equipment, I have to write it down & type it in somewhere else. There is no icon like that. Only icons for useless emojis.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tim. To copy text on your Messages app, please try the following steps: Press and hold the text you want to copy then select the icon that looks like two stack of papers at the top. Hope this helps!

scraped_reviews.content: Way better before recent update. Now it's randomly super slow, it insists on pulling up my camera if I want to send a picture from my gallery (and I don't see an option to turn it off). edit: you told me to reply but there's no option to do so. The problem is still persisting. Get rid of the camera thing and put it back to the way it was before the update, it was fine before.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Rachel. Thanks for reaching out. We've recently updated the photo attachment feature in Google Messages, and the camera now opens directly for quicker photo sharing. We understand this is a change and appreciate your feedback. If you're also experiencing issues scrolling past the first 12 photos in the gallery, please reply and let me know.

scraped_reviews.content: Does the job usually. I miss being able to schedule messages like I could with Vz message+. Also miss being able to set up reminders that I received a text. Sometimes I don't hear the alert and don't know I got a text unless I look at my phone, which sucks! Voice to text is horrible!! Most times I use it, my message will appear again in the texting box as if I never sent it. Very weird and SUPER annoying!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Joe. You can schedule messages to send on phones with Android 7 and newer. More info: goo.gle/2NPYB21. Also, it looks like you're having trouble with notifications. Check out this Help Center article for assistance: goo.gle/2QMbaZU. You can also submit feedback within the Messages app by clicking the Menu > Help and Feedback > Send Feedback.

title: Symptom, Mood & Period Tracker
description: ‚úÖ Feel more in control of your Symptoms, Mood, Pain, Fatigue & Mental Health Bearable can help you reclaim control of your well-being by making mood, period, symptom, pain & fatigue tracking simple, convenient, and effective. Making entries into our symptom & mood tracker is effortless, so you can focus on feeling better. ‚úÖ Gain Symptom & Mood insights with just a few clicks a day Discover trends and correlations in your habits, symptoms, period cycle, mood, and more. With just a few clicks each day our health tracker can help you gain insights into what‚Äôs helping or triggering changes in Mental Health, Fatigue, and symptoms of chronic illnesses such as Bipolar, Anxiety, Headache, Migraine, PCOS, Depression, BPD, Chronic Pain, and more. ‚úÖ All your health tracking in one place Tired of using multiple apps to track your mood, symptoms, period, and medication? We think this should be kept in one app so that you and your doctors can get a complete picture of your health. BEARABLE HELPS YOU TO ‚≠ê Discover what improves & worsens your symptoms Track your medication, self-care, habits, & activities and discover how they correlate with changes in your symptoms, mood, mental health, and more. ‚≠ê Communicate with your Doctor or Therapist Easily share reports + timelines showing changes in mood and symptoms of chronic illnesses such as chronic pain, Bipolar, Anxiety, Headache, Migraine, PCOS, Depression, BPD, and more. ‚≠ê Spot patterns & warning signs Get a headstart on managing your symptoms, mood, and energy levels. Our graphs & weekly reports help you to spot when things take a turn for the worse so you can act fast. ‚≠ê Monitor changes in symptoms over time Keep an eye on changes in existing symptoms, new symptoms, and how symptoms respond to new medication, medicine, and treatment. ‚≠ê Stay accountable for self-care habits Find the things that help you to manage your symptoms, mood, and mental health and use optional reminders and goals to stick to your self-care plan and adhere to your meds schedule. ‚≠ê Feel in control of your health again Over 75% of the Bearable community - comprised of people living with chronic illnesses including Chronic Pain, Bipolar, Anxiety, Headache, Migraine, PCOS, Depression, BPD, and more - tell us that Bearable helps give them a sense of control over their health and well-being. And there‚Äôs much more... üëâ Reminders for medication, medicine, mental health check-ins, and self-care. üëâ Share and Export. üëâ Sync health data automatically. üëâ Dark mode. üëâ Restore data across devices. üí° Just some of the ways people use Bearable Health & Symptom tracker Mood & Mental Health tracker Anxiety & Depression tracker Pain & Fatigue tracker Medication & Medicine tracker Headache & Migraine tracker Period, PCOS & PMDD tracker BPD & Bipolar tracker üîê PRIVATE & SECURE Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time. It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone. üíü Made by people who understand & care Created by people living with chronic health issues and with feedback from thousands of people with mental and physical health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, Chronic Fatigue (me/cfs), Multiple Sclerosis (ms), Endometriosis, PCOS, BPD, Bipolar, ptsd, Migraines, Headaches, Cancer, Arthritis, Crohn's, Diabetes, ibs and ibd, Ehlers-Danlos (eds), Dysautonomia, mcas, and more. We aim to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible even for people suffering from fatigue and brain fog. We‚Äôve created a sense of community and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most. We‚Äôre committed to improving this app to help as many people as possible. We‚Äôd love to hear from you (support@bearable.app)
descriptionHTML:
‚úÖ Feel more in control of your Symptoms, Mood, Pain, Fatigue & Mental Health
Bearable can help you reclaim control of your well-being by making mood, period, symptom, pain & fatigue tracking simple, convenient, and effective. Making entries into our symptom & mood tracker is effortless, so you can focus on feeling better.

‚úÖ Gain Symptom & Mood insights with just a few clicks a day
Discover trends and correlations in your habits, symptoms, period cycle, mood, and more. With just a few clicks each day our health tracker can help you gain insights into what‚Äôs helping or triggering changes in Mental Health, Fatigue, and symptoms of chronic illnesses such as Bipolar, Anxiety, Headache, Migraine, PCOS, Depression, BPD, Chronic Pain, and more.

‚úÖ All your health tracking in one place
Tired of using multiple apps to track your mood, symptoms, period, and medication? We think this should be kept in one app so that you and your doctors can get a complete picture of your health.

BEARABLE HELPS YOU TO
‚≠ê Discover what improves & worsens your symptoms Track your medication, self-care, habits, & activities and discover how they correlate with changes in your symptoms, mood, mental health, and more.
‚≠ê Communicate with your Doctor or Therapist Easily share reports + timelines showing changes in mood and symptoms of chronic illnesses such as chronic pain, Bipolar, Anxiety, Headache, Migraine, PCOS, Depression, BPD, and more.
‚≠ê Spot patterns & warning signs Get a headstart on managing your symptoms, mood, and energy levels. Our graphs & weekly reports help you to spot when things take a turn for the worse so you can act fast.
‚≠ê Monitor changes in symptoms over time Keep an eye on changes in existing symptoms, new symptoms, and how symptoms respond to new medication, medicine, and treatment.
‚≠ê Stay accountable for self-care habits Find the things that help you to manage your symptoms, mood, and mental health and use optional reminders and goals to stick to your self-care plan and adhere to your meds schedule.
‚≠ê Feel in control of your health again Over 75% of the Bearable community - comprised of people living with chronic illnesses including Chronic Pain, Bipolar, Anxiety, Headache, Migraine, PCOS, Depression, BPD, and more - tell us that Bearable helps give them a sense of control over their health and well-being.

And there‚Äôs much more...
üëâ Reminders for medication, medicine, mental health check-ins, and self-care.
üëâ Share and Export.
üëâ Sync health data automatically.
üëâ Dark mode.
üëâ Restore data across devices.

üí° Just some of the ways people use Bearable
Health & Symptom tracker
Mood & Mental Health tracker
Anxiety & Depression tracker
Pain & Fatigue tracker
Medication & Medicine tracker
Headache & Migraine tracker
Period, PCOS & PMDD tracker
BPD & Bipolar tracker

üîê PRIVATE & SECURE
Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time. It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.

üíü Made by people who understand & care
Created by people living with chronic health issues and with feedback from thousands of people with mental and physical health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, Chronic Fatigue (me/cfs), Multiple Sclerosis (ms), Endometriosis, PCOS, BPD, Bipolar, ptsd, Migraines, Headaches, Cancer, Arthritis, Crohn's, Diabetes, ibs and ibd, Ehlers-Danlos (eds), Dysautonomia, mcas, and more.

We aim to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible even for people suffering from fatigue and brain fog. We‚Äôve created a sense of community and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most. We‚Äôre committed to improving this app to help as many people as possible. We‚Äôd love to hear from you (support@bearable.app)
summary: Feel more in control of Mental Health, Meds, Pain, Cycle, Headache & Anxiety

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app & I've recommended it to a lot of friends! It has just about everything you need - want to keep track of. There isn't a pay wall either (but you can still pay for extra features). I appreciate that they added a period tracking section too! Something that I wished they could do more is adding more words to the word tracking & for it to be organized by emotions (preferably positive to okay to negative). I have already added and sorted my own words. It would save time for others tho

very smooth to use, just a few minutes in the morning, and a few in the evening! holds a lot of data if you want it to really track things, like food eaten and even medications, as well as period tracker/family planning app. so many things that you can track and keep track of patterns and it makes sense to see my mood and energy change in more of a graph than just by memory.

I am fully enjoying the step by step set up for Bearable. I would stay, but there is $/sign up that I didn't expect. I would totally come back for a free limited version, or if there are no other options/apps. Currently -Oct 19, 2025- the free trial is for only 24hrs. I'd love to explore this app more, but I need more than 1-day to do that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey, thanks for your review. Just in case it's unclear, it's possible to use most of our features for free. Alternatively, if you'd like the subscription features but cannot afford them, we have a sponsorship program that gifts approx. 150 free subscriptions each month. Feel free to get in touch with me at support@bearable.app for help applying.

scraped_reviews.content: I did the 7 day free trial. The layout and the look are great. I appreciate how many categories I can add of things to track. But I set up times of day to be reminded to track and turned on notifications, but I still didn't get reminded at all any day of the free trial. Plus there's no feature to say what time of day a symptom begins or stops. seems important to look for correlations with environmental or meals
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Amy, thanks for your review. There are a couple of options for tracking symptoms with time periods and/or time stamps, if you contact support@bearable.app about this I'll be able to share some more info with you. The notifications issue could be account or device specific but if you get in touch we can investigate this for you too. Thanks, Jesse

scraped_reviews.content: This is a really good app for tracking moods and symptoms. I like how you can check in multiple times, and say that your evening situation is different than your morning one. I'm still early on so maybe it's already there, and I'm in the free version right now, but I'd like to see the ability to trend certain symptoms against other problems (i.e. trend stomach problems against foods)

I have had (the paid version) of Bearable for over a year now & it has changed my life. I never was able to keep track of my symptoms or how medications affected me. Where I used to sit in doctor's offices and stutter, now I sit with confidence. I can pull up data to answer almost any question they throw at me. The key is to use the app CONSISTENTLY. It's hard to show any trends if you're not checking in daily.

Before using Bearable I felt like I was being tossed in the waves of my anxiety and depression! I was unsure if I was improving or regressing, and I didn't know what factors were causing the changes in my mood and energy levels. I just felt lost. Bearable helps me stay focused on my daily goals while also giving me the big picture. I can easily customize what I track, log my dailies, and set notifications. Bearable has helped me chart a course for smooth sailing, and for that I am grateful.

this is such an awesome app. I was looking for something to track my moods and potential things that affect it. Bearable is exactly what I wanted. most of the other tracking apps were way too loose on data and flexibility. this can track just about anything and will give you average person stats on what is affecting what. it's easy to input. easy to understand the output. and has lots and lots of data for those like me that just adore data. ‚ù§Ô∏è

This app is amazing. It tracks everything and once you get the hang of it, it's so simple to use. I'm able to see what foods are triggers, what actions might be causing more headaches or lack of sleep, etc... It does it all or just what you want because it also let's you customize to your needs. (I did pay for the upgraded version but the free one was great, too.)

Never sent a reminder message that the trial was ending. Reimbursement no problem.. But, while I was liking the app during the trial. Now it's over the access to data is done. Which brings up another issue. There's no way to sync samsung health directly to the app, had to download a 3rd party sync app, with a hidden trial period too, now that's over. Pretty much useless app to me now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi E.J. - I'm really sorry to hear about this. We have a 30-day refund policy so please get in touch with us at support@bearable.app and we'll happily resolve this for you. Please note that the subscription is optional and that you can use most of the features for free and/or apply for a sponsored subscription.

scraped_reviews.content: After looking at several different mood trackers, Bearable was the only one that allows for multiple entries throughout the day. The ability to track meals, medications, and other activities or events that can affect mood is pretty awesome as well. I've only been using it for a week, but am looking forward to syncing a fitbit so that my activity levels and sleep patterns can be tracked as well. Great app that offers great insights.

Best symptom tracker out there, by far! Extremely customizable so you can track whatever you want, to whatever degree you want. Plus it can track medication, mood, food/drink, health/fitness tracker information (optionally pulled in automatically from other apps), and whatever else you want (again, endlessly customizable). Plus: Looks for trends and correlations. Easily export your data. No ads. Free version is fully functional. Amazing dev team is always adding new features!

I've enjoyed the app immensely. I'm using the free version and I still get so much value out of it. I'm already noticing patterns in my sleep, nutrition and symptoms. I like the customizability and the fact that this is not a fitness or nutrition tracker but a tracker for those with ongoing health concerns. I'm grateful for the clarity and relief it's brought me. Thanks so much Bearable team!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thrilled to hear you're finding value in the free version of our app! It's wonderful that you're already noticing patterns and benefiting from its customizability. We're so glad it's bringing clarity and relief to your health journey. Thank you for your kind words and for being a part of the Bearable community!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is great!! I'm really forgetful but have to take daily medication and it's been instrumental in helping me to remember to do so, and to prevent me from accidentally taking it twice. It has so many great tools, but I honestly only use a few. I love being able to easily track my symptoms so I have a record of when issues started and when they get better and worse. I highly recommend it!

I cannot say enough about this app! I ended up getting the premium version and subscribed. I have anxiety and a few physical illnesses. This app has helped me track my physical symptoms, mental health, and energy levels and see how they relate to each other. When I am unable to voice my symptoms properly to my therapist or physician, I simply show them this app and the notes I've taken (complete with time stamps)! it truly has helped me control my health and wellness. 100% recommend to everyone.

I wanted to leave a review after seeing all of the 1 start reviews from people who are salty after the app came out of beta and the developers started charging for their services. Unfortunately, people can't pay rent and buy food without some kind of income. The other option is ads. As a free user, the app is perfect for my needs. Thank you for even having a free version of the app that doesn't have ads!

Best tracker I've found. So easy to navigate and connects to google fit. I could not be more pleased. Although most of it is manual input, that is what I need. It does not track food macros at all, just type in what you had for dinner: "burger and fries". So easy. It is all the things I have needed in a tracker.

This is my favorite tracking app because not only does it allow me to track my mood and mental health, but I can also track my physical health, symptoms, diet, and countless other things with it... for FREE. It's very similar to Daylio, I just prefer this app (layout, insights, etc.) and I'm very pleased with the features that are available WITHOUT having to pay. I imagine it's actually worth a subscription, so I will consider that in the future.

Great app! I wasnt expecting it to be this intricate. Its amazing! I lose how detailed it is. Only 4 stars because some buttons don't work in the more menu. I also would to have a calorie option for the food you enter into the diary. Itd be great to have all of this in one app instead of spread out of several. But its an amazing app! I love it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Megan, thanks for the review!  Could you e-mail james@bearable with more detail about buttons not working in the more menu?  We have not heard of this issue before, so it would be great to know exactly what's happening.  Thanks

scraped_reviews.content: I'm only a handful of days in, but I'm loving all the features. it's definitely worth the price. I'm able to track mental health, physical health, food, etc and all in a way that captures my life holistically. I can't wait to see what I can learn once I've got more days accumulated. I will say that, like with any data, you're going to get out of it what you put in. I personally have wanted something like this for a long time and want to put the info in. I think it's pretty quick once familiar.

Overall, this is a great app. You can relatively easily track medications, symptoms, and more. However, I found a better tracker in the app "Human" that does all of the same but also has better options for exporting the details being tracked to be shared with healthcare professionals and also gives clear visibility for how well I am ad adhearing to health plans.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Allie, we're working on this as I type this - the fix will be out very soon. This began 24 hours ago and will be fixed within hours.

scraped_reviews.content: Easily the best tracker I've ever tried, app or otherwise. They keep adding new features and focus on privacy. Major props and appreciation to them. And the free mode is AMAZING! I've never had an app that has so much available in the free version and isn't unbelievably pushy to pay. It pops up every once in a while and easy to x out of. One of the best apps

This is a great app. I struggle with depression, epilepsy, & lupus. This helps me track everything..... Literally! A Hero sponsored me so I could use the app for about a month at no cost. U have access to it all. And with out the access I'd be lost bc there's so many details u can assess & document. The subscription is for an entire year & is less than $20. For a year!!! Now that's what I call a deal especially when it comes to ur health.

I downloaded a few apps to try out and this one beat all the others for a mood tracker and journal. What I wanted and what this one offers: fully customizable categories, easy presets I can just select and don't have to type everything day to day (AND the option to add notes for elaboration if necessary), and graphs/stats to track it all. Seriously, this is incredible as a beta and I'm excited for the pro version (especially if I can change the colors, but buying/keeping it regardless!).

Way better than MySymptoms. Well thought out and designed app for tracking everything you can imagine. Fully custimizable for what you care about tracking and not what you don't. Free analysis features include charts and lists you can review and correlate with pairs of suspected factors over time. Thank you for the great app. After being frustrated with MySymptoms, I thought I had given up tracking stuff through an app, but with EDS, there is a lot going on, and plenty for me to figure out.

I've been using this app for about 6 months now, for tracking multiple chronic illnesses. It has been useful in tracking associations between symptoms and what I eat, meds I take, etc. The interface is easy to use and SUPER customizable, which makes it way better over other apps I've tried. Beautiful, easy to read charts. I love that they added categories for symptoms. I hope they add categories for medicine (topical, prescription/non, PT) that would be so helpful!!!

This app might save my life. I have had severe breathing issues for the past 6 months and doctors are struggling to figure out why. This app gives me the ability to track symptoms very specifically in a way I couldn't do before. Hypoxia has caused my memory to struggle and the data I'm tracking in this app will make a huge difference to my doctors. I love being able to customize symptoms and record the specific times of day, plus correlations to my meds, diet, activities etc.

This app is amazing! This is the first app I've found that works to help me track everything we need for my autistic non-verbal child. Since it's customizable, I can keep track of things an adult or typical child may not need. The free version has more than enough, but the premium offers even more insights to help see how things are going. It's a great price and their support is top notch as well! I could not recommend this enough!!!!

I never write reviews, and I am super into mood/health tracking apps. I have tried So. Many. Apps. FINALLY, THIS IS THE APP I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR!! Made for and by people with chronic illnesses of all kinds. You can track your mood, symptoms, sleep, activity, food, meds, and anything else (I track the moon). Clean and easy UI, very customizable, with SUPER HELPFUL insights (given enough data). Plus it's only in BETA - suggesting there is so much more to come. I can't wait! Great job folks üëç

Easiest tracker. Just logging stuff keeps me on track. Super easy / customizable / clean app. Simple "insight" correlator tab too which is nice. Best app for anyone managing chronic conditions where diet / supplements play a key role. Super customizable though to account for an extra factor you want - stress, exercise, literally anything you can add and organize. Data entry is easy fast intuitive, so you'll use it. I love this app. I'm a month in and I'm loving it.

Love everything about this app!! The developer did a great job presenting useful information on such a pleasing & easy to use interface. It allows you to customize options for everything you want to track - it'll take me awhile to get the most out of its functionality. I didn't expect to track my food but I love this allows u to do so in a non-anal way unlike MFP - my current options include mostly healthy/unhealthy, high veggie, low carb, refined sugars, alcohol, caffeine....

I was diagnosed with bipolar II on May 8th. After using Daylio, I realized I couldn't see the chart without paying for a subscription. I looked around and found Bearable. I love this app. Everything is free, and you can track whatever you want. It's simple and concise and easy to use. The app is adorable with its photo, but in its own right, it does all it says it will and more. Keep it up!

Love the look of this app so far (read that it was in BETA)! Love the options for tracking, and its super easy to log things that have happened. For future updates, Im hoping theres an editable calendar widget coming, because I would love to be able to glance at my full calendar and quickly add symptoms from my phone's homepage. Would also love if said calendar had an input for future doctor appointments, so I can see when they're coming up! Keep up the awesome work!

This app is great! It's super customizeable so you can make it as detailed as you want. It has space for notes and it's simple to use. Free version doesn't have annoying ads which is awesome. Only thing I would change is the food logging. I want to find patterns in how what I eat affects my symptoms, but the food logging is a tad tedious to use.

I've gone through an insane amount of apps trying to find one like this. I have a massive handful of health conditions that I need to monitor. I've tried small personal journals, notes on my phone, etc. But my symptoms are so frequent it's hard to keep track of it all. I just really appreciate how well this app is set up. Its like a personal pre-made bullet journal.

One of the best free self care and medical apps. Sure, they do have a subscription service, but it doesn't restrict crucial items on the free version. And it's great for tracking both physical medical items (diet, bowels, pain, periods) and psychological items (bedtimes, energy, mood). It has also been a life saver for medication reminders. I normally hate apps that try to restrict medical and psychological care through premiums, but this one is one of the good one. Serious life saver.

This is an excellent app for tracking physical and mental health. It is wildly customizable. It is user friendly. The app looks great. I've been using it for less than a month, but I've already found useful information in the insights section. Sometimes the "bad days" seem to cloud out any memory of good or even average days, and this app helps me see that on average I have way less bad days than I think. It's been enlightening so far. Looking forward to finding out more!

If you have a chronic illness or are just really into self-optimization, this app is it. The multiple ways to customize the inputs and explore your data are mind-boggling. I've been using it to determine whether my symptoms are hormonal or related to the intensity, duration or nature of my exercise. A really fantastic tool when you're trying to work out a life puzzle. My one complaint is the trial only lasts seven days. That's not enough to see data correlations before you decide to purchase.

This app is great for tracking chronic illness. I can also tease out if a food and a symptom are showing up on the same day. I have used a lot of different apps and analog trackers for symptom tracking. Bearable is the easiest and most thorough that I have come across. I also like the rating scale as it helps me to stay consistent when tracking symptoms, but also has a note section for added detail. I highly recommend this app.

If you take the time to interact with the app, it gives rich beautiful data. My only suggestion for the team is to work harder at being NEUTRAL to get accurate data readings instead of trying to be "positive" about so many things. But maybe that's me misunderstanding whether the point of the app is to make you feel better or collect the most accurate data possible. Great job, please keep up the great work!

I have ADHD and I like this app a lot, enough that I paid $19 for a year's subscription for it! I like how much ability you have to customize everything, you can track food/water WITHOUT tracking calories or macros, and how it can be used as a journal when I don't have the energy to type or write things down. The only thing would add to this app is the ability to set custom "day" periods instead of the default (I'm a shift worker), but idk how that would work with data trends.

I am VERY impressed with this app, in particular the amount of customization I can do! You can track anything and name it whatever you want!! I'll be spreading the word on this app! I'm always skeptical at an app purchase, but this one absolutely is worth the subscription. it doesn't matter if you're tracking a diet, medications, allergies, whatever it is you want! No only can you customize the title of the section, place it under the category, but you can also define the measurement type.

The. Best. App. For tracking your health overall, hands down! I have used it for over a year & STILL haven't breached the entirety of what it's capable of! You can track your moods, sleep patterns, exercise, activities, energy levels, bowel movements, medication, triggers & stressors, supplements, heart rate, steps walked, etc, AND see how all those factors affect you overall by percentage and more! I can honestly say that without it, my life with my conditions would be un-bearable! XD

I have the free version, and it offers a lot of access to different categories you can track. Right now I'm tracking my mood, anxiety/depression, physical pains, energy levels, food, and sleep each day. I could even add more! I really like the UI as well, even though I track a lot of things there are collapsing menus I can open/close so it doesn't get cluttered. Would recommend!

Thorough, covers every potential category you would want in a health tracking app. Can add and edit categories. Very customizable. There is also an option to take notes under several headings. It tracks stats and helps you draw correlations. I've been looking for something like this for a long time. NO ADS! ! Crazy to offer such a useful, easy-to use, overall excellent product for free.

Perfect balance of customization and simplicity. It is easy to tailor it for your own personal goals/needs. Overall it provides the right kind of flexibility to help virtually anyone track what they want to track (diet, mood, meds, gratitude, etc) and external factors (weather, social circumstances, etc) along with the option to add anything else you want. Each category gives the user the ability to add or remove content as needed and to specify times as well. A+ all around!

This is the winner of the three tracking apps I found! It is comprehensive which is good but also a bit confusing at first. What I would change, without a doubt, is the rating scale for symptoms. IDEA! Maybe make it a setting choice as you would for units of measure. The user could customize by setting their own range. My range is 1-10 for severity ratings. Lastly, the graph should have options for numbers on the tick marks. I would like daily while others will have other preference.

Edit: I liked the app so much I paid for premium, but the one downside is that it cannot sync reliably between two different devices. That's a pretty standard feature for an app of this kind, particularly one that charges a premium subscription. Everyone should be aware of this shortcoming before paying for premium, as I imagine it'd be a deal breaker for many people. Hoping this is added soon!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brielle, for now Bearable can moved from one device to another, but not used simultaneously on two devices, which can lead to data conflicts. We understand that some could benefit from this and multi-device capabilities are on our near-term roadmap; Until then, to make sure you get the best experience possible, please use Bearable on one device.

scraped_reviews.content: I adore this app. It lets me track almost everything about my daily life and habits, and then it takes that data and magically transforms it into percentages and correlations and graphs, oh my! It's a ton of information, but super customizable (especially the paid version, which is worth it IMO). And the app is still growing and developing (though I consider it fully functional as-is) -- I can't wait to see where it goes!

paid version: still getting in the swing of things, gradually increasing the number of entries I do per day, working to build a habit too result in enough data to make conclusions about my mood & other symptoms, especially factors/behaviors that I can control to create a + impact on my life. that said, this app makes it very easy to do. the interface is simple, intuitive. it connects with a couple of my other apps to sync data, including sleep. has the potential to be well worth the investment.

title: FitOn Workouts & Fitness Plans
description:
Lose weight, sweat, and get fit anytime, anywhere with free home exercise workout videos, personalized fitness plans and guided meditations. Get fit with workouts you can do at home, outside, or in the gym.

Reduce stress with a calming yoga practice, increase your fitness with a fun cardio workout, and feel good with hundreds of other free fitness videos. 

Find fitness plans and home workouts that you can also enjoy outside or even in the gym. Get your sweat on with celebrity trainers like Jeanette Jenkins or Cassey Ho (of Blogilates) and read advice articles on how to take care of yourself both mentally and physically.

Achieve personalized health and fitness goals with unlimited access to the best home workouts and exercise videos. From cardio to strength training to HIIT, yoga, Pilates, Barre, and much more - you‚Äôre guaranteed to get your sweat on and find a class you love. Plus, you‚Äôll get to work out with top celebrity trainers like Cassey Ho (of Blogilates), Jeanette Jenkins, Katie Dunlop, Christine Bullock, Kenta Seki, Danielle Pascente, and many more.

Plus, access EXCLUSIVE workout videos led by Gabrielle Union, Julianne Hough, and Jonathan Van Ness.

Also, reduce stress, get better sleep, improve breathing, relax your body and rejuvenate your mind with short and effective meditations.

CARDIO HIIT, YOGA, PILATES, BARRE & MORE! HOME WORKOUTS JUST FOR YOU
‚Ä¢ Quick & effective fitness videos from celebrity trainers like Jeanette Jenkins, Cassey Ho (of Blogilates), and many more! 
‚Ä¢ Exclusive workouts with Gabrielle Union, Julianne Hough, & JVN
‚Ä¢ No gym? No problem. Turn your home into a fitness studio with your phone, laptop or TV

PERSONALIZED FITNESS PLANS & EXERCISE VIDEOS 
‚Ä¢ Reach your goals with personalized workout plans
‚Ä¢ Lose weight, build muscle, increase your cardio endurance, get fit or reduce stress with plans that work for you

FITNESS VIDEOS FOR EVERYONE
‚Ä¢ Enjoy cardio, HIIT, yoga, Pilates, Barre, strength, dance, and more
‚Ä¢ Browse by workout category, body part, length and intensity
‚Ä¢ Short on time? We‚Äôve got quick HIIT 10-minute workouts so you can get your workout in fast! 
‚Ä¢ Workout anytime on-demand, join a live class, and get ready to sweat! 

GUIDED MEDITATIONS
‚Ä¢ Calming meditations to help reduce stress and anxiety
‚Ä¢ Guidance toward improved breathing
‚Ä¢ Increased relaxation for better sleep

STAY MOTIVATED & STAY FIT WITH EXERCISE VIDEOS
‚Ä¢ Join the live leaderboard for friendly competition
‚Ä¢ Track your progress and share with friends
‚Ä¢ Real-time text messaging with friends or workout partners

FitOn is compatible with WearOS
‚Ä¢ Monitor real-time heart rate on Wear OS devices

Plus, you can access workouts online from your TV or computer: https://app.fitonapp.com

Find fitness plans that work for you. Short, fun and effective, the best workouts, from the best personal trainers. Always on.

Barre, pilates, and so many more exciting fitness videos, plus guided meditations! Download FitOn and start your new fitness routine today!
