scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely loved this app before they took casting off. I used to be able to cast directly to my TV, but now I have to screen mirror. it's not as clear picture, a pain to set up everytime and I see my other notifications that disrupt workouts. I contacted customer service, they said they knew it's an issue and would be solved, but nothing. It's still worth the PRO membership, just not as good as it once was.

The free version of this app is fantastic. The paid version is phenomenal! There are a ton of effective workouts for all fitness levels. The instructors are great. They also have a meal plan and huge recipe section that puts Noom to shame. All for only $29/year! I'm very happy with this purchase and will gladly renew. One suggestion, though. There's an option to favorite in both places. It would be great if you could also add something like "Interested" so you don't lose it in the content.

One of the best (paid) fitness apps that I've tried. I can't speak to the free version, but at 30 USD a year, it's a steal. The one thing about the app that drives me nuts however, is that if you start a program on any day but a Monday, it doesn't allow you to access all the workouts for the week. (i.e., starting on a Wednesday won't allow you to access 2 of that week's workouts). Why this is a feature, I have no idea, and I really wish they'd change this. Otherwise, love it.

I love the app and even signed up for pro so I could cast to my tv. It is affordable and customizable. I did take 2 stars away because it still is not able to connect to my Samsung watch which means that most of my value are not accurate since I don't always remember to grab my phone. When I try to connect my watch, it leads me to an app that is not compatible with any Samsung device I own.

This is a decent app for a free version, but I was disappointed when I paid for it. I didn't know it wouldn't work with my devices until after I paid for it. It insinuated that it would connect to my TV, and it did not. It also says it connects to your Fitbit, but that isn't as true as it should be either. It needs to be the correct Fitbit, not the app and not many devices.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Could you please email us at support@fitonapp.com with the email you're using with FitOn? We appreciate you updating your review once you have been helped. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: App is designed to constantly distract you with all sorts of new stuff getting thrown at you. It's definitely not made for anyone trying to stick to a program and actually finish it in a structured way. It is very difficult to find a program that fits your needs and impossible to resume a program where you left it off. Not to mention, there are zero programs for anyone with access to full gym equipment.

So many workouts don't show up when you search them by name, which is detrimental to a workout. Most exercises and stretches don't start until an entire minute in. I literally have to turn the volume off during most stretches bc the instructors NEVER STOP TALKING and congratulating you on 'making it to the mat' or 'the benefits of stretching', making it frustrating to go back to videos.

I really like that the app has endless workout options of all different genres to suit your needs as well as meals and additional wellness information. I really wish the workouts/programs included a breakdown of the specific exercises, like other fitness apps, so those trying to avoid specific moves could know beforehand.

I really love this app, especially that it's free for public use but that you have the option to subscribe and get added benefits. The one drawback I have about the app is that when I input workouts outside of the app, e.g. an Elliptical workout, a run, etc., it only lets you enter whole numbers for the time, not seconds, e.g. 9min 5 sec etc. I hope that can be added in the future as I have come to like logging my workouts in the app as helps in keeping me motivated and more consistentüòå

I initially enjoyed this app's free workouts, but the update of paying a subscription for casting to the TV is a significant drawback. For those who prefer a larger screen while exercising, this is a frustrating limitation. That said, the workouts themselves are engaging, fun, and offer a dynamic variety. If you're willing to pay a subscription, this app could become a valuable addition to your fitness routine.

Most free apps are just a ploy to get you to buy the helpful parts of the app, or loaded with commercials. This isn't. Tons of free videos with great instructors. You can set daily reminders, and customize you recommendations. If you decide to add the meal planning option, it's only $30 a YEAR! This is an amazing app.

I love the workouts and trainers! However, the Roku app's search functionality needs improvement. When searching for specific workouts by title, they often don't appear, even with correct spelling. Searching by category, trainer, etc., also doesn't yield results. I hope you can enhance the search feature to make it easier to find specific workouts. Thank you!

I read the reviews, and there were many that said how wonderful all the FREE workouts were, yet I just went through all the workouts, and NOT ONE was free. I could only access them by signing up for a Pro membership. Great example of a "bait and switch" app. If you're looking for a great free fitness video, don't waste your time downloading this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Could you please email us at support@fitonapp.com with the email you're using with FitOn? We appreciate you updating your review once you have been helped. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely LOVE the huge variety of workouts. It is amazing that they are free. You can even set up a program for yourself under the free plan. I just paid for Pro and I am somewhat disappointed. The meals all look amazing, not overly complicated, but they do not provide macros. I was really hoping to reduce the amount of work on my part for tracking macros, as it can be very time consuming, especially with recipes.

I absolutely love this app! I've been searching for a very long time to find a great at home workout video app and could never find one that didn't cost a lot of money. This app has the workout videos with great directions on how to do each move, you can also set up a program to help you either lose weight or build more muscle (whatever your body goals are) and it's FREE!!!! I have been using this app since January and it's the first time that I haven't given up on working out in months!

Variety of quality exercises and training styles available, means you can get what you need and in a length of time that works for you. The thing holding me back from truly reccommendeding and committing to a paid plan is the fact that the audio is SO QUIET. Like at times, barely audible with my phone volume all the way. It means you have to constantly look at the phone and rewind to get the timing in right. If they increased the video playback volume, this app would be perfect

Great workout app. I have downloaded other workout apps over the years but could never get into them. This one really appealed to me, so I was determined to use it and I'm glad I did. Great variety of workout videos. I bought the premium version because I saw people say you needed that to cast to a TV. It was only $30 for a year so I found it quite worth the money. Thanks for a fantastic app that is getting me off the couch!

Its a great way to exercise! Wherever you are coming from, the app helps get you from where you are to where you want to be - health wise. Streaming is great and clear, and I love how it creates a plan around MY schedule! Highly recommend if you're looking for a way to exercise more (with your favorite types of workouts, might I add), and trying to live a healthier life.

This is the best workout app ever! Heck the best app ever! Well done! One thing is I wish they would allow a filter by time. Sometimes I just have 10 minutes and I want to see what's available. Sometimes I have 30 + minutes what are my options? Also I wish they had a filter by equipment: bands, weights, or no equipment needed.

I'm IN LOVE with FitOn. The UI is so easy to navigate, i love that i can do just a bite size, 10 minute workout or up the ante to a 20 or 30 minute one. Makes getting excercise in as much as i need/want it easy. There's so much variety in the workouts too! I get bored easily having a set workout routine and this helps keep it fun and interesting. All kinds of lessons, for all kinds of workouts, at all levels, minimal or no equipement required. Just.. üòçüòçüòç THANK YOU üí™

Overall, this is a really good workout tool. At least in my opinion this is way better than workouts by yourself. The trainers are knowledgeable and push you further than you want. You can either go with their plan or customize your own workouts. Streaming has paused on me a few times but it has never crashed on me. Workouts are so varied, with lots of options for targeting, intensity, and time limits. Overall it's just a lot of quality for a free app. Really recommend anyone try it out.

I HATE working out. I hate trying to think of workouts and knowing how to do it correctly. This app has changed it for me. I LOVE LOVE LOVE working out now. Its easy to schedule the workouts so i dont forget, save my favorite workouts, and i love that they have different options for workouts. Tons to choose from. Will use this app forever.

This is the best workout app I've ever used. It has a great variety of workout videos in many different categories. I like the yoga and Pilates videos because those types of workouts are better guided than on your own. It also allows you to "favorite" workouts so you can keep track of the ones you like and it keeps track of ones you've completed. I didn't upgrade to Pro. The free version gives me everything I'm looking for.

Just rating off my first weeks experience. So far so good. Its convenient for people who may not have workout equipment. The instructors show how to modify workouts to make them easier. The only thing I've needed were dumbells which i do have a pair, but could have easily used something else if i didnt. Workouts are fun and quick and really make you feel it! Love it so far!

I've been doing Fit On for 5 weeks and have lost roughly 20lbs so far. As a person who is chronically depressed, I'm glad that many of the videos focus on mental health and modifying positions so they coincide with your current fitness level. Up until now, I have been very discouraged doing workouts because they didn't feel right for me. Fit On fixes that by asking what you enjoy doing, what your goals are, and offers a legitimately free program to help you get there at a healthy pace.

Amazing fitness app until they started charging for more and more features. My biggest suggestion is to allow users to find and connect with contacts from Instagram and Facebook instead of just phone contacts. I have Instagram followers who want to join me in challenges in the app, but we can't connect because I don't have their phone number or email.

First things first.. I'm not being paid to write this. This app is amazing! It has so many options to choose from. I haven't actually done a serious work out in about 6 years, so when it offered beginners workouts I jumped at the idea! It keeps everything at a great pace and I was able to make it from start to finish. 10/10 would recommend!!!!!

I love how FitOn is free and inclusive for everyone. I also like how you get to work out with friends and how the trainers talk to you and motivate you through the videos! One complaint I have is that I'm a beginner and I have trouble navigating the interface and finding the workouts that would best suit me as I start out, because some of the ones I've tried are physically demanding and I'm not ready yet. Otherwise, I highly recommend this app!

Best free workout app ever. Ever. You get to choose the style and intensity of your workouts and they're fun! The calendar that tracks your workouts, the challenges you can sign up for, the reward tokens you get, it's all just more inspiratione to keep going! I've been able to workout 5-7 days a week at my own pace and without feeling guilty if I miss a day. I couldn't say enough good things about this app. It has been amazing for my mental and physical health.

My previous experience with this was lovely and I'm hoping to devote my time into this. This was and still is a great way to control my stress and emotions and just go with the flow with your instructor in these workouts. Not only am I losing weight but I can release any and all stress I've had throughout the day. I really really love this free app. Keep up the good work FitOn!

Best Free Workout App out there! I've been using this app for a week now and I love it! I used to use Nike Training Co App but when i had to pay for a majority of the workouts I quit. This App inputs ur body info and your fitness goals & how many workouts you want a week. Then it creates a "playlist" of workouts for your week. But if you don't like those, there's a HUGE selection to choose from instead. You can target certain muscle groups, or pick specific forms of exercise. Love!!

I love this app!!! I've recommended it to so many friends over time! The workouts are. Videos of people with REAL personality and they are fun! I've gotten bored and didnt wanna do my workouts with other apps until I found this! There are so many options to pick from yoga, abs, arms, legs, hitt, stretching and so much moreeeeee! Just give it a try it's free! There are purchases if you wanna buy extra then the basic app but I dont pay for it I love just the workouts!

Used to love this app. I have a bunch of reminders and there are ads for the free version, which I don't mind. It used to be that the app. would take you directly to the exercise, once passed the ad(s), but now after the ad you are taken to the general screen and have to dig for the missed exercise. Maybe it's a new way to force into a paid subscription but it's very annoying and I consider remove the app. altogether.

I absolutely love this app. There are so many workouts and the variety is insane. I especially love the meditation options and the low impact cardio workouts. I love that you can schedule your workouts and I love the motivational quotes as you sign into the app for the first time that day. Or each new time really. I love the instructors, especially Kente, Sydney, & Deandre. Can go on and on. It's so awesome. Keep it going!

I LOVE this app! It's easy to use, and has great workouts of all kinds for all levels. It allows you to set goals that are actually attainable, so you don't have to set a 30 day challenge and then feel bad for missing a day! I have mine set for 2-3 workouts a week, at 5-10 minute lengths. It then suggests workouts that meet my criteria, and they are different each week. You can also search through their databases of workouts to find the perfect one. ü•∞

I love this app! It makes fitness accessible to everyone. You can set small goals or big ones. You can choose high energy or low impact options...AND the workouts are broken into categories and are easily searchable. The trainers are personable and encouraging. My favorite part is the 'at work' workouts. These are short, less than 5 mins, that help you stretch and move during your work day. You can have the app send you notifications to remind to move. And it's free!

I found this app during quarantine when I needed a little something different. You can only do so much yoga and running before you need a change. I really like all of the different types of exercises from yoga to HITT to barre. Most of the instructors are really good at giving modifications so if you are new to fitness this is a great app. If you well into your fitness journey don't worry they usually give advanced level instruction to.

Great app. Really free. If you're one of those people who gets sucked into the duolingo challenges, this app will help you finish a workout. The only ad I've seen so far is for the paid pro version which would allow a user to use their Fitbit to track their heartrate and get a higher score. I got an email about using Fitbit and Garmin with pro but only Fitbit shows up as an option in the app.

A free, ad-free fitness app! It's great and I love that the app can create a program to help with fitness; granted it's not a daily workout plan of multiple videos, but it does provide a simple plan to follow and a community of support. The app also provides emails of tips to help meet fitness goals. I love sharing this app with other women I know to use it for fitness on their time.

I love the variety of workouts that it offers. It walks you through everything with fantastic instructors. Best part is it's completely free! I've been looking for a good work out app that is free and this is definitely it! It keeps me motivated when I see my progress and challenges to complete for the week. It makes picking a workout to do easy (it does all the work for me!) I've lost weight and gained muscle. I love this app and will continue to use it for the foreseeable future. Thanks fiton!

I love the options for free! There is so much to choose from when it comes to work outs. I like that they're organized by categories targeting different muscle groups. Some trainers are better than others. I like to repeat the same workouts till I get the hang of it and listen to my own music. I don't see why paying for the pro membership can make it any better besides the fact that you can sync your smart watch device and app.

I really like the workouts and instructors, however this app has to be the most buggy and horribly designed thing I've ever used. To the devs, shame on you! You implement a party workout mode to allow us to video call and workout, but you don't allow us to restart the workout or add time to the count down if the other person doesn't make it in time?? The number of times I have had to change the workout because one of us had issues getting the app to load or missed the text is appalling!

Love it!! It keeps me motivated by having a log of the activities that I complete as well as such a variety of activities for me to choose from! If I feel I need something less aggressive one day, I can just choose a shorter or lower intensity workout and I still get moving rather than just skip the workout completely! Often though, once I start, I feel so good after the first workout, I jump right into a second! The trainers are great at pushing you to try to reach your max! Thank you Fit On!!

In love! App provides a wide variety of exercises and can be tailored to your fitness needs. Happy I found this free app! UPDATE: Almost one year in now, and I still rate this app at 5 stars üåü üåü üåü üåü üåü It really gives you so many options and with meditation sessions added it really is my only go to app for mindfulness and fitness. You cannot go wrong with trying the app out because it's free. You can always uninstall if it doesn't meet your standards.

I absolutely love this app. Instructor led workouts from 11 - 30 mins long with varying difficulties. And it's FREE!!! You can sign up for daily classes and get notified when it's time to work out or you can choose from a library of other workouts depending on your goals. They offer strength, HIIT, core, cardio, barre and countless others to choose from. Did I mention that I love it AND it's FREE!!! Do yourself a favor and get off your butt. You'll be glad you did!

I LOVE THIS APP! So easy to use and navigate and endless workouts so you never get bored with the same workout! I recommend this app to everyone I know. It really is free!! The only complaint I have is for the last week I haven't been able to cast the workout onto my TV?? Have been able to make do with casting it from my laptop. But it would be easier to cast from my phone.

The workouts are female focused. Light weight, booty, toning. Even tried to customize my workout plan and was really disappointed about the workouts I was given. A lot of confusing movements and technical workouts. The app is designed well and free. It looks clean and relatively easy to use. not for guys trying to build muscle. I don't like that almost all these workouts are short and light. I could hardly break a sweat and felt like I wasn't being challenged.

Amazing app! Dont get how its free lol. Love how it's set up, very intuitive and easy to use. love also how you can join live classes and invite friends to compete with you. It has such a wide range of classes and sets it up so you can easily choose which type and intensity you want. I got it right after having a baby so I like that I am still working my way up and building in intensity as I heal. Just download it and u wont regret it!

The free content is really solid stuff. At this point I've done maybe 6 classes. 3 of the classes absolutely kicked my butt. It was so good I implemented some of the exercises and format into treatment sessions with my own patients (I'm a physical therapist). The other 3 classes were were rated as less intense and more restorative which was absolutely on point. I've implented the short cool down routines before bed time and they are perfect. So many good things about this app.

Great! I was skeptical of this free workout app. I was looking for the hidden fees. The really terrible half workouts that you need to buy a subscription in order to do the rest of the workout. FORTUNATELY for me their was none of that! They have great workouts and stretches depending on what you are looking for. Also they have PRE AND POST NATAL WORKOUTS!!! That in its self it's hard to find in a workout app let alone one that has everything!! I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS APP!

title: Dave: Credit, Cash & Money App
description:
Take your finances to the next level with Dave.  

Dave Membership Information

1-Dave is not a bank. Banking services provided by Evolve Bank and Trust, Member FDIC, or another partner bank, which issues the Dave Debit Card through a license from Mastercard¬Æ. ExtraCash amounts range from $25-$500, typically approved in 5 min, with an overdraft fee equal to the greater of $5 or 5%. Multiple overdrafts may be required. Not all members qualify for ExtraCash and few qualify for $500. ExtraCash is repayable on demand. Must open an ExtraCash overdraft deposit account and Dave Checking account. Up to $5 monthly membership fee for ExtraCash, Income Opportunity Services, and Financial Management Services. Optional 1.5% fee for external debit card transfers.

UP TO $500 IN 5 MIN OR LESS(1)
You could pocket up to $500(1)  with ExtraCash‚Ñ¢. There‚Äôs no credit check, interest, or late fees. 

EXTRACASH‚Ñ¢ 101
ExtraCash‚Ñ¢ offers the ability to get up to $500.(1) The amount of money you can take (your eligibility) refreshes daily. We determine your eligibility using several data points‚Äîlike  your income history, spending patterns, and at least 3 recurring deposits. When you take ExtraCash‚Ñ¢, you‚Äôll agree to a settlement date to pay your outstanding balance. 

ACCESS YOUR CASH INSTANTLY(2)
Get up to $500 when you download Dave, link a bank account, open your Dave Checking  and ExtraCash‚Ñ¢ accounts, & transfer it to your Dave Checking account. Your Dave Debit Mastercard¬Æ gives you instant, direct access to your money for hassle-free spending.

EARN 4.00% APY(3)
Add money to your Dave Checking account or Goals account to grow your cash with this high annual percentage yield. Managing your money with Dave & online banking makes saving simple. 

GET PAID EARLY
Get your paycheck up to 2 days early when you set up direct deposit.(4) A Dave Checking account streamlines your online banking experience, ensuring your money is available when you need it. A Dave Checking account makes handling money stress-free.

SAY GOODBYE TO PESKY FEES
Ditch hidden fees with Dave. You can even skip ATM fees at 40K+ MoneyPass ATMs.(5) Your Dave debit card keeps your money accessible without added costs. A Dave Checking account ensures you can withdraw your money anytime without excessive fees. 

SAVE EFFORTLESSLY
Own your savings journey with a Goals account. Set up recurring deposits to build your savings steadily. Online banking through Dave simplifies saving your money for your future. The Checking account allows you to manage your money & expenses easily, keeping you connected to your savings at all times.

MAKE MONEY ON THE SIDE
Explore our Side Hustle board & easily apply for part-time roles, gig jobs, remote work, & more. Take Surveys that pay out instantly to your Dave Checking account. A debit card linked to your Checking account ensures you have quick access to your money, allowing you to track & transfer money effortlessly.

OUR MEMBERSHIP FEE
There‚Äôs a small monthly membership fee that gives you full access to our features, including ExtraCash‚Ñ¢, Goals, & Surveys.(1) With Dave, you can monitor your money 24/7 & make transactions securely.

HAVE MORE QUESTIONS?
Send us an email at support@dave.com.

Disclosures related to the Dave app:

2-Express fees apply to select instant transfers.

3-Rates accurate as of 10/01/2024. The interest rates and annual percentage yields (APY) are variable and may change at any time at our discretion. No minimum deposit or minimum balance requirements. Fees could reduce earnings on the account.

4-Early access to direct deposit funds depends on timing and availability of the payroll files sent from the payer. These funds can be available up to 2 business days in advance of the scheduled payment date.

5-Out of network fees may apply.

General Terms
See the Dave Checking Deposit Agreement and Disclosures, Dave Goals Deposit Agreement and Disclosures, and the Dave ExtraCash‚Ñ¢ Deposit Agreement and Disclosures for account terms and fees.
descriptionHTML:
Take your finances to the next level with Dave.

Dave Membership Information

1-Dave is not a bank. Banking services provided by Evolve Bank and Trust, Member FDIC, or another partner bank, which issues the Dave Debit Card through a license from Mastercard¬Æ. ExtraCash amounts range from $25-$500, typically approved in 5 min, with an overdraft fee equal to the greater of $5 or 5%. Multiple overdrafts may be required. Not all members qualify for ExtraCash and few qualify for $500. ExtraCash is repayable on demand. Must open an ExtraCash overdraft deposit account and Dave Checking account. Up to $5 monthly membership fee for ExtraCash, Income Opportunity Services, and Financial Management Services. Optional 1.5% fee for external debit card transfers.

UP TO $500 IN 5 MIN OR LESS(1)
You could pocket up to $500(1) with ExtraCash‚Ñ¢. There‚Äôs no credit check, interest, or late fees.

EXTRACASH‚Ñ¢ 101
ExtraCash‚Ñ¢ offers the ability to get up to $500.(1) The amount of money you can take (your eligibility) refreshes daily. We determine your eligibility using several data points‚Äîlike your income history, spending patterns, and at least 3 recurring deposits. When you take ExtraCash‚Ñ¢, you‚Äôll agree to a settlement date to pay your outstanding balance.

ACCESS YOUR CASH INSTANTLY(2)
Get up to $500 when you download Dave, link a bank account, open your Dave Checking and ExtraCash‚Ñ¢ accounts, & transfer it to your Dave Checking account. Your Dave Debit Mastercard¬Æ gives you instant, direct access to your money for hassle-free spending.

EARN 4.00% APY(3)
Add money to your Dave Checking account or Goals account to grow your cash with this high annual percentage yield. Managing your money with Dave & online banking makes saving simple.

GET PAID EARLY
Get your paycheck up to 2 days early when you set up direct deposit.(4) A Dave Checking account streamlines your online banking experience, ensuring your money is available when you need it. A Dave Checking account makes handling money stress-free.

SAY GOODBYE TO PESKY FEES
Ditch hidden fees with Dave. You can even skip ATM fees at 40K+ MoneyPass ATMs.(5) Your Dave debit card keeps your money accessible without added costs. A Dave Checking account ensures you can withdraw your money anytime without excessive fees.

SAVE EFFORTLESSLY
Own your savings journey with a Goals account. Set up recurring deposits to build your savings steadily. Online banking through Dave simplifies saving your money for your future. The Checking account allows you to manage your money & expenses easily, keeping you connected to your savings at all times.

MAKE MONEY ON THE SIDE
Explore our Side Hustle board & easily apply for part-time roles, gig jobs, remote work, & more. Take Surveys that pay out instantly to your Dave Checking account. A debit card linked to your Checking account ensures you have quick access to your money, allowing you to track & transfer money effortlessly.

OUR MEMBERSHIP FEE
There‚Äôs a small monthly membership fee that gives you full access to our features, including ExtraCash‚Ñ¢, Goals, & Surveys.(1) With Dave, you can monitor your money 24/7 & make transactions securely.

HAVE MORE QUESTIONS?
Send us an email at support@dave.com.

Disclosures related to the Dave app:

2-Express fees apply to select instant transfers.

3-Rates accurate as of 10/01/2024. The interest rates and annual percentage yields (APY) are variable and may change at any time at our discretion. No minimum deposit or minimum balance requirements. Fees could reduce earnings on the account.

4-Early access to direct deposit funds depends on timing and availability of the payroll files sent from the payer. These funds can be available up to 2 business days in advance of the scheduled payment date.

5-Out of network fees may apply.

General Terms
See the Dave Checking Deposit Agreement and Disclosures, Dave Goals Deposit Agreement and Disclosures, and the Dave ExtraCash‚Ñ¢ Deposit Agreement and Disclosures for account terms and fees.

scraped_reviews.content: They have much better support than they used to. BIG plus. My only real gripe with the app now is that I risked an overdraft at my bank when the advance settlement occurred. Was a good service until they changed their policies. Now you pay the membership fee and $10 to withdraw. They split your advance into 2, and each withdrawal fee is $5 each. So, if your advance was say $200 you can get $100 first, plus pay the $5 fee. Then you can get the other $100 and pay another $5 fee. This doesn't improve the customer's experience. It just fills the pockets of the app's investors with more money without any benefit to the user. Pure greed.

title: ProCCD - Digital Film Camera
description:
ProCCD is an analog digital camera application. We have carefully reproduced the classic appearance of CCD digital cameras and the unique interface of pixel style, with CCD camera-inspired vintage filter effects, striving to restore the most authentic shooting experience. It can also serve as photo and video editor as you can import and edit them with retro presets and advanced tools.
 
#Chic cam & 90s vibe aesthetic editing app 
- Z30: Rich colors & lofi quality make it suitable for various scenes.
- IXUS95: The color is slightly greenish when the light is dark, with a disposable camera feel.
- U300: The cool, transparent blue-green tones give the photos a melancholy ee35 film atmosphere, with excellent color performance for scenes such as seawater and sky.
- M532: Low color saturation and slight fading effect give photos a nostalgic prequel vibe. Suitable for portraits and outdoor shooting on sunny days.
- New cameras for foodies, DCR and dazz cam will be released! Take you back to 1988. The 80s & 2000s Y2k aesthetic fashion style is ready for you.
 
#Professional features that unleash creativity
- Record videos with lomography oldroll filters, dsco inst sqc and light leaks. HD quality like raw camera is available.
- Fully adjustable camera parameters such as ISO, exposure compensation, and color saturation. White balance and shutter speed are also available. You can create a dazz VHS style picture with an ee35-style vignette and grain, make photo vintage.
- Classic timestamp to present the nostalgic feel. Various dispo styles are available. You can also customize the date as you like.
- The viewfinder previews the effect in real-time, what you see is what you get.
- Turn on the flash to record your perfect moment.
- Support timed shooting and flip lens.
- Choose unique photo filters and frames to add a vintage ee35 film look to your content in the white album.
- Collage layouts and templates for any mood and aesthetic in different shapes and styles, and make creative d3d stories.

#Advanced Editing Tools
- Batch import pics & videos. Add nomo aesthetics filters to present polaroid feel with one click.
- Crop videos to different ratios and trim your videos.
- Record 35mm sweet filmm with photo timer, use lens buddy to take a selfie.
 
Whether you are a disposable camera lover or a polaroid lover, we recommend you try CCD digital camera now. Record those wonderful moments with ProCCD now!

title: Starfall
description:
Starfall¬Æ fun activities, games, and songs includes reading, math, music, and more ‚Äì read, learn, and play preschool to fifth grade. Includes free and subscriber content.

Starfall provides an Enhanced Accessible Index for children with visual, hearing, or mobility impairments. For more information, please contact Customer Service at (+1) 303-417-6414.

Join Zac the Rat¬Æ and his friends on an exciting learning journey, starting with the ABCs and 123s and advancing up to grade 5 grammar and mathematics. Starfall's playful open format intuitively guides children through sequential learning objectives for reading, math, art, music, and social subjects like kindness and caring.

*Highlights*

*Reading (phonics, fluency, grammar) -- ABCs, Learn to Read, I‚Äôm Reading, Talking Library, Punctuation, Parts of Speech
*Math -- Numbers, Addition and Subtraction, Multiplication and Division, Geometry and Measurement, Fractions
*More -- Holiday Activities, Nursery Rhymes, Sing-Alongs, Interactive Calendar 

*Why Starfall*

*Research based, teacher tested, child approved. Starfall's systematic approach was created by experienced educators using time-tested instructional methods.
*Try it for free. All of the basics for learning how to read are available to everyone.
*No advertisements. Whether a free user or subscriber, you won‚Äôt see any ads.
*Pass it forward! Subscribers gain access to hundreds of additional activities and support the free sections for others to enjoy.

*What people are saying about Starfall*

Listed on PC Magazine‚Äôs ‚Äú15 best Online Learning Services for Kids,‚Äù Think Five‚Äôs ‚ÄúTop 5 Most Used Apps by Elementary Teachers,‚Äù and as one Parent's Magazine's "70 Best Apps for Families."  

"Kids can learn about letter recognition, phonics, and reading. Skill acquisition is appropriately gradual... Starfall does an excellent job of offering clear and intriguing early literacy lessons." ‚ÄîCommon Sense Media

‚ÄúI truly believe that Starfall set the foundation for my future.‚Äù
‚ÄìSarah, undergraduate at Stanford University

*Subscription information*

If you choose to purchase a Starfall subscription, a $5.99 (USD) payment will be applied to your Google Play account upon confirmation of purchase and monthly after that. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. This subscription is valid only for home use on devices signed in to your Google Play account. Google Play does not support Family Library or family payment methods for in-app subscription purchases.

*Additional Info*

This app requires an internet connection and is intended for Pre-K, Kindergarten, and Grades 1-5. It also supports English language development, special education, and homeschool environments.

Privacy Policy: https://teach.starfall.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://teach.starfall.com/terms
About Starfall: https://teach.starfall.com/about
Starfall Education Foundation is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.

‚ÄúI truly believe that Starfall set the foundation for my future.‚Äù
‚ÄìSarah, undergraduate at Stanford University

*Subscription information*

If you choose to purchase a Starfall subscription, a $5.99 (USD) payment will be applied to your Google Play account upon confirmation of purchase and monthly after that. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. This subscription is valid only for home use on devices signed in to your Google Play account. Google Play does not support Family Library or family payment methods for in-app subscription purchases.

*Additional Info*

This app requires an internet connection and is intended for Pre-K, Kindergarten, and Grades 1-5. It also supports English language development, special education, and homeschool environments.

Privacy Policy: https://teach.starfall.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://teach.starfall.com/terms
About Starfall: https://teach.starfall.com/about
Starfall Education Foundation is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.
summary: Starfall offers numerous activities. Become a subscriber to access all content.

scraped_reviews.content: THE BEST educational app for kids! Worth the price, will actually teach your kid(s) while also keeping them entertained. You need to guide them a bit, but it's fun to do if you have the patience w/ your kids. Don't hesitate, buy a subscription! You wont regret it! No pesky ads, not even in the free version! If I could give a better rating than 5 I would. I bought the subscription thru Google Play bc I couldn't afford the yearly one rn, but the yearly is way cheaper. Will buy a yearly one asap!

With other apps she either wasn't being challenged whatsoever, or she would get frustrated because she couldn't do it on her own.

scraped_reviews.content: Ok starfall is literally THE BEST- it lets u customize ur characters, and lets u learn about the human body!!! and decorate ur room! This good as it encourages my sister to work,but it would be good if you could have a parents control in which you can lock certain activities for learning and unlock as a reward.Without , this it's inconvenient since my sister keeps secretly going to where she can dress up her character and the games for the higher years, so most of the time, she's not doing any real learning. I have used Starfall in the classroom for years! I love it and best of all...the students love it! It's very easy to use. I always recommend Starfall to parents at home (especially those struggling academically). I have paid $35 for years & it has NEVER gone up & that is cheap compared to other learning apps! I have used it at home with my kids since they were toddlers & they still love it! (Now 5 & 7 yrs)

Wonderful App with lots to do.it is user-friendly, my children can navigate it themselves without help. Information ranges from preschool up to third grade. Instrumental in teaching my children to read. 2022 update: they've added a 4th and fifth grade section, which I am grateful for. It is not as challenging for my 5th grader as I had hoped, and it has a few small glitches still that I'm sure they will iron out with time. So glad they expanded into the higher grade levels!

I was looking for an educational app for the 4yr old and the teens all said Starfall. I'm having trouble finding out how much it costs to get full access however she uses it everyday. I started on the Starfall website when my daughter was just shy of four, to work on her fine motor skills.  She loved it, her next sister loved it, then her brother... I wasn't sure he paid attention to it at all.  He played the games, especially the word builder machine, but it was like pulling teeth to get him to do letter practice or sound things out in public.  (or numbers, or colors, or....) Well, when he was nearly five, I walked past his room and heard him "reading" a Garfield comic.  I politely asked my husband when he'd started doing Garfield books as the bedtime story.  He looked confused and said he never had done such. ...the toot had taught himself to read from watching his sisters, and from playing the word-forming game.   We're a really booky family, we read for FUN, and that was pretty dang impressive.

We love this program! Thoroughly covers reading and math from pre-k level up to elementary. There is also some science and music and educational games mixed in. We are using it for our 4 year old in conjunction with work books and flash cards. I can't say enough good things about Starfall!

I would give this app 5 stars but I lowered it because of the new prices. I had paid for it for several years but I let it lapse for several months. I regret it now. scraped_reviews.content: The subscription is affordble. Its very user friendly for kids. My kids have been using this app for years at home and at school. They love it! For them its a treat to be able to play. It's geared mainly toward Pre-K through 1st grade but they just recently added more content for 2nd and 3rd grade.

We've used starfall for about 5 years now. My daughter learned to read using this program and she still uses it, thanks to the extra grades added, as extra study in our homeschool. My preschooler is using it along with our homeschool studies and loves to sing along with the vowel songs. Hopefully he'll be reading soon too. This is such an excellent program. I love the convenience of the app, but love that I can print worksheets to go along with what we're focusing on as well. Thank you Starfall!

This is a great app. Starfall is a much more affordable option than ABCMouse. This app provides a similar learning platform with different focus areas like alphabet, reading, math, science etc.... . I have renewed my yearly membership multiple times and my kids love learning using Starfall.

My daughter didn't use this app before the age of 4 much... However I kept it available and as soon as she started learning the ABC's and reading sight words in preschool... She fell in love with this app at home! Throughout her kindergarten year this was her go-to favorite "game" along with Kiddopia. She is excelling in all school subjects. Thank you Starfall creators: you've made learning fun for my daughter and I attribute her enjoyment of learning to Starfall's awesome content!

If you (the parent) purchase the Android version, your kid cannot use it on their device application. They aren't transparent with this information and do not issue refunds. Horribly designed purchase process that seems deliberately designed to force you to an annual subscription. ==EDIT== They give a word-vomit reply blaming Google. Netflix is a subscription service but it isn't locked down to one single device. So many other subscriptions are not this DRM crazy. It's a choice, not an accident.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: For purchases made through Google Play, sharing rules are defined by Google and refund requests are processed by Google within 48 hours of your purchase. scraped_reviews.content: I used to play this game in school as a pre-kindergartener and a kindergartener. I stumbled across this again, 12 years later, and remember all the good times. I remember brushing my dolls hair while reading one of the folktales, playing the hippo math game, and it's just very nostalgic now. I miss this and I think schools should bring starfall back for students to play and have a blast like I did and then years later have that sad but happy feeling years later.

basic free game gives you a taste of it. i buy it because it unlocks everything and i can add to the grandparents phone when they are with them in offices bored. my 3 almost 4 loves it and he loves the music. its worth getting. Wi-Fi is making sure its correct and if still maybe update or phone needs updated. i really hope you give this a chance and spend the money sure its $35 but come on people for the whole year!!

What a great educational app! My 9 year old with Autism loves this app. He was using it on his class and loved it so much we bought it for home use. It's totally worth the money. Easy to navigate,games are entertaining and keep him engaged. As an ASD kid that's a huge seller for me as his Mom. He's learning so much everyday. Thanks StarFall!

I do like the app, but I gave it a 3 star rating because I could only create an account for 1 child and not my other children. It makes it inconvenient to have to log on to multiple different accounts or different devices for my other children to enjoy the app.

This is a really good app. My old school used to use it every time we went to the library(I do this know what grade I was in but I was little) Starfall helps with reading, math, and etc! I would recommend this for kids around the age of 4-6.

I just wanted to write this rating to say how thankful I am for the creators of this app. This app perfectly teaches the material necessary for the grade levels listed. I had no problems with this app, in comparison to other apps like iready, for example. If you are looking for the perfect app for an elementary school student, before putting this one down, please try it out.

my daughter had this app and it really taught her alot. it kept her attention and she did use it in school. i would recommend this to anyone who wants there child to have a hand up in kindergarten and beyond.

title: Brawl Stars
description:
Fast-paced 3v3 & 5v5 MOBA and battle royale made for mobile! Play a variety of online PvP arena multiplayer shooting & melee game modes in under three minutes ‚Äì with friends or solo. Unlock and upgrade dozens of Brawlers with powerful super abilities, star powers and gadgets! Collect unique skins to stand out and show off.

Battle in multiple game modes

Gem Grab (3v3,5v5): Team up for realtime 3v3 and 5v5 MOBA arena PvP battle royales against online players from across the world. Team up to battle and out strategize against the opposing team. Collect and hold 10 gems to win, but get fragged and lose your gems. Showdown: A MOBA battle royale-style fight for survival. Collect powerups for your Brawler. Grab a friend or play solo, be the last Brawler standing in the rowdiest MOBA PvP battle royale yet. Winner takes all! Brawl Ball (3v3,5v5): It's a whole new brawl game! Show off your soccer/football skills and score before the other team. Maybe it‚Äôs not the kind of ‚Äúshooting‚Äù you meant when you were looking for a multiplayer shooting game... but there are no red cards here ‚Äì just PvP team fun. Bounty (3v3,5v5): Battle royale bounty-hunting! Take out opponents and earn stars, but don‚Äôt let them pick you off first. The squad with the most stars wins! Heist (3v3,5v5): Protect your team‚Äôs safe, and try to crack open your opponents‚Äô. Sneak, blast, battle and blow your way clear to enemy treasure in this PvP multiplayer shooting game. Special Events: Limited-time PvE and PvP multiplayer shooting games, 3v3/5v5 matches and battle royale events. Championship Challenge: Join Brawl Stars' esports scene with in-game qualifiers.

Unlock and upgrade Brawlers

Collect and upgrade Brawlers with powerful Super abilities, star powers and gadgets! Level up and collect unique skins. Send them into PvP & battle royale games to collect trophies!

Brawl pass

Win 3v3 and 5v5 PvP matches and battle royale games to earn trophies. Get Gems, Power Points, Pins, and Starr Drops! Fresh content every season.

Become a star player

Battle in 3v3 & 5v5 PvP matches and battle royale-style games to climb the PvP leaderboards & prove you‚Äôre the greatest MOBA Brawler of them all! Join or start your own MOBA club with fellow players online to share tips and battle together. Climb to the top of the PvP leaderboards in global and local multiplayer shooting game rankings.

Constantly evolving MOBS

Look out for new Brawlers, skins, maps, special events and game modes in the future. Customize Brawlers with unlockable skins. Enjoy 3v3 and 5v5 PvP battles solo or with friends online. New PvP events and multiplayer shooting games daily. Player-designed maps offer challenging new terrain to master. Please note! Brawl Stars is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Game also includes random rewards. From the makers of Clash of Clans, Clash Royale, and Boom Beach! Notice of Access Permission: [Optional permission] Brawl Stars may request permission via in game pop ups to access your camera and send you notifications. Camera: For in game scanning of QR codes Notifications: For sending notifications related to the game Consent is optional and you can use the app and play the game regardless of whether or not you consent. You may refuse to give consent within the game. However, certain app features may not work properly if you refuse optional access permissions. Support: Contact us in game via Settings > Help and Support, or visit http://help.supercellsupport.com/brawlstars/en/index.html Privacy Policy: http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/ Terms of Service: http://supercell.com/en/terms-of-service/ Parent‚Äôs Guide: http://supercell.com/en/parents/ ???: https://www.youtube.com/wkbrl

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game. I play it all the time eith my friends and is a blast. But a couple of things I would change is the probability of the Starr drops. I hate getting the legendary or mythic Starr drops and getting coins or something. And thats also an issue too. I feel like you cant get coins and power points very easily. but other than that, great game.

This game is one of the stupidest games ever. Here's my point: A bunch of the characters are way too overpowered, items in the shop are sooooo overpriced (for a mobile game!), and once you get to a high enough level, your game will put you on a team that sucks and put you against players that are using way too powerful characters... Don't recommend playing this game... it's a waste of your time, money, and life. If you are going to play it, play private games with your friends! It's pretty fun.

It's really fun to play and learn how good the characters are as you play. And another thing i like about brawl stars is that all the updates and cool skins and games modes to put in and it's super fun to try and earn more and more. For all those haters out there who think it's a pay to win game, it's not, your just spending your own money on things you can earn while playing.

It's really fun I just get kinda raigbaited when I can't move bc everyone keeps attacking me in it. But I really enjoy it tbh. 8/10 definitely would recommend to anyone looking for a fun game to play with no ads. Also you don't need wifi to play, so that's a plus. If you like a challenge, this game is for you. If you get mad really easily, maybe find something else, but still give this a try.

Overall, great game! my friends convinced me to play it and it is actually pretty good. the updates are frequent so it is fresh when you play with friends. Many brawlers to unlock plus there is a lot of strategy involved. However it has some issues, some brawlers are just pay to win and have outrageous prices up to 50 dollars like what. Also gems one of the most valuable currencies has like no value. sometimes you also have way more power pts than coins or the other way around. Still i recommend

Brawl Stars is truly a masterpiece! My only complain is about the bad randoms and how often I play with them, carrying the match all by myself. A game that relies on cooperation with your teammates should have a more balanced pick of players, both in the enemy team and your team. In my opinion the gameplay feels really unfair when the enemy team clearly seems to coordinate better than your team. Overall the game is still nice and fresh and never fails to disappoint. Very recommended!

Everything about the game is good except the matchmaking. I'm a 85k trophy player and no matter what mode I play I for some reason always get players at 10k trophies or even lower and it's so frustrating because there's virtually no mode that I can play except solo. Gameplay itself is good, going away from monetization is good, it's really just the matchmaking.

I've been playing this game for years now, and it's been great fun. You can get some of the best characters early on for nothing but play time. There is a marked increase in "bot like" behaviour, where players either don't move, or run to a corner/wall and shoot in a single direction. This is becoming quite a problem now, spoiling a lot of games. Several of my clan have quit, stating on discord that this is one of their main frustrations with "Bad Randoms".

This game is pretty fun to play! I started playing a few days ago and I enjoyed it. However my critiques are that some matches are really uneven. (my team is put up with significantly higher ones) and the game can tend to have the no wifi symbol,even if my wifi is perfectly fine. No forced ads whatsoever. I actually haven't seen a single ad yet. I'm assuming they are for extra resources. Good game to play still and the chat rules aren't overly strict and tagging every word. Great would reccomend

Brawl Stars has simple mechanics, a clear and punchy art style, and quick, fun matches that keep you engaged. However, the matchmaking is infinitely frustrating, often pairing low-level brawlers with much stronger ones, making it feel unfair. The growing number of new brawlers with broken mechanics is also unbalanced. The current roadmap releases too many new brawlers alongside painful event mechanics with the overall impact of making the game feel tired and overextended.

I've played this game since it was in beta.. after all this time, I finally gave up on this game and uninstalled it. The devs don't care about long-term players anymore. The only thing that matters to them is attracting new players. Matchmaking was the final straw. Game after game after game of being paired up with brand new players and bad randoms and losing because you couldn't take on a whole team by yourself. There's nothing fun about feeling frustrated after every match. Time to move on.

Just after maxing out one brawler, the game will automatically turn out to provide matches with extreme wintrading and impossible difficulty along with so called 'network lag'. Uncoordinated bots as 'teammates' in matches is it's another significant 'feature'. Worst matchmaking balance, pay to win brawlers and mechanics, bugs and glitches are forcing progress to decline. Just absolute waste of time.

5 Years of playing and it's still very fun! An Awesome Game for battling with friends and it's not complicated. Needs an improvement on Club events though. It does seem like a lot of the events are getting repetitive and the newer characters are just combined versions of previous ones that are broken and then get nerfed to the Ground. Not too laggy but you definitely need Amazing Internet to play. There are a lot of customization options in this game and many ways to connect through events.

Really fun game that doesn't require heaps of skill which is great for a 51 year old bloke like me. Heaps of cool brawlers to choose from and heaps of special abilities to choose as well. Just a all round fun game! Great idea to have a map of the day where you need to choose the right brawler to have success. Match making at the higher levels could be better is my only concern. A must have game everyone!

Great game, one of the only problems is that the game gets stuck at 92% loading and wouldnt end a match sometimes. another problem is that matchmaking is pretty bad, they kinda fixed it when they reworked the trophy system but my problem is that power levels arent even, whenever i play at a low power level theres almost always one player with a power level 11 brawler playing and i can barely fight them, please make power levels matter in matchmaking until a certain point since it would be unfair

Brawl Stars is extremely fun, and there are many diverse game modes. This game never gets boring and always keeps me entertained. With tons of different maps and unique brawlers, the game experience is always exciting. The only issue is that the game can be really laggy, even when I have perfect internet.

One of the best games i ever laid my hands upon. The graphics, gameplay, maps, gamemodes everything feels amazing. The rewards are never underwhelming as i get pretty lucky with the drops unlike some unlucky fellows who just blame the game. It has only been like 5-6 months i've been playing and there has never been a dull moment for me. I would recommend this game to play with your friends since it is more fun and ranked is just something u would have to get good at. 5/5

Brawl Stars is a fun and action-packed multiplayer game with unique characters and exciting game modes. The controls are smooth, and frequent updates keep the experience fresh. However, matchmaking can sometimes feel unbalanced, especially for newer players. Adding more solo content and improving the reward system would make progression more enjoyable. Despite these minor issues, it‚Äôs a highly entertaining game that‚Äôs easy to pick up and hard to put down.

Pretty addicting and lovable game. Characters are either incredibly cute, cool, or strange. The gameplay is simple and easy to understand. It isn't a pay to win game, though the "better" brawl pass needs actual money, but that's barely an issue. The star drops are fun to open and get, and its an AMAZING game to play with friends and siblings, definitely reccomend if you have some that dont rage easily.

Great game. I just hit 1000 trophies and the game is pretty balanced. Every character has some really good and really bad matchups. It starts you out at low levels and lets you face easier opponents letting you get trophies and face stronger opponents. I only have 2 complaints. One is that some people unlock brawlers and level them up to Power 11 before starting them in Tiers 1 and 2. It's impossible. The other is that after a bad internet connection, it started another account. Otherwise, great

I used to love this game back in 2021, reinstalled this year to find way too many brawlers with each one having too much customisation, it's one thing to like a customisation for a few favourite ones. But in order to really win you'll have to remember other brawlers and their custom configs. just too much to handle.

Addictive gameplay loop ruined by zero balance to teams. You will be put against maxed brawlers and given a level 6 if you have the audacity to have a winrate above 33%. Unless you are already established, catching up costs money. Free rewards are a joke. Ranked is full of sweats.

I've been playing the game since 2019. It used to be really fun and exciting - especially because of the boxes and the fact that the game itself stayed mostly the same. But ever since they removed the boxes and kept changing things nonstop, constantly adding new brawlers, abilities, collaborations, and rarities, the game has just gotten worse over time. It's not fun anymore, and after more than six years, I finally decided to delete it - and I don't plan on reinstalling it anytime soon.

Was an excellent game few months ago, but now a below standard one. They‚Äôve made the Brawl Pass to pay with real money. That's where the fun was for the F2P players like me, to spend 169 gems in the pass. Now that's costing real money üòû. Also it's lagging for a long time when u r opening the shop. Irritating ! Now it's crossing the limit, won't install the game till they solve the problems. Have been playing the game since 2021, But now have to leave it.

Refund system is plain robbery, I bought the brawl pass and wanted to upgrade so refunded and bought the plus from their online store to find that there was 2800 gems deducted because I refunded 4 dollars item!!! And not just that I didn't get the brawl pass plus for this season When I contact the support they have 1 standard copied reply allover; the game is still playable and you can buy the amount again yeah buy it for over 130$!! If that's not fraud I don't know what is

Been playing the game for the past 3 years or so. I absolutely loved it. it's a perfect game to spend a quick 2 minutes in when waiting for something, and you can spend hours on it as well. But now, it's becoming more and more pay to win, they changed the brawl pass to cost real money now. And any new brawler released is always cracked, which kills free players like us. As for the game in general, the devs are doing a very good job and it's getting continuous updates as well.

Whataheck is going on? Fix this! The connection drops, the game asks to restart, and it restarts normally because the internet here is working fine! Right after it comes back, the connection drops again!! How annoying!!! Fix this! You let these problems happen and then you don't compensate anyone for the inconvenience! You know that 50, 100 coins don't make the slightest difference! Much less a skin or pin! You leeches!

This game is insane(Best), actually the only game that was never boring.The graphics are good, I like the different rarities too, and about that keep the Ultra Legendary Rarity alive üòÖü´£?!?Also the trophies, Ranked mode, tier max everything, and my favourite part is the Brawlers.Bro, they're so cool, every one is different too. Monthly events are supercalifragelistic, new skins, abilities, and most importantly bug fixes(no offense). Please make a Collab with Dragon ball zü§ë.SamuraiGokuSan.

With the addition of gadgets and hypercharges, I can't enjoy playing the game, no matter what mode it is. I might be winning a brawl ball match, only for the enemy team to activate their funny purple buttons and instantly turn the tides. Having a button press that gives you this much power is not fun. The temporary events don't do anything to fix the issue either. I'd like the game to be balanced, to have hypercharges reworked, and to have the old masteries back, but that's unlikely to happen.

the game is good and addictive. for a while. after that, it becomes a very long and tedious process to unlock brawlers. my only other issue, then that is some of the events are boring. it's literally just the game with a few new skins (Stranger things event, for example. it's literally just showdown plus, but with card buffs). it feels kinda underwhelming. especially for the "free to play" people

It's really fun, you can play as 95 different brawlers! It's boring how you get resources slowly, but it's kinda cool in the same time because every brawler has a different attack and super and look, Every little detail and mode is really fun. And upgrading your brawlers will make them stronger and you can keep grinding until you level up a brawler level 11. Plus, it's cool that it's really challenging.

I love to play this, but I change devices and now when I try to put my Supercell ID, it doesn't send the number code to my phone, it makes it impossible for me to get my account back :(. I really wish this problem gets fixed cuz I used money on this game and it would be ASHAME if I can't get my account back. PLEASE FIX THIS. Away from that, this is a very good game THAT I CAN'T PLAY ANYMORE.

Cash grab, underdog matchmaking, and connection bugs. Absurd amount of in-game buyable currencies (gems, bling, coins, credits, power points, event points). Despite all the buyable currencies, some content is still locked behind app store purchases. It takes about a year for devs to implement counterplay for new brawlers. Ranked is unplayable once you hit mythic. This is a mobile game, does anyone really have time for 15 minute matches including the time it takes for individual picks and bans?

it's a really addicting game at first and you just want to win as many trophies as you can and collect brawlers.After playing for about 2 years this game I feel like this game is getting low players and is losing the game and I'm rightüòû They make a lot of collars with popular films, series or other games.They have a collab right now with stranger things the moment I am talking. hopefully this game comes back and makes s good game.But the point is that this game is very interesting for me üòÅ.

Unfortunately, from the best mobile game (to me) to a really bad one. Poor and hard to grind resources of progression for free-to-play players, the events are lame and often come with glitches and bugs that make the game really annoying, the matchmaking for ladder and ranked game modes sucks, and the list continues. I don't really play the game for fun anymore. I really want the game to shine. Please fix the game.

I have spend such money and time for this game. now I am giving up on the game for one reason only. the match making sucks. when you just reaching tier match or reaching the next tier in rank. Trust me. They will match you with BOTs that just stand on the stop and shot in your team. Even worst they give you a random that is sooooo bad that you don't even believe it is a real person. it is very frustrating. no more playing and going to Roblox instead.

Completely luck based game when it should require skill. Every event is a joke. Teammates refuse to play or sabotage with no repercussions except for ranked. Stranger things event lets everyone choose 3 upgrades but some are better than others and if you lose before getting all 5 it resets everything making it impossible with some brawlers being able to just 1 shot immediately. Some Brawlers and skins are cool but ridiculous overpowered + unlocking anything with money is ridiculously priced.

Hey! Supercell how are you?,Hope you're doing great. I am facing a very big and serious issue in your new stranger things update. Whenever I try to open your game sometimes, I often face problems in hanging and lagging behind which makes me lose almost every match .I tried to delete almost every game in my phone,cleared my internal storage completely,even tried to play other supercell games but they weren't lagging it was just with Brawlstars and even my wifi working perfectly. Please fix ASAP.

This is super fun it's really entertaining and time-using and a variety of people to pick from but I feel like they should but when you have a legendary or mythic star drop when you get coins and power points you should get more but it's always like 100 power points and 1000 gold and I feel like you should be but I also feel like sometimes it to easy or to hard especially when they put me in a lobby/game and the people just have them maxed out and are way better with more experience pls fix it..

Very fun and competitive game, lots of game modes and events. My only big problem is I always have a delay when I'm playing it sucks because I have to go against other players with zero delay, just destroying me in no time to react. Servers are very far from my location so it causes a delay

I'm been playing the game since 2018 and for the first 4 years, I'm been enjoying the game and in 2023, I I reached 80k trophies, but now they keep changing everything, which have made me lose interest in this game, and Brawl pass only used to cost 169 gems, which was free to play, but now adding all the pay to win features. The company should not be named syoercell instead greedycell

some skins and game environments make the game super choppy (which is fine until there's an event you want to finish or you're playing ranked) and the game doesn't give you any way to play with the graphics or to turn off the couple problematic skins. this is an optimization issue that has been present for years so I'm giving up on it ever being fixed ( and I'm not just gonna buy a new phone to play a mobile game)

the game is great but lately the new Upside Down event has been super frustrating to play. Every time enemies get close, the game suddenly shows the internet symbol and starts lagging ‚Äî it‚Äôs not just occasional, it happens almost every match! It makes it really frustrating to play.

This game was fun in the beginning but playing overtime just becomes a straight pain. Apart from having THE WORST MATCHMAKING OF ANY MOBILE GAME EVER (especially considering I've played many of them and this one is by far the worst), just gets more frustrating playing against brand new broken characters they refuse to balance and just the overall lack of a skill system. This game used to be fun back then now it's just begging for a comeback. Glad this game is slowly dying.

This is an extremely fun game and easily able to progress in, with a wide range of characters fitting almost any specific play style. That said, every time I go to play, 5-6 times out of 10, my game crashes and I have to reload it, which can be very aggravating for me as I have to relaunch it just to be instantly killed. It can also be annoying to my teammates because even though a bot takes my place when I disconnect, it isn't very good, not using my gadget abilities or playing with the team.

Well I have 3 years using this game. Where do I start. Everything is so unique and it's a really fun game, BUT there's a huge problem. The app is always automatically closing and it has been happening for 6 months. I don't know what to do. I have tried every method but nothing has worked. HUGE MISTAKE SUPERCELL. pls fix it EDIT: the automatically closing has been fixed yayayaya

I don't know who this producer is but those beats are fn fire. especially this Halloween one. My favorite ones are this one Ali the alligator, Melody, and most definitely the Mina song. The one before this one was pretty coo too. I would love for y'all to be able to have an easy access playlist so we could hear the jams whenever we like. Also I just got 37 items in my reward box I didn't see the last several items that I received due to the phone shutting off. Is there a way to see what I got?

It's a fantastic game. BUT. With the recent update to XP, I am stuck with 2 extra XP, so I can never have an even number of XP again. This is incredibly frustrating. I don't care if you give me 8 more or take the 2 away, but I WANT AN ROUND NUMBER OF XP

I have played this game for more than 6 years.Initially I played it just casually for fun however as I became better I realised that this game lags way too much . Every game I get insane delay resulting in me not being able to play more than half of the brawlers. So, I request the developer team to fix the server issues like my ping is horrible every game legit making it unplayable. Otherwise the game is good I still play it regularly and even like to watch esports

Started playing in 2022 on my current account and the game has progressed in the best ways but obviously some counters to that, masteries getting removed, the og brawl boxes and not these "new" brawl boxes. Anyways I've played this game to pass time when I'm bored and it's good from that, to distract you from boredom and to really make your eye coordination much better Thanks for everything, Brawl

title: Disney Magic Match 3D
description: Dive into the enchanting world of Disney Magic Match 3D, a captivating puzzle adventure with beloved Disney treasures! Disney Magic Match 3D is a brand-new 3D matching game where you‚Äôll solve captivating Disney puzzles by sorting and collecting iconic items from beloved Disney and Pixar films including Moana, Aladdin and Toy Story. The ancient Disney Book of Magic, filled with iconic artifacts, has been opened, releasing a whirlwind of nostalgia. It's your mission to return these cherished items to their rightful place by sorting and matching the pieces in magical puzzles. DISCOVER ICONIC 3D DISNEY TREASURES! Explore stunning 3D levels inspired by your favorite Disney films and discover a vast array of nostalgic items. From Mickey Mouse's iconic gloves to Aladdin's magic lamp or Woody‚Äôs boots from Toy Story, each 3D piece is brimming with Disney charm. Unlock new chapters in the magic book and uncover even more Disney treasures in Enchanted Levels! Enchanted Levels include themed pieces from your favorite films or nostalgic characters, featuring classics like Mickey Mouse‚Äôs shoes, Minnie Mouse‚Äôs bow, and Donald Duck‚Äôs hat. SORT AND MATCH IN ICONIC DISNEY PUZZLES! Test your skills with a variety of engaging Disney puzzles that will challenge your mind and invoke nostalgia. Match and sort scattered Disney items from the Heart of Te Fiti to a vast array of princess dresses. By identifying and sorting scattered items, each completed match brings you closer to restoring order to the universe. Feel the satisfaction of sorting the treasures back into their correct places in Disney Magic Match 3D! Download Disney Magic Match 3D and experience enchanting Disney puzzle levels with Aladdin, Toy Story, Moana and more!
