summary: Match to Solve 3D Disney Puzzles! Levels with Toy Story, Aladdin, Moana & More

scraped_reviews.content: Great game, no ads. But, occasionally, on startup it freezes before fully loading the window that asks me to choose online or device progress. There is no text in the boxes and it won't go forward. The only way I can keep playing is to uninstall and reinstall, complete the tutorial, and then restore my progress from online. Only, it's not restored. The last time I did this, it lost a lot of my progress. I had most of the Duo sets completed and over 350 star exchange points. I lost ALL of it.

This game is a great for passing the time. It's addictive and it's fun especially for Disney fans but if you're like me where you want a feature like playable or unlockable characters, it's probably not going to hold your interest for very long since the only collectable rewards are digital figurines. It's cute though and I do like how the game is designed to test your attention to detail. I don't see it lasting for very long but it's definitely not a bad game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for playing! We're thrilled you're having a great time with the game.

scraped_reviews.content: love this game! No ads, you get to collect fun Disney characters, & it's a fun way to pass the time. One issue I have with the recent update, though, is that once you click on a booster for a level, the option to keep using it stays selected for the following levels, unless you unselect it. I try to save them for the very hard levels, but didn't know that the update kept them selected. Suddenly, a bunch of boosters I'd been saving for when I needed them were gone, and that was really frustrating

To me, the graphics are awesome, and the nostalgic feeling I get is worth a higher rating. However, for quite a few levels, I encountered crashes that sent me back many levels. Either they have resolved the issue, or the problem doesn't exist as you get to higher levels. My current issue is not being able to play due to difficult to often impossible time limitation that burns through your five lives quickly. I'd rather the game be a relaxing search. Get rid of the clock or allow more time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jaymie, I'm sorry to hear about the crashing issues that you experienced and thanks for your feedback about the challenges in completing levels within the game. We'd love to help and investigate this further. Please contact us at https://jamcity.me/DisneyMagicMatch3DSupport so we can resolve the issue. We're happy to assist you. ~Verso

scraped_reviews.content: I very much want to like this game. It's fun to play, has good sound effects, and has enough collectables and challenges to be interesting but not overwhelming. There is 1 nitpick and 1 big problem: 1) there doesn't appear to be a way to go back and improve your star rating for a level. 2) the game *keeps freezing* and losing level progress, minis and harmonic bonus. This is the real issue and it keeps me from wanting to invest time in the game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Renee, sorry to hear that your game is freezing. We want to investigate this issue. Please contact the support team using this link: https://bit.ly/49kBfJ9 . Be sure to include your Player ID in your message.
~Denis

scraped_reviews.content: I kinda like this game and the little snippets of the Disney theme songs. The graphics are really gorgeous and it's heart-warming to see characters we all know so well. However! There are some drawbacks. The game is expensive with not many opportunities to grab any coins, freezes, fans or magnets. I wish the game had events and races. And between you & me, I don't give a diddly whoop about collecting cards or song titles. The game is VERY challenging as you get into higher levels. So...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sandi, we‚Äôre glad you‚Äôre enjoying the game! We appreciate your feedback about the cost, limited rewards, and missing features like events and races. We‚Äôve shared your thoughts with the development team for consideration. ~Myke

scraped_reviews.content: I love the game and graphics; they are very cute. Mickey looks so super cuddly!However, I can only give three stars at this time, as the game constantly freezes and boots me out. Upon restarting the game, I often find I have lost over twenty levels that I have already played. Plus it makes me lose a life and therefore my streak boosters. This is getting old and needs to be fixed ASAP!

this is a fun game! no ads which is nice. the gameplay is cute. the design is nice. sleek graphics. my only criticism would be that its too hard to make coins. it cost 100 when you run out of time or your tray is full but you have to beat around 15-20 rounds to earn that much. I would suggest making it easier to get coins or make the cost of continuing the game cheaper. or even have watching an ad get your coins!

Fun game for the most part. I love how clean the graphics are and how cute the minis are. The only gripe I have is sometimes the game will make me re-play levels I've already finished. This has happened a few times; the first time it happened, the app closed on its own. The second time it happened, I received a phone call in the middle of gameplay, and the 3rd time was due to a faulty ad. When this happens I also lose my booster streak which is a bummer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello there, sorry to hear that your game is crashing and you are losing progress and items because of it. We want to investigate the issues. Please contact our support team at https://jamcity.me/DMM3DSupport.
~Denis

scraped_reviews.content: **Edit: Progress reset happened twice and didn't save even though I was signed in with Save Your Progress. Reached out to Support, and they restored the level Progress, but couldn't get the items I'd collected (they did offer later, but it wasn't really possible at that point). Overall, the game is fun, and haven't seen any ads. I just suggest closing the game out at desired checkpoints with Cloud Save enabled as that may help avoid crash related progress loss.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we‚Äôre sorry to hear your progress was reset after the crash. Please contact our support team so we can review your account and help restore your progress. https://jamcity.helpshift.com/hc/en/54-disney-magic-match-3d/ ~Myke

scraped_reviews.content: This is a good free to play game for now. However, I'm seeing signs of the inevitable shift towards more monetization. The price of the micro transactions is outrageous and I will never pay for that. I would happily pay $10 for the game, but not for a few hundred coins and a handful of power ups. These kinds of games capture free to play players with generous bonuses then slowly make it harder to progress without spending money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kelli, thanks for sharing your feedback about the in-game bundles and the challenges in progressing through quests and tasks as you play further . This will be forwarded to the team so they are aware of your sentiments about this matter. ~Verso

scraped_reviews.content: The game definitely needs some improvements I've had it regularly crash halfway through a level and then it undoes my progress on any of my streaks. I've also had to completely uninstall and reinstall the game losing my progress after about 120 levels. it's definitely fun while playing it though. Good for passing time. although I will say, I wish the levels actually had the music to match the theme you were playing at the time, even if it was just like a instrumental version for the backgroud
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nicholas, thank you for your review. I'm sorry for the crashes and lost progress - that shouldn‚Äôt happen. Please contact our Support team at https://jamcity.me/DMM3DSupport so they can investigate this and help recover your lost progress. I‚Äôll also be happy to share your suggestion about themed background music with the team. Thanks again! ~Kate

scraped_reviews.content: so fun! keeps you busy! need a free lives bank. and it glitches and closes out and you have to re do levels sometimes . now the card packs are way less too making it way too hard to even complete the mission of collecting all cards and to get the prize and mini. also some levels take 9! levels to get to item level. that's a lot. but I do love the game. on level 1,100!

The game is okay. They've done a fairly good job on the graphics, free boosters and gameplay. I waited until I got past level 65 before I did a review. I am disappointed with the same thing other players have mentioned - the music is garbage that has absolutely nothing to do with Disney characters or movies. Disney's musical scores are a favorite among fans, so why use generic music? That makes no sense. I've played Jam City's games before. I'm waiting for the difficulty to become impossible.

I never normally leave reviews, but this game is truly a gem. No ads to contend with and even at level 500 I am seeing new items and theming. It is easy at first...but trust me it gets challenging! A few things I would like to see are extra points for fully clearing a board, extra points for not using any power ups, that the game features were finished, and maybe a pvp race for extra rewards for fastest times. I also wish the mickey event timeout wasn't at like 3/4am EST. LOVE it so far

Seriously!?! A game without ads!?! Thank goodness! I don't normally leave reviews yet, for this game I will. Love the graphics and the puzzles aka levels. The ONLY issue is you have five lives. Yet, there isn't a way to get more lives or get rewarded with a free life. You have to wait at least 30 minutes or so just for one life. Otherwise amazing game!

Love the addicting gameplay and no ads. It does get a bit repetitive after a while but that's to be expected after playing several hundred levels. My only reason for not giving it 5 stars is that the app will occasionally glitch and lose progress/ items, but when I lost a mini figure from an event, the support team was responsive and returned my missing item.

I decided to try the game today. My game has crashed 3 times and took me back to half of my progress, AND I lost all incentives that I had earned. For example, I was at Level 90. The game crashed and took me back to Level 48. Disney. Do better. This is ridiculous. Let me know when this bug is worked out. Maybe I'll try again. Tried again. Got it Level 139. Game restarted and took me back to Level 99. It looks like the game is still being developed. I'm done.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry that you are experiencing problems with the game. We kindly ask you to update to the newest version. Should the issues continue, please open a support ticket in-game (accessible via the gear icon) or visit: https://jamcity.me/DisneyMagicMatch3DSupport. Remember to include your Support ID.

scraped_reviews.content: I got about 100 levels in and was forced to delete and reinstall because I couldn't get past the initial screen. There was a blank pop-up that wouldn't go away. Unfortunately, despite having logged in with my Google account to save my progress, it saved nothing. It was a fun game, but losing all that progress was too frustrating. I deleted it again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there, sorry to hear that you lost your progress. Contact our support team at https://jamcity.me/DMM3DSupport . We will be happy to assist you with restoring it.
~Denis

scraped_reviews.content: This game has crashed 4 times since I installed it today. I've lost over 100 levels of progress. I was enjoying this game but I'm tired of having to redo levels. I clicked save progress and clearly that did nothing. Edit: I kept coming back to this game because it's a lot of fun. It hasn't crashed for a while now. So I'm changing my rating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shadow, I'm sorry to hear about the crashing and progress loss issues that you experienced. We'd love to help and investigate this further. Please contact us at https://jamcity.me/DisneyMagicMatch3DSupport so we can resolve the issue. Please include your device model and your support ID from the game. We're happy to assist you. ~Verso

scraped_reviews.content: I've really been enjoying this and don't usually like these types of games. I do wish the Minis would start unlocking though. I'm at level 442 and only have one. I also wish the "Coming Soons" would hurry up! üòÑ The game also freezes after playing a while and I've lost a lot of levels, streaks and rewards because of it.

This game is a shameless money-grab. EDIT: I can't imagine being a kid and attempting to play this (with or without a stylus). Even when you think you've tapped a match, there's a chance you didn't and suddenly your board is full and its going to start at 100 coins to continue and go up every time without a fair in-game way to earn coins continuously with every level. The in-game currency value is extortionary against real money and can be BLOWN THROUGH in a single round of attempts to finish.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, sorry to hear you are having issues with the game. We would like to assist you with. Do not hesitate to contact our support team at https://jamcity.me/DMM3DSupport . We will be happy to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: The only suggestion I'd make for this app is if you are giving unlimited lives, but then your time runs out, said time is subtraced from the five lives you're supposed to have, as opposed to just being unlimited, like in Candy Crush. if there was a way to adjust that, that would be awesome. Aside from that, it is a very fun and addicting game for Disney enthusiasts.

Amazing experience overall! surprisingly difficult! The key quest event has disappeared for me tho and I can't see it now. so thats a problem, I dont know why it did this because the event is still going as of now THAT IS MY ONLY PROBLEM! to be honest thats my only complaint really. The entire game is free to play and if you do good, the rewards are great. the game is very addictive and no ads either, an amazing free to play game:D I love the art style too, surprisingly difficult as well!

The game is honestly great, but it keeps crashing and when it does I lose all my multipliers and sometimes it even puts me back a couple levels. It's beyond frustrating üòï Update: I even lost most of my collectables! I'm so over this game, which sucks, because it's a lot of fun. No point getting invested if you are just going to constantly lose your progress!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Asia, sorry to hear that you lost game progress after it crashed. We would like to investigate the issue. Don't hesitate to get in touch with our support team via this link https://bit.ly/49kBfJ9 . Please do not forget to include your Player ID
~Denis

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game I have been spending a lot of time on it. NO ADS. you get a good amount of hearts and extra tools to help improve the game pretty often.. The only suggestion I have is for them to create an option to log in before the tutorial actually starts. I downloaded it on my iPad so I can have a screen and it had me do a full-blown tutorial like I'm a new user when I just want to log in and start playing...

I actually have a great time playing this game. I am giving a low rating because every once in a while the app just closes on its own. And even though I have save progress turned on when I go back into the game I am sent back many levels that I had already passed and I lose the rewards I had earned. Fix this and the rating would be 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sarah, we‚Äôre glad to hear you enjoy the game, though we‚Äôre sorry about the progress loss and app crashes you‚Äôre experiencing. Please contact our support team so we can look into this for you. magicmatch3d@support.jamcity.com ~Myke

scraped_reviews.content: This is a very fun addictive game. There's no adds and you don't have to pay to play. The worst part is save function. Sometimes you have to replay a level that you just beat. Another thing that I hope they improve is when you win unlimited time you have to use them right away. I sometimes can only play a few minutes so when I win 1 hour unlimited lives I can't play sometimes. I hope they let us use them when we want not force us to use it. when they correct that I will add the 2 stars.

I love this game. the graphics are great and the gameplay is satisfying. my one and only complaint is that it is not fat fingers friendly. the pieces are sometimes too small and I accidentally click the wrong one and it fills up my tray and I lose the round. this is very frustrating and I have rage closed the game a few times because of it. im level 353

This game is enjoyable! I would suggest shorter levels to collect the mini characters! It took me over 230 levels just to get Aladdin! Collecting characters should go a little faster so the players don't get bored! Disney has too many characters for this game to go this slow to collect and I LOVE DISNEY!! Hope you make some changes! Another suggestion, for magic items collected, we should earn a mini collectable!

deserves a 5 star but for some reason since I got to level 200 the game wont work right. no matter where I am in wifi or not I can play maybe 2 levels then no matter what I do I cant play anymore. I can push every button and everything will open and close and work normally but u cant hit the play button. and it will be like that for hours. im hoping it fixes itself or I will have to delete but I love the game so for now im hoping.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jessi, I'm sorry to hear about issues playing level 200. We'd love to help and investigate this further. Please contact us at https://jamcity.me/DisneyMagicMatch3DSupport so we can resolve the issue. Please include your device model and your support ID from the game. We're happy to assist you. ~Verso

scraped_reviews.content: I would have given it 5 stars because I love Disney. However several reasons why that I gave it 4. One: its too simplistic as far as the objdct; gathering 3 of the same kind of object, which i understand thats what the game is entitled. Along with that, the fact that the objects represent a movie from Disney, I wish they're were more of a goal. Also, when a level comes up with objects from a specific movie, I wish a song associated with the specific movie would be played.

Two days ago I was two cards from completing the starting set. I was 2 keys away from getting a guaranteed new card pack. I go to sleep, and now I am "offline"and can no longer earn cards. I have uninstalled and reinstalled. Support has been no help, maybe this will get their attention. It has been two days an no response. This is unacceptable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there! Sorry to hear you‚Äôre having trouble with the game. Please contact our Support team at https://bit.ly/49gv8p6 ‚Äî they‚Äôll be happy to help you out. Thank you! ~Kate

scraped_reviews.content: So I'm at level 12 and have not seen a single ad.....have they finally released a mobile game WITHOUT ADS??? that alone gives them 5 stars!!! there are microtransactions, but those are optional. the gameplay is fun, as well. if there are actually no ads, I will continue to play and may even consider buying stuff down the line!!! please keep ads away!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for being a player! We're absolutely thrilled that you're loving the game.

scraped_reviews.content: I love 3D match games so to have a Disney version is really great. The graphics are excellent, game play is smooth. My only comment is that I like the option to shift items around the board if I'm looking for other items. I'm sure we're expected to use power ups for that feature but it is a nice option. Otherwise, I look forward to wasting time playing this!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for joining us in the game! It's fantastic to know you're having fun.

scraped_reviews.content: Disney are late to the match 3 game. I found this game to be very punishing. Some levels are very difficult, being full of objects that are similar to each other, having too much clutter and then not giving players enough time to beat the levels. The some of the powerups don‚Äôt really help enough. Quite hard to gain coins. At the end of the day, it‚Äôs also a boring game. There‚Äôs not much variation in the level design or gameplay.

It's fun and addicting with no ads, but - some negatives: 1) you cannot play this game without a stylus. almost impossible to play otherwise. 2) timer starts immediately when the level opens, shouldn't start until your first move. 3) hate games where you cannot replay a level to get all 3 stars

UPDATE- I sent an email yesterday and you guys fixed it! THANK YOU. ‚ò∫Ô∏è I love the game! Ive been playing it since it came out. I'm on level 200 and something and haven't had any issues until now. Every time I go to play the game, 2 empty boxes pop up and you can click on either one of them but nothing happens, I'm stuck on this screen.. please fix or I'll have to uninstall ü•π because I can't play the game. It's a very cute game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brenda, I'm sorry to hear about the 2 empty boxes being unresponsive and getting stuck in-game. We'd love to help and investigate this further. Please contact us at https://jamcity.me/DisneyMagicMatch3DSupport so we can resolve the issue. Please include your device model and your support ID from the game. We're happy to assist you. ~Verso

scraped_reviews.content: I would genuinely love this game, however the latest update added things that seem.... predatory. They changed the item use before games to a toggle instead of a 1 time use, while at the same time adding a new competative race event that makes you want to speed to the next match to stay ahead. I've lost all my pre game items because I didn't turn the toggle off between rounds. Also there's no confirmation on spending coins. In a rapid tapping game, I've spent before the prompt even shows up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cameron, thanks for sharing your feedback about the item use changes, the new competitive race event, non-confirmation when spending coins, and the rapid tapping game. These will be forwarded to the team so they are aware of your sentiments about this matter. ~Verso

scraped_reviews.content: it's good and fun and it's still in it's beginning stages with more to come. I got to level 27 fairly quickly and it's enjoyable. But! there's some issues. When i start up a new game I get spoiled by being able to buy a starter set for a couple of bucks but yours start at 5 and up. Sorry not going to forking over that amount till later inthe game. Second and most annoying is sometimes you just flood the screen with items making it harder to find what you want. Upside? good graphics NO ADS!

I love this game, and I hate to come on here with a review which points out a problem but I don't know how else to contact the developers. Recently I've been having trouble getting into the game, where the app checks whether you want to play the local save or the cloud save then my game just hangs with the boxes for those options but no writing in the boxes and no way forward. It will recover given time, but it's mildly annoying!

Game play is fun and challenging. Suggestions for improvement: 1) 4 day challenge events - change the item to collect to match the character theme. it's repetitive and boring that it's always a key. 2) Add some building or decorating events. Take a scent from a movie, remove everything but the background and collect items to restore the scene. 3) or decorate, create houses for each character and collect items to select various decor that is character themed to decorate their make believe house

This game would be so much better if there were Daily free rewards to claim. If you have no power-ups and lose a "very hard" stage there's no easy way to win that level. Also you should be able to use power-ups to continue playing instead of having the level shut down if you run out of time or get the item board full.

I love this game and find it very addictive. My only reason for not giving it 5 stars is, after making it through many levels, it will sometimes just shut down (which is especially frustrating if I've made it through a very hard level). I go back in, and all that progress is gone. other than that, I absolutely love it.

it's fun but upsetting.... does anybody else's game freeze. you have to go fast and my game will freeze and not let me click on anything but the time keeps counting down. I've lost levels, etc. because of it. my tablet is a good one so I don't understand. but I do love the game
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Heather, I'm sorry to hear about the freezing issues that you experienced. We'd love to help and investigate this further. Please contact us at https://jamcity.helpshift.com/hc/en/54-disney-magic-match-3d/ so we can resolve the issue. Please include your device model and your support ID from the game. We're happy to assist you. ~Verso

scraped_reviews.content: I'm so addicted to the game! Very cute graphic and distressing. Best point, there is no advertisment in the game which is something so rare and precious. One suggestion, if you can play the background music accordingly to each stage's theme, will be wonderful!

This is a really fun game and I do not find most of the puzzles to be overly difficult. My only complaint is if you are advertising collecting the figures then you should be able to get the figures a little more often. I am past level 120 and only received 1 figure.

I love this game! I love that you have enough time to sort absolutely everything and it scratches an itch in my brain to watch the pile disappear. My only critique is the saving. Sometimes it doesn't save properly and takes me back several levels which can be frustrating, but other than that it's very fun

easy enough little game of match 3 but, it's a pile of objects you have to scramble through to find your 3 of a kind that they show you is needed in order to complete the level. Like in every game, theres ads in between levels. I'm only in the first 20 levels so i might update the review.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mimir, thank you for sharing your thoughts. We‚Äôre glad to hear you‚Äôre enjoying the early levels and appreciate your feedback about the gameplay and ads. We hope you continue having fun as you progress through the game. ~Myke

scraped_reviews.content: wow!!!!!! I found this came via an ad. I downloaded it. It is not just fun but I am on level 100 and NOT ONE AD. I am still in disbelief. I do have one suggestion to make perfection. Give coins away every time you pass away level. That way if you mess up ahd can soend them. Good job!! creators.

title: Nonogram.com - Picture Cross
description:
Nonogram.com is a captivating picture cross puzzle with a vast collection of griddlers. Challenge your mind with this easy-to-play logic puzzle from a top developer, and become a real Nonogram.com master! Join nonogram puzzle players all around the world, use logic to reveal pixel art pictures, and have fun with this picture game!

Nonogram.com highlights:
¬∑ Classic nonogram puzzle gameplay meets a clean design and a set of features to make your picture cross game varied and exciting. Find your favorite logic puzzle page, and play anytime, anywhere.
¬∑ Picture cross puzzles are a great tool to keep your mind active. Choose your difficulty level, and enjoy building a unique nonograms collection. Exercise your logical thinking and imagination at the same time!
¬∑ This logic game is great for whenever you need a break from your daily routine. Pick up your phone or tablet and color some nonogram pictures to relax and unwind!

Nonogram.com features:
¬∑ Plenty of nonogram puzzles with non-repeating images to color.
¬∑ Seasonal Events. Complete time-limited events by solving nonograms of several difficulty levels. Play picture games to reveal and collect all the unique picture cross postcards. Follow our number puzzle updates to never miss a single event!
¬∑ Daily Challenges. Solve picture cross puzzles every day to get a special trophy at the end of the month!
¬∑ Tournaments. Compete with other players and color as many nonogram pictures as you can. Choose a more difficult pixel puzzle page to practice your skills, earn more points, and win the top prize!
¬∑ Use hints if you get stuck while solving picture cross puzzles.
¬∑ Auto-crosses help you fill the grid on the lines in the number puzzles where the squares are already correctly colored.

A nonogram is also known as a picture cross puzzle, griddler, or pictogram. If you've heard of any of these logic puzzles, you likely know the rules. They are quite simple:
¬∑ The goal of this logic game is to fill the picture cross grid and reveal a hidden image by deciding which nonogram cells to color.
¬∑ Follow the clues with numbers to understand which cells should be colored or left blank to solve nonograms.
¬∑ Every nonogram puzzle page has numbers beside each row and above each column of the grid. They show you how many unbroken lines of colored cells there are in a given row or column, and their order.
¬∑ There should be at least one empty square between unbroken lines in this number puzzle.
¬∑ In this picture game you can mark cells that should not be colored with crosses. This can help you visualize your next moves on a pixel puzzle page.

Dive into the world of Nonogram.com! Challenge your mind with a logic puzzle page of your preferred difficulty. Compete with other players to solve picture cross puzzles! Sharpen your logic skills, discover new artworks, and have fun with nonograms!

Terms of Use:
https://easybrain.com/terms

Privacy Policy:
https://easybrain.com/privacy
