summary: Brawl, Clash & Play an epic multiplayer online shooting action MOBA stars game!

scraped_reviews.content: Used to love this game, at its core, it really is a good game, yet it only gets one star. Match making is horrendous and has been for some time. They cater to those who pay, and those who pay little to nothing get the short end of the stick. If im a level 9, why would I be matched with a level 19? It happens all the time. Players should be matched based upon level not trophy count. Players wait to play with a character till they are a really high level or drop trophies than crush everyone else.

It's a fun game, but far too often will drop you in the middle of a battle where you're already dead, or without a weapon when everyone else has already collected one somehow. The major problem with this is a significant loss in trophies and it's difficult to earn trophies back when the game does this repeatedly! It's still a fun game, but frustrating!

Is it just me or does your heart start racing when you get into a fight? Game is dope...character's are fun to play with individually, as well. The only major problem is the game is expensive. They lowered the prices of some packages, but you don't necessarily have to pay. One more thing is, they should update the map and make it a tad bigger and maybe add something cool, like places to hide that are harder to take damage, or a teleporter. Don't try so hard at sticking to a theme.

Pay to win! its a fun game, but the game pushes you to spend money to get better equipment. it doesn't matter if you are higher trophy player or not.The crates that you get aren't really good and they take forever. and once you enter, they're always gonna be characters way higher level and better equipment because they paid. Not a fan that so that's why it's getting the rating that i'm leaving. oh the crate system should be better/ getting characters/ equipment. Make it fun and fair.

It is a great game and I personally like it, its a fun game where you can upgrade your characters and upgrade your weapons also. You can also play online with friends which makes the game even more fun. There is no lags or bugs that I know of, so no problems with the game and that makes it 10 times better. But my only little complaint is that the main menu is a bit blank. I dont know if it is because Im new to the game but thats it. It does not have a huge Main Menu like in Brawl Stars or PUBG.

Getting worst with age.. I started playing this game back during COVID as it grows it becomes worst by the day. 1. the match making is way off. got a level 13 or higher you will face level 20 all the time. 2. it's definitely pay to win you'll never get a level 20 without purchasing numerous offers and even then good luck. (I've spent over $200 and have no level 20). 3. game has become laggy you may attempt to attack doesn't mean it will work. limited to my review but there's a lot more.

I hardly ever review stuff, but I have been playing this game for the past several months, and I have loved it. I enjoy the different characters, their different abilities, and the overall setup of the game is well developed. However, the only issue that I have (hence the 2 out of 5 ‚òÜ) is the way that the players are generated into the games, it's horrible. You can play games with someone 2x if not 3x a higher level than you, it's quite impossible to properly compete. It can get quite tiresome.

In general, a real good br game. I love it, and it's real fun. The only down fall is the matchmaking system. Once you get to about a thousand trophies on a character, there's seems to always be some other character that's a way higher level than you in each match. And at that point it's not even fair. Very pay to win game, still recommend though if you like br.

This is a great game. Very addictive animations and graphics are excellent. I enjoy playing the game; however I do have a few issues with the game. Firstly, it is hugely pay to win. You can play the game without paying; however progress is very slow. The battle pass is also quite pricey at 9.99 per week. Secondly, pairing is often unevenly matched. You'll get level 12+ characters with level 8+ items in a match with mainly level 5-10 characters.

I like the idea behind the game, and within the low-trophy range I have a lot of fun! But as the game adds more and more things to progress through, it becomes more and more pay-to-win. Matchmaking is non-existent, so you'll basically always end up facing a character 6 leagues away from yours at max level while you're stuck at level 4 because you don't have the means to progress. The characters and gameplay are amazing, but only when you're actually matched with equal or near-level players.

Overall, I will say that what we have here is a competent game. The matches are indeed fun, the design is quirky yet entertaining, the characters are all unique. I myself am not a big battle royale player, but this game was fun when I did play. However the greed of the developers is unreasonable, $9.99 a week for each battle pass, the amount of time you have to sink into opening any chest, if these issues are resolved I could recommend the game. Until then steer clear!

Do not get me wrong, I love Zooba, but it takes so long to get the new characters and some of the things in the store are a lot of money and you barely get anything from it. As a matter of fact, everything in the store is really expensive and hard to get. I will play Zooba, I just want some modifications. I have not unlocked a new character for so long that I have 0 characters with trophies below 900! I am also seeing a lot of trophy droppers (players with really high levels) in my games, and once, there was a big team (5 players) with max level and evolution rate Betsy, I was only a level 6! It was really not fair.

The concept is fun, but the game is literally pay to win. You can pay, and get the OP characters, and just win most if not all of your games. Not only that, but the game charges EXTREME prices for in-game purchases. A new character costs around 50 DOLLARS, which is absolutely insane for a mobile game. You can get characters from crates, but they are extremely rare, and there is a very low chance of getting somebody good. Overall, for the idea : 3.5/5 , the realization : 2/5.

I've been a zoobster lol for a couple years now and I'm addicted to the game. Not a day goes by when I'm not playing this game. Its very entertaining but there are definitely some issues that needs to be addressed. My favorite character is "Larry" he like me in a sense but I feel as tho he could use some work. First ill start by saying every and I mean every character I've played with is able to get a weapon faster than him. It literally thats him at least 5 sec to get a weapon. To be continued.

Fun for a bit. But, the amount of items and chests that they plaster in your face to buy everytime you open the game, finish a match, or just leave your locker are insane. On top of that, the technical support is horrendous and flawed. Make sure to backup your account or you're going to never get it back. Save time and lots of money by not playing this game. Support games that actually care about their players.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Zoobster, thanks for sharing your opinion with us! We understand that the voice of our community is super important and we will take your feedback into consideration so we can make Zooba the best game possible!

scraped_reviews.content: What is up with the gameplay since last upgrade. It's like playing a game with dial up. You would think a game that makes sooo much money would have a better platform. Guess they are not there yet and care less about the people who fill their pockets. Shame, years of play just got the game to go down in the dumps in the last year. Only thing that's improved is.........?? I'll edit when I find or think of something. Wish this game was like it used to be. I'm out and off to find something better‚úå

Absolutely love this game had made many of my days I was there before they added Shelly and many others but the quality of the game has had a massive difference in how good it used to be compared to what it is now. Used to be a fun f2p game with a slight bit of p2w but all the game has become is who can spend more money and how uneven the developers can make it for people that don't pay completely ruins the depth of the game when every click is a paywall after a battle now...!!!!!...!!!...!!!.!!

Do not download through the JustPlay app!!! They will not pay you, and when you try to contact support, no one responds ever!!!! The game is fun overall, but it isn't set up to be fair. You place level 7 with level 20 and level 20 wins every time! It's almost impossible to level up like this. Also, there are far too many groups playing as groups in solo matches. They gang up on everyone, then when it's only them left, one wins, and the others go into the fire. And it freezes up too often!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Zoobster! We're sorry to hear you had some issues with your matchmaking while in the arena. We're always interested in feedback from our players to help us improve our matchmaking system, so thank you for letting us know and please feel free to us more detail about your experience via our support channel - https://linktr.ee/ZooBattleArena

scraped_reviews.content: The game is fun and I play it almost every day. However, this game wants your money more than any game I have played. You have room for four loot boxes which take 3 hours minimum to open, unless you want to buy in game currency to open them faster. You need gold to upgrade your characters but again it is an incredibly slow grind even if you win unless you want to bust out that wallet. Now with all that you can still place first without spending money but you have to play a specific way.

Well, I played a bit and thought it was great. The battles were fun, the different characters interesting, and the progression system seemed balanced. Then I leveled up a couple times. I began to be matched with players several levels higher (my rank 3 vs a rank 8), and was always slaughtered. I couldn't progress because I couldn't beat these incredibly powerful players. The only way to win seems to be to pay for a strong character or wait days for one to appear in a loot crate. Not fun.

Alright, so I want to state that this game is indeed fun to play, and is a decent and enjoyable concept. However, I have installed/uninstalled this app about 5 different times for a few difficult reasons: 1: the game is extremely glitchy and after about 2 days of playing, the loading screen always freezes and prevents the player from logging on. 2: this game is extremely expensive, and it is near impossible to get any decent new characters without paying a lot of money/gems.

Look, the game was fun at first, then the constant grinding came. The game is fun except for the lack of characters you get to play when you first start. Usually the only certain way to get new characters is through the emerald chests; but you don't even get those a lot through the reward system that they put into the game. Along with the low chance of getting them through games if not at all. Overall, I liked the game I just think that getting characters should be made a bit easier.

Super fun game, but a lot of times when I click the battle button to start battling, the map won't even load, so I have to exit out of the game and re-enter the game over just to play 1 round! Then I also don't pay for any subscription in the game, so it makes it that much harder to play it. Overall though, an amazing game, love playing it. I wish that they did not put players together in a round depending on you're trophy number, but put you in a specific round depending on you're level.

I didnt rate 1 star only because the game started off entertaining, but you start to see major imbalances in the game, which seem to be programmed to force player to pay money, but what do you expect, almost every pvp game in the play store is P2W. As well, you are often times spawned immediately in the middle of a swarm of enemies, who all seem to be equipped already, with high level weapons, while you're left unarmed, as if youre put into the middle of a match. Once game is tweaked, 5 stars

DO NOT INSTALL THIS GAME! I played this game for months and put more money into it than I care to tell, and it is just a money pit and purely frustrating! Once you get to level 8 it is nearly impossible to level up without pouring in money. Then the battles are so uneven you do not stand a chance. You will have a level 15 with a 6 and with one shot you are done. Absolutely ridiculous.

it's a pay to win game where the stakes are your entire paycheck. Basically it's super slow to actually level up, like it takes forever. and then some chump that spent 200 dollars on the game gets to level his character all the way up and dominate every round because his trophies are low. Goodluck. Also everything is overpriced af. Imagine spending like 50 dollars on a 13 percent chance at getting a character from a box. Download fun run 4, it's fair and not pay to win.

Decent game overall, but there's a lot that the devs need to do. #1: Matchmaking is unfair. A level 1 shouldn't be going up against levels 5+, and matchmaking should be based on a character's level. #2: Pay-to-win characters. You can't really get to the high leagues because of problem #1. You would have to pay to get any high-league characters you wanted. These high league characters are also way better than the ones you're stuck with if you're playing for free. Without these issues, it's 5/5.

I thought games under the play pass weren't supposed to charge for bundles? Every single thing in the shop is available for actual cash. It's supposed to be free not trying to charge my visa. Maybe if this gets fixed this review may change. No point being on play pass and still charging people. *Edit* to the devs. Try harder. You didn't even give a response based off of my complaint. Get it together. I made this review months ago and it took you an insane amount of time just for that. ü§°
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Zoobster, we appreciate you sharing your opinion with us. Our team works super hard to create fun content for players and are constantly working on our map and character roster. We would love to hear some of your ideas on how to improve the Zoo, so please don't hesitate to get in touch here: https://linktr.ee/ZooBattleArena

scraped_reviews.content: Was one of the most fun mobile games, but just like so many others, Angry Birds, Clash of Clans, Wildlife Studio's own Suspects, etc., they're slowly changing what made the game popular and flipping off the loyal players who made it popular. With the the paid muscle and love potion powerups, overpowered and almost unbeatable characters, and all the items in barrels, it changes the flow and outcome of the game. It's more frustrating than fun now.

When they first made this game it was awesome. Upgrades and new items were common. Then as time went on, new animal unlocks were super rare unless you buy stuff. Now after the last update, the game is not the same. So many cool features are gone. Uprages are super expensive. Buying something is expensive. Premium is 10$ a week which is a lot. I used to play this everyday, now I haven't played in ever since the new update.

Is it just me or does your heart start racing when you get into a fight? Game is dope...character's are fun to play with individually, as well. The only major problem is the game is expensive. They lowered the prices of some packages, but you don't necessarily have to pay. One more thing is, they should update the map and make it a tad bigger and maybe add something cool, like places to hide that are harder to take damage, or a teleporter. Don't try so hard at sticking to a theme.

The matchmaking... There's no reason for me as a level 6 to encounter a level 19, evolutioned character. Please fix the matchmaking system, the trophy matchmaking system is very flawed, it should be based on level instead. It would help many people stay interested in this game. Also, the in app purchases are insane, why are there items being sold at a price of $100? I noticed that when i spend more money or in game currency, the prices go crazy high. Why is it hard to get new characters?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Zoobster! We're sorry to hear you had some issues with your matchmaking while in the arena. We're always interested in feedback from our players to help us improve our matchmaking system, so thank you for letting us know and please feel free to us more detail about your experience via our support channel - https://linktr.ee/ZooBattleArena

scraped_reviews.content: Incredibly unbalanced. Most characters are pretty well matched, some having lower health but longer range or higher damage, some having higher health and more close range equipment. But the fox is incredibly overpowered. 9/10 games fox wins because it's ridiculously powerful. If you have a sniper, the fox is really good at close range and moves fast enough to instantly close any gaps. If you have a close range tank, the fox is too fast for any other character to keep up with. Please fix this.

Way too greedy, gives you the option for a special and if you dont buy it then (while still learning the game) you don't get the deal, or if you try to buy it the only option of diamond purchase is $19.99!!! Way too hard for beginners because you get matched with characters that are ranked up 5x more than you are, so winning a match after the first few you win is rare, hope they fix these issues because other than that and irritating the hell out of me, it's pretty intense!

I wanna give this game as many stars as i can but i can't. This game is flawed. The lag while playing the game is horrible. The spawning-in is appalling. You're always spawning-in with too many players. On top of everything Level 10-17 mix in the game with low level players make it's so that "if you're not paying, your not advancing" in the game. Gems and real world money purchases are way too expensive. A season pass that $10 A WEEK! $10?!? It's sad to see a game that will die because of this.

The ranking and matchmaking is outrageous! Horrible! Horrible! Horrible! Lvl 4 fighting lvl 9, 3/4 of my health is taken out in one hit. You can't run because higher ranking players move faster and shoot farther so you are helpless. You have a few good matches and right when you think you are doing good you end up in a lobby with people double your rank. This is a cash grab. If you don't want to pay to win you don't play. Horrible game!

Pretty awesome game, love to play with my friends, but two thing that annoy me. Number one: the amount of time it takes to level up your character. Getting certain pieces for certain characters is a lot harder than it should be. Number two:how hard it is to get characters. I've seen this in multiple other reviews, and doubt understand why they don't just fix it.

The game concept is good, but the issue is that the developers want money constantly for skins, for new characters, for gems or the pass. And they aren't cheap either. One has a $4.99 per WEEK cost to open up boxes and the rewards are small potatoes. I know game developers need to make money but to nickel and dime for everything, I may as well go on a cruise - at least I'll get something out of that.

Overall a pretty fun game. The issue lies with the game's developers however. My negative experience: I wanted to purchase gems as to buy a new character in a limited offer - I selected the amount of gems I wanted to purchase and was met with an option of purchasing VIP instead and getting even more gems - so that is what I went with. To my surprise, the next time I launched the game, not only did I not have the gems, I had less than before the purchase. I do not recommend spending money on this

I really liked the game until I tried my free week subscription. The studio has made canceling your subscription hard and I assume deceptive on purpose. In fact the only button in game you see is restore subscription. I would assume seeing that I'm not subscribed and all good. 2 charges later and a nice we don't refund subscriptions. Not to mention that $10 a week for what you get come on guys it was pathetic. Needless to say game uninstalled. Shame game play was good game studio not so much.

Terrible! It's so pay to win! A single character and some upgrades is 100 dollars in the shop! Its just trying to squeeze money out of you. Once the game glitched and I went into negative diamonds and the game didn't let me play! It just found another excuse to make me spend money. Hot garbage, also, the matchmaking sucks, pretty sure the devs dont care though.

Though this game is addictive, there a quite a lot of flaws. First, the players you go against are like 2 or 3 levels above you. Second, sometimes the screen will just freeze and I have to exit out and back in inorder to play. Third, it takes forever to get a new character and level up if you don't spend money. Other ways, this game is fun to pass free time.

The game was fun initially but when you get to level 7 or above, you can barely win unless you pay money. All players around you have way higher level and better weapons and equipments, which forces you to spend money endlessly. Stay away from this game. They just want money. There are a lot of better games out there. Dont waste time and money on this one

I've been playing this game for quite a while now, but the matching is disgusting. I will be matched against players 6 plus levels than my character. There's no chance of even fighting against them. Yes I am one of the players that does spend some money on the premium pass to unlock more but with match making making it impossible to actually play its a waste of money.

To be fair, this game is a waste of time. When you first start the app, it gives you one out of the 3 animals. Ok not bad, but they never let you check out the other two. It just says one word, and you will never play that character unless you pay. Gameplay is ok, unless you matching with people that are 10 level ms above you. On top of that, teammates will only go for the good stuff why, because you can't talk to them. Bad game, don't waste your phone space and time.

This game is the definition of pay to win. It's a fun little game...up until you get killed (almost every game) by someone who paid for a stronger character and is over twice your level. To any new players, good luck getting past the pay to win players or the people that have already been playing for months. The other issue is that game is full of inactive clans that haven't been active in months and there is no good way to find active clans.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Zoobster, thanks for your feedback! We're sorry to hear that you feel this way, but we'd like to reassure you that there's no roadblocks for F2P players in our game üòÑ While purchasing Crates, Gems and Coins is a way to enhance your experience, you can still battle your way to the top without spending anything at all! Good luck in the arena! üß°

scraped_reviews.content: VERY fun. This game is like a mini battle royale type game, very simple and easy to get the controls down. You can even play with friends via the codes it gives so you can assemble a team of your own. Speaking of teams, there's a wide variety of characters each with their own special passive and active abilities, and each character even uses different attacks with each weapon: bow, bomb, spear, and shotgun. There's even equippable items for different effects. No two games ever feel the same. 5‚≠ês

I really like this game and have played it for a very long time. However recently they haven't been matching skill level. I am not able to gain any points because I am in with gold and silver levels when I am not even bronze. The maxed out players just run everyone over. It's making it very frustrating. Before the past month I would give it 5 stars, but if this keeps up I will just stop playing.

Hello Zooba Devs, I really enjoy playing this game; I have for years. I like the constant improvements in gameplay and the overall esthetic of the characters and the new arenas.. I had a thought: wouldn't be neat if there was a characters VS the guards mode? The guards could spawn over and over again for a timed match of two or three minutes and it could be a tiered scoreboard of all the players. Anyways, thanks for all your hard work!

This game is fun after you learn how to play, however, when you start playing the game more consistently you notice that the game becomes a pay to win game it's sad, everyone you play with is at least four levels above you and you can't win any games anymore unless you buy a pack. Not only that but the game doesn't give you good characters either it's terrible how I get no characters with actual good abilities (as far as weapons go) if they were to fix this all of this I would come to play.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Zoobster, thanks for your feedback! We're sorry to hear that you feel this way, but we'd like to reassure you that there's no roadblocks for F2P players in our game üòÑ While purchasing Crates, Gems and Coins is a way to enhance your experience, you can still battle your way to the top without spending anything at all! Good luck in the arena! üß°

Joonggonara, Korea's leading secondhand trading platform, has become even safer.

Through the "Safety Guarantee Project," Joonggonara is reducing users' concerns about fraud and creating a trustworthy trading environment.

‚úîÔ∏è Secure Payment ‚Äì Secure payment and delivery all in one.
‚úîÔ∏è Compensation System ‚Äì Been a victim of fraud? Up to KRW 1 million in compensation.
‚úîÔ∏è Self-Review ‚Äì Select and verify only the essential information (currently available for some users).
‚úîÔ∏è Certified Seller ‚Äì Trade with a highly trusted seller.

Experience the most secure secondhand trading experience today.

‚Äª App Access Permissions Guide
In accordance with Article 22-2 (Consent to Access Permissions) of the Information and Communications Network Act, which took effect on March 23, 2017, the following information provides information on the access permissions required to use the service.

[Required Access Permissions]
- Device and App History: Check for app errors and improve usability
- Device ID: Identify and track devices, and verify services
- Wi-Fi Connection Information: Check network connections when using the app
[Optional Access Permissions]
- Storage: Create or save photos
- Location Information: Search for location information and share location information when using map features
- Camera: Take photos or videos for chats, posts, and profile creation
- Microphone: Voice recognition when recording videos

‚ñ† Optional access permissions can be consented to when using related features. Even if you decline consent, you can still use app services other than those related to the relevant features.

title: 1Weather Forecasts & Radar
description:
1Weather's accurate hyperlocal forecasts are here to help you own the day! Trusted by 100 Million+ users across the world, the 1Weather app will keep you weather-ready, every day.

‚úì 24x7 local & national hourly weather info
‚úì Down-to-the-minute & long-range local forecasts
‚úì NWS & WDT alerts based on custom locations
‚úì Future Radar to track hazardous weather conditions
‚úì AQI info to check air quality levels across all locations
‚úì Hourly, Daily, Weekly weather forecasting
‚úì Sun & Moon tracker to find sunrise, sunset & moon phases

KEY FEATURES

Accurate Forecast
Stay prepared with minute-by-minute forecast and precipitation up to 48 hours in advance. From daily, hourly, minutely, and weekly forecasts to extended long-range forecasts, we've got you covered. 
1Weather accurately predicts the possibility of snow day, ice storms, arctic air, hailstorm, snowfall, rain cloud, thunderstorm, cool air, freezing rain and drizzle. Let us be your personal forecaster and plan your days for camping, hiking, trekking, etc. with our 10 Day forecast.

Radar Map
1Weather's interactive radar maps help track severe storms in real-time. Multiple weather layers to monitor rain intensity, surface temperature, dew point, relative humidity, wind speed, and UV index. Future radar maps help you stay aware of extreme weather conditions like blizzard, sleet, hail, thundercloud, lake-effect snow and winter storms. Real-time NWS alerts & warnings ensure that you're always in the know when it matters most. Our live radar maps cover climate changes across all regions, including West Coast and East Coast.

Health Center
1Weather brings you up-to-date air quality index with detailed information about the air pollution level and pollen count for those pesky seasonal allergies. Enjoy the outdoors with data about wind chill, moisture, humidity, air quality, and the environment.

Weather News
Receive quick updates on breaking weather news in 60 words & one-minute videos. We‚Äôll send you interesting shorts, weather tips, articles, insights & videos on topics relevant to you. We are also always ready with seasonal tips for extreme weather that are useful and help you stay worry-free.

Customizable Alerts
We want you to always stay in the know! Receive the latest weather alerts and warnings issued for your city by the National Weather Service (NWS), NOAA, Storm Prediction Center, Dark Sky & WDT. 1Weather's immediate notification of real-time weather changes is designed to help you & your loved ones stay safe.

Beautiful Weather Widgets
At 1Weather, we want you to see the weather your way. You can track weather from your home screens with customizable home screen widgets. Choose from 1x1 widget, 2x1, 2x2, 2x3, 3x4, 4x1 widget, 4x2, 4x3, 5x1 widget, & 5x2 widget sizes in preferred formats like large clock widget, time widget, forecast widget.

Sun and Moon Tracker
Whether you're a stargazer, photographer, or simply curious about the skies, this tool is your go-to companion. Plan your day or night activities with sunrise, sunset, moonrise, and moonset. Explore various moon phases, including New Moon and Full Moon.

Additional features
Customizable Units: Personalize your weather experience by customizing units to your preference.
Multilingual Support: Choose from multiple languages to make the app more accessible to you.
Dark and Light Themes: Customize your app's appearance with dark and light themes to suit your preferences and reduce eye strain in low-light conditions.

Download the best android weather app for accurate weather updates, wherever you go!

For any queries, feel free to reach us at support@1weatherapp.com.

Note: We may collect information from your use of the app that we may share with our partners to deliver personalized ads and improve our services. You may modify your choices at any time as explained in our Privacy Policy: https://1weatherapp.com/privacy/#opt-out.

summary: Hyperlocal Forecasts, Live Radar, Severe Weather alerts & Homescreen Widgets

scraped_reviews.content: DO NOT PAY FOR THIS APP!! I foolishly bought the paid version to remove ads, but after a while, I started seeing ads again. The app had apparently logged me out after updating, and the publisher has refused to fix this problem, even after multiple messages to them that included my proof of purchase. On top of that, it's a second-rate weather app. It's very cluttered, and the radar is bad. Very often, it just says, "Something went wrong" and displays nothing. Forecast radar motion is laughable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Craig, sorry you're having trouble with ads after purchasing premium. Please try clearing the app cache and ensure you're signed into the correct Google Play account. If it still doesn't restore, email us at support@1weatherapp.com with your purchase receipt so we can help.

scraped_reviews.content: Why the hell do they want me to pay 2 dollars a month to look at the weather details!? Don't get me wrong- the app is free, but the ads are just way too much. Every time you switch tabs you get in ad popup! And the UI is just flooded with ad banners everywhere too to make the app look so messy. Sometimes the app also spreads misinformation because of their generated guesses, which freaks people out sometimes because it said "first snow of the year happened in September something"
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear Deadly,

We're sorry for the ad experience and any forecast inaccuracies. Ads support our free app, but we offer a premium option for an ad-free experience. For forecast issues, please ensure your location is correct and 'Follow my location' is enabled. Clearing the app cache can also help improve accuracy.

scraped_reviews.content: Bought the ad-free version of this app in 2023. I had to switch to a new phone and now the app won't recognize my premium account. Customer service, although responsive, give too many hoops to jump thru to recognize my premium version. (More work than it should be.) Ads are severely intrusive and clearly beg you to buy the subscription - not worth it. I do not recommend - do yourself a favor and get yourself another app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mark, we're sorry for the trouble with your premium purchase. Please ensure you're logged into the same Google Play account used for the purchase and have the correct app version installed (not the preloaded one). If it still doesn't restore, please email us your receipt at support@1weatherapp.com so we can assist.

scraped_reviews.content: I really wanted to like this app, I used it for about a year. It's a decent interface and works pretty smooth. But forecasts are spotty at best and nearly 10 degrees off at worst. The real-time weather alerts were accurate maybe 50% of the time. I struggled with the status bar notification constantly, the final straw was that it stopped showing the temp and just shows a blue cloud no matter what I do. Since that is the only feature I REALLY care about, I am moving on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Josh, we're sorry you're having these issues. For inaccurate forecasts, ensure your location is correct and background restrictions are off. To fix the notification issue, clear the app cache and check device settings. We appreciate your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Inaccurate notifications. It's constantly notifying me about WA state's weather when I live in, and have never taken my phone outside of, Indiana. This only started happening after the incessant notifications to pay for the pro version. My location is correct, so don't use that as an excuse. There's many others complaining about this after doing a simple 10 second google search. All of them say that it started after trying to force people to pay for pro.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Julia, sorry for the notification trouble! Please check if your location services and "Follow My Location" are enabled. Also, ensure background restrictions are off for 1Weather. Could you share screenshots of the wrong alerts? We'll investigate.

scraped_reviews.content: I liked this app, and actually decided to pay for the upgrade to disable ads. it seems like as soon as I paid for it, it stopped being accurate, and the current location won't work. I gave it permission to my location all the time, but everytime I leave my city, it gets stuck on that city. I had to jump through all sorts of hoops to get it to let me use the current location again, including deleting all the locations I had saved that I wanted to be able to easily check the weather of. Garbage.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Andi, we're sorry you're experiencing issues with location and accuracy after upgrading. Please ensure "Follow My Location" is enabled and background restrictions are off. Try clearing the app cache and restarting your device. If the issue persists, reach out to oneweather@onelouder.com for further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Don't waste money on the "upgrade". I've contacted "help" multiple times to get help with the app. The "shorts", which are the most interesting part of the app, delivering new information, have not worked since I gave them money for an annual subscription (to remove ads). To date, they have not responded. Please, save your money. Look at other weather apps. There are lots of them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Genie, we're sorry you're having trouble with the Shorts feature after subscribing. Please try clearing the app cache and restarting your device. If the issue continues, email us at support@1weatherapp.com with your purchase details so we can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: Down the hill. Developer errors, inaccurate temperatures. Today is Mon end my 5x3 widget displays the following days: Mon, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu. Yes, two Mondays! Same on my other phone. Temperature is being updated 1-2 hours late. And even then it's not accurate. I compared it with two other sources and the difference can be up to 5 degrees! It's used to be great app but not anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Igor, sorry you're having trouble. Please ensure your app is updated. For the temperature, double-check location accuracy, background restrictions, and "Follow my location." For widget issues, check widget settings and battery optimization.

scraped_reviews.content: Was A Good app but now every time I open it, there's a full page ad that has to be watched before I can view the weather. If i click on radar, then i get another ad. Not to mention, the radar freezes. Plus, since they've been promoting the "premium" app, it's Not even accurate anymore. I'm not paying for a weather app when I can just go to a website.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello TA, sorry you're having trouble. For the ads, our premium version offers an ad-free experience. Radar freezing? Try clearing the app cache and updating 1Weather.

scraped_reviews.content: I noticed the developers have no response to my last review, and are still so money-thirsty that they need to inundate the app with ads if you don't buy their premium version. That's why I'm building my own forecast app, that will only have enough ads to cover the cost of hosting it, and isn't intrusive to users who elect to have ads instead of pay. I'm not paying for something I can get for free with a Google voice search, and neither should you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Terrence, we understand your frustration with the ads. Ads support the free version, but for an ad-free experience, consider our premium subscription with monthly or yearly plans.

scraped_reviews.content: Ads in a piece of bloatware is even more stupid than putting this poorly made PoS app on phones as a system app. Turn off all notifications and warnings, just leaving the persistent sticky note for the numbers, still get the warnings for "extreme conditions". Just want quick access to the hourly and current conditions in the notification bar, dont need to know if water is going to be a bit chilly for swimming, don't need to know "it's really hot" when the numbers would tell the same. 0 of 10
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi erin, sorry you're having trouble with notifications. To customize alerts, go to Settings > Warnings & Alerts. You can adjust notification preferences there. For quick hourly/current conditions, enable the persistent temperature display in the notification bar.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be my favorite weather app, mostly because of the persistent notification with the temperature. I don't know if it was an app update or a restriction from a newer version of Android, but now that the notification icon is just a cloud it is more useless, and even further useless when there is a weather advisory (which is all the time now in the heat) since that takes up the entire notification pane and the current weather is no longer shown at all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Brian, Thanks for your feedback! For persistent temperature display: Go to Settings > Warnings & Alerts > Enable Sticky Notification. If it disappears, clear the app cache and restart your device. You may need to adjust battery optimization settings to prevent the system from stopping the persistent notification.

scraped_reviews.content: Radar randomly works when it wants to, the rest of the time it just says "something went wrong" and never does anything or shows completely incorrect information. The weather report is also randomly very wrong for my location but is correct for a city 30 miles away. Precise location already enabled. Permissions are not blocked. Have tried fresh install, clearing app cache, etc.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello D, sorry you're having trouble with the radar and forecast accuracy. For the radar issue, our team is working on a fix. For the inaccurate forecast, please double-check your location settings, ensure background restrictions are off, and that "Follow my location" is enabled. If issues persist, reach us at oneweather@onelouder.com.

scraped_reviews.content: GARBAGE APP! it's wildly inaccurate. currently it's saying there's a 90% chance of rain. while the 1weather radar is crystal clear and other weather apps and sites are saying zero chance of rain. it's a joke. honestly I've had it with this app. something is always wrong. now it's stuck on the blue screen and won't load. if I was a paying customer I'd be pissed. hell, I'm still irritated. my old androids weather app was free without ads AND it actually worked. Wish I could delete this garbage!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Joey, we're sorry you're having trouble with 1Weather. Inaccurate forecasts can happen. Please ensure your location is correct, background restrictions are off, and "Follow my location" is enabled in settings. If the app is frozen, try clearing the cache and restarting your device.

scraped_reviews.content: I paid for this app and have used it for many years and now I can't access it unless I go through a list of permissions allowing or denying my information to be, I assume, sold to "vendors". Not a couple they can lists but literally hundreds . and you go through a list of these vendors that have been arranged 10 - a lot. I personally getting tired of being the commodity every time I want to use an app especially if I it's a paid app. I uninstalled it immediately.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Zell, we understand your frustration. We take your privacy seriously! You can review our privacy policy in the app menu under Privacy Settings. If you'd like to uninstall, go to your device's settings > Apps > 1Weather > Uninstall.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for years. It used to be great, but changes over the past year keep making it worse. The forecast has steadily become more & more inaccurate, and I keep checking multiple sources because I can't trust this app. Now the temperature is no longer showing in my notification bar, which was one of the most useful features. It might be time for me to switch to a different app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello michelle, we appreciate your feedback. For the notification bar temperature, try clearing the app cache and restarting your device. 1Weather provides hyperlocal forecasts, real-time radar, and severe weather alerts for accurate weather information. Let us know if you need further assistance!

scraped_reviews.content: Not only are there ads everytime you click on something, they are the worst, hardest to get out of ads. I shouldn't have to play a mini game just to see what tomorrow's weather is. Ads are indeed a reasonable expectation when using a free app. However I think the ads are excessive, and I'm not going to pay for ad free weather, I'll just go to another source.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks Corey. We understand your frustration with the ads. Ads support the free version, but for an ad-free experience, our premium version offers monthly and yearly plans.

scraped_reviews.content: The app works well. There are a couple things that I find discouraging, and they are: The scrolling banner can't be removed, Turning off notifications doesn't turn off notifications, it just removes the checkmark from the box, Being able to rearrange the main screen to show what I find important quickly at the top of the page, instead of scrolling a long list of things I don't want to see and will probably never read.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mike, thanks for your feedback! We appreciate your suggestions regarding the scrolling banner and notification settings. We're always working on improvements, and we'll share your feedback with our team. 1Weather provides hyperlocal forecasts with real-time radar and severe weather alerts to keep you informed.

scraped_reviews.content: I did like 1Weather. I never actually open the app, but the persistent notifcation that showed forecast, rain, etc. was incredibly useful. I even paid to remove ads even though I'll never see them. A recent update completely gutted the persistent notification though with no way to bring back the old one; all it shows is the current temperature. I'll be uninstalling and finding another app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks Devin! We're sorry for the trouble with the persistent notification. To show more than just the temperature: 1) Go to Settings > Warnings & Alerts > Enable Sticky Notification. 2) If it still shows only temperature, try clearing the app cache and restarting your device. Let us know if you need further help!

scraped_reviews.content: My app is always up-to-date! SENT 5 EMAILS!!! UPDATE: As indicated in my original review , I have provided all the information you need in multiple emails. it takes sometimes up to 2 months to get a response. And, it's still not fixed. Just emailed you again! I used to love this app, but lately there are so many errors. I have emailed multiple times about the widget showing days twice. They'll be 2 Saturdays in the week or 2 Thursdays, etc. It has become inaccurate and there's lots of mistakes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks Amy! We apologize for the widget issue and the delayed response. Please share your device and app version details so we can assist you further. Our team is working on improving response times.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app when I first got it but that was before all the ads. You can't even open the app anymore without sitting through an ad first. Used to be able to quickly open and check weather and be on my way. Not any more. And switching between windows in the app brings up another ad! Annoying when you just want to do a QUICK check for the day.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello jan,

We're sorry for the ad experience. We strive to balance ads with a smooth user experience and are continually working on improving ad placement. We‚Äôll report this to our team. For a seamless experience, we also offer an ad-free premium option. Thanks for your understanding!

scraped_reviews.content: "Subscribe for an ad free experience!" How about no? How about I delete this app and download Weawow since it's actually free with no ads AND they don't collect your data. I used to love this app but I can't stand the fact that I get pop.up ads while I'm trying to view the weather for a fishing trip. If anyone has the same problem I do and this is the weather app that comes with your phone, you can go in your settings and physically disable this app so it's not using any of your phones data.

Terrible app, super inaccurate (yes, my location is correct üôÑ), wish it wasn't pre-installed on my phone. What's worse is the fact that it's not just installed, it's bloatware that I can never truly uninstall, only disable. For the past three days it keeps re-enabling itself and installing downloads despite the fact that I have auto updates disabled everywhere on my phone. I can only assume that it's able to get around my settings b/c they bamboozled Motorola into making them a core install.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi,
We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience. Please update the app to the latest version from the Google Play Store and check again ‚Äî this should help resolve the issue. If the problem persists, please share your device model and app version so we can assist you further.

scraped_reviews.content: Look, I'm sorry but your app sucks. The alerts are super useless, the software is crazy leggy, and don't even get me started on the ads. I mean come on, I understand you guys have to "keep it free" and stuff, but you can't switch from one section to the other without a freaking pop up ad. Y'all need to step up your game.

Came installed on my new phone. It's the least useful, most ad-riddled 'free' weather app I've ever used. It never remembers my settings, it changes/updates every time I open it, and it's not listed in my phone's app list. Shady. I had to come to Google Play to uninstall it. I'd rather open a browser and go to a website than use this app. Edit 10/24: It reinstalled itself and now there is no option to uninstall. Creepy and dishonest.

Upon attempting to 'Uninstall' (*orig., just for an upgrade), I could only choose between disabling ("...possibly causing other apps to not perform properly") and 'Force Stop' (w/similar-but-worse consequences)! While I think 1Weather's graphics are the most visually APPEALING(!) and the app is SIMPLE to navigate, I am angered by it's sharing of *TOO much data w/its partners, w/pop-ups using the majority of the screen [it's a WEATHER app!), and the lack of control I have to protect my privacy!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi sk844,

Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!! Don't forget to tell your family and friends about us :)

Have a great day

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be my go-to weather app, but since I moved to Germany, the location won't update. I can manually add Germany, but the GPS won't recognize my location. YES, location services are on, and granted. In fact, in my app permission settings, it shows the last time my location was accessed, and it's right now.

I'd give zero stars. I'd rather deal with the inaccurate AccuWeather app. the ads are ridiculous. and since the change to this I get nothing but error message try again later. this was not a good thing considering we had possible tornado weather a few days ago.im not paying for this either. I'd love to be able to uninstall it off my phone but apparently it is not one I can do that as it came with phone
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience. Please update the app to the latest version from the Google Play Store and check again ‚Äî this should help resolve the issue. If the problem persists, please share your device model and app version so we can assist you further.

scraped_reviews.content: as a motorcycle rider, I typically look at the weather forecast to know if I'm safe to go out for a ride or not, or if I can take my bike out on longer nights before it's too cold. I downloaded this app because the previous weather app I was using had way too many ads. Now, after over 2 years of using this app, seeing how constantly unreliable the predicted weather conditions are, and dealing with ads has pushed me away to something else. Not accurate, not trustworthy!

This app came installed on my phone and it was deleted within less than one minute of use. Claimed to be "hyperlocal" yet it was notifying me of a typhoon 8000 miles away, then it forced a pop-up trying to sell me an ad-free subscription before I could even digest any ad from them. I didn't hesitate to uninstall this garbage afterwards, stop trying to force subscriptions. I can watch the local news or just Google weather and have a much better experience than this nonsense.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Aaron,
Sorry for the inconvenience! We appreciate your feedback and will share it with our product team to review and improve the experience. We‚Äôre working to make alerts and notifications more relevant and ensure smoother onboarding for all users.

scraped_reviews.content: Fast, accurate, useful. The only thing it doesn't have is a Future feature on the weather map, but frankly that isn't as important given all the other great features! My go-to weather info, even when I am at my desktop. Often the moving radar map is very slow to load or doesnt load at all (well, doesnt load in several minutes, which the limit of my patience).

I really don't understand the point of having a weather widget that freezes. Especially the severe weather crawl! Why?!? We've had severe weather crawls on television since the 1970s and I never saw one freeze on the screen for hours on end. No, the developers insist that it not only freezes, but it requires rebooting your phone. Because an option to stop and reload the widget would prove to be too useful. Pathetic.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Jason, we're sorry your widget is freezing. Please ensure your app is updated, clear the app cache, and restart your device. If the issue continues, try removing and re-adding the widget. Reach out if you need further help!

scraped_reviews.content: This used to be the best weather app up until a year or so ago. It was more accurate than the TV weather. But for at least the past year, it hasn't been as accurate as it used to be. And most recently, it has a lot of glitches! It keeps crashing after an ad plays, or sometimes crashes in the middle of checking the weekly forecast or the radar. I can't delete it from my phone because it came with it (so therefore I also can't redownload it if there's a newer version).
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Joseph,
We apologize for the inconvenience. Allow location access for 1W. Adjust the auto-refresh interval in the app settings. A shorter interval might provide more frequent updates. If the problem persists, try clearing the app cache or reinstalling the app. Please reach out to oneweather@onelouder.com if the problem persists.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a good weather app. However it has a particular technical issue. For some unfathomable reason, it associates itself with a secondary email account. I would like to pay for the non ad version. But as of right now, there no way to correct the email for correct payment method. Or guarantee it won't happen again, I looked into this issue, and someone else had this 2 years ago, with no resolution

2/25/20 They just "improved" this app. 5 star before, no stars now (they got one here because I couldn't post a review without it!)üòñ The change in format is unpleasant visually and less user friendly. In addition, with the latest update, the advertising is unbelievably intrusive. You can decline the update, but you will still receive the ad bombardment. If you object to the ads, you can skip them for $1.99/mo. Lucky us. Correction: The developer said the $1.99 fee is a one time fee. My bad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi 

Thank you for sharing your feedback. We apologize for the poor experience you have had with the latest update. I have forwarded your concern to the team and we are continuously working to improve the app. Also please note that the fee to remove the app is $ 1.99 for a lifetime free of ads not per month.

scraped_reviews.content: Inaccurate temperatures, forecasts and the radar takes an age to load. I'd really hate to have a severe weather emergency alert and not hear it. I paid for the full app but I'm not going to be, "Eeeh. I want the money back!" I wanted a working weather app, I have a weather-sensitive chronic illness, I hope that my money goes to bettering this. Also, "minutely" isn't a word in the case of how it's used in this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Liz,
If you are facing issues with radar, can you follow these steps? First, go to your device settings to applications, 1Weather, and toggle the storage permission off and back on. Does that help? If not, the next step is to go to device settings to apps to 1Weather and "Clear Cache" or reach out to oneweather@onelouder.com

scraped_reviews.content: Editing review to say that after this most recent update, every time i change screens in the app, there is a full page ad. I will be uninstalling. I don't mind ad supported software, but the ads have become to obtrusive. I love that the classic widget gives me everything I need at a glance. Low, high, and current temps, and % chance of precipitation.

This app has come a long way since I reviewed it last; the clock widgets are back in synchronization (which is why I deleted it) and the information is accurate. Three things though; the temperature in the status bar is still too small to be read easily, and it would be nice to be able to rearrange the information in the app such that all charts could be on one page, other info elsewhere. Also, if the option to blink LED could be changed to blink camera flash; many phones no longer have an LED.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello John,
Thank you for the feedback. I will forward it to our development team. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused. Your feedback has been precious in continuing to develop the app. Thank you for supporting us :)

scraped_reviews.content: Paid for ad free years ago, now ads are back. Says I already own ad free when I try to buy, and 'restore ad free' says I have no record of purchase. Very frustrating. Review from 5/15/15: Does everything I need and more, including radar and all sorts of forecasts and the ongoing notification weather info. Plus, there's a cool space theme and it's only $1.99 for the ad free version. It's a beautiful app that works exactly like it should and has the perfect amount of features. A+.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
If you are still seeing ads, reboot the device and clear the cache for GooglePlay. If it doesn't solve it, go to Menu>Remove Ads and press $1.99 in the dialogue box that appears. This will restore your purchase. Note that you do not have to purchase the app again. Reach out to oneweather@onelouder.com if the issue persists.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm very satisfied with this app. It's easy to use, fast, accurate and let's me do exactly what I need to. Such as bookmark multiple local locations, it tells me sunrise/sunset times, moon phases. All the weather info a photographer needs in one place (except tides). [EDIT] App doesnt have Celcius & Farenheit at same time, one or other. Also the search results when looking for a location are terribly inaccurate! I searched "Berwick Maine" and got results for Canada, United Kingdom, Antarctica.

Honestly, weather function is fine, accurate, and up-to-date. The reason I'm rating 2 has to do with the multitude of notifications for weather that has absolutely nothing to do with either of the locations I have saved, nor ever been. I even "unchecked" that option in the notification settings months ago. Yet multiple times a day, I get notifications for weather or news stories for parts of the country, hell, even the world, that has absolutely nothing to do with my locations.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Ben,
We sincerely regret your negative experience. To fix this problem, go to Android Settings>Apps>1Weather>notifications. Depending on your preferences, disable the notification toggle.

scraped_reviews.content: It never keeps the time correct! Always, always, wrong unless you open the window. I have it set up with the window open on my screen. The time is always wrong unless I open it up with all the info. I can clearly read the info without going into it. That is the purpose for the wondow! It is frustrating. Once in awhile the info is correct. Rarely!!! It slows my phone way down. Very frustrating! I want it removed permanently!!!

I've been using this app for like 10yrs. It's just been going downhill since then. I've had enough, from the ads that start playing if you use the app for more than 3 seconds to the live notification in the status bar that don't even update properly. These new "weather alerts" that you've made a permanent part of the status bar... When I pull down my status bar, all I see is the alert and I need to pull down AGAIN. I shouldn't need to go through 10 steps to see the weather. Bye. It's been fun.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Neidi,
We apologize for any inconvenience caused. We recommend that you make sure your app is updated to the latest version to ensure the best possible experience. If the issue persists, please do not hesitate to reach out to our support team at oneweather@onelouder.com.
Thank you

scraped_reviews.content: Update: While I have paid to remove ads, and used this app for many years, I'm having trouble that keeps getting worse. It shows my local temperature way off and the forecast is for 59 days ago. 4 different devices all with similar problems. I have filed reports for this problem a few times. After about 4 months of waiting I'm afraid it's time for something else. And that makes me sad. ‚òπÔ∏è

WAS a great app! Accurate w/lots of info, plus the temperature always visible at the top of the screen (no separate app needed) - although it didn't always update. Too bad it's now ruined with annoying, loud pop-up ads. Plus, one reviewer said he gets them despite having paid for the app! And, the lack of accounts or login means if you pay for ad removal in one system, it won't carry over to the other. So you have to buy it in iOS AND Android both.

I tried many different weather apps in the past decade until I decided on this one. What appealed to me the most were the simple, minimalist weather icons, with no crazy colours or anything of the sort. This new redesign, however, is just *ugly*. The UI itself is okay, but the icons look like they were drawn in crayon. At the very least, there ought to be an option to use the old icons in settings. Despite using this app for years, and even paying for pro, I may have to jump ship to another app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear User, really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it and improve our app in the new version. If you have questions or suggestions please contact us at support@onelouder.com.

scraped_reviews.content: This app has been evolving in reverse, and the final straw is that it has become invasive. Invasive in that, there are elements I can't get rid of. For example, I don't want to see 'the temperature' in my notification bar. This has always been part of the app, but easily turned off in the settings. Now, the settings has like, 4 menus, with 4 sub menus apiece. That's about it. No customization, at all, and if it is indeed still possible to remove invasive notifications it sure is convoluted
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Jr.,
Thank you for the feedback.
I will forward it to our development team. We will investigate this issue and provide a fix ASAP. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
Your feedback has been precious in continuing to develop the app.
Thank you for supporting us :)

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app. It comes with great widgets, nice simple temperature visualizations, and a good interface for looking at different types of forecasts. However, in recent months, the advertising has become substantially more obstrusive, often flying up every time the app is opened and frequently when switching forecast types. Could it be a coincidence that they starting selling an ad-free version at the same time? I'm disgusted by this ad blackmail and will be switching to another app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Lucy,
Thank you for the feedback.
I will forward it to our development team. We will investigate this issue and provide a fix ASAP. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
Your feedback has been precious in continuing to develop the app.
Thank you for supporting us :)

scraped_reviews.content: Who told them hiding the weather map with google ads was a good idea??!! No longer able to see the map full screen and check for storms. I don't know who got the bright idea to change the app, but I don't like it. It was better before. The clouds are gone, now there are simple charts someone would use for a presentation at an office meeting. The colors are not pleasing to the eye and it looks like something from 30 years ago before computer graphics advanced.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi karen,
Thank you for reaching out to us, we have duly noted this issue and are already working on the Fix.
The issue will be resolved soon
Sorry for the inconvenience.
Thank you

scraped_reviews.content: Notifications that you cannot turn off that have nothing to do with anywhere close to you, called Weather Shorts, is terrible. Being unable to turn off a worthless notification is terrible. I have turned that off and even went into the system settings to turn off the shorts notifications and it will not stop happening. Also, they have nothing to do with my location or anywhere near it. They are completely irrelevant.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Clark,
Thanks for reaching out to us. Can you reach out to us via mail at oneweather@onelouder.com so that our technical support team can help you further?

title: Experian
description:
Financial Power to All‚Ñ¢. Get your Experian credit report and FICO¬Æ Score* with a free Experian¬Æ membership‚Äîno credit card needed! Apply with confidence for credit cards labeled ‚ÄúNo Ding Decline‚Ñ¢‚Äù that won‚Äôt ding your FICO¬Æ Score if you‚Äôre not initially approved^^. You could save big on car insurance and even get notified about changes to your credit profile. With a paid membership, you could save an average of $631/year on bills and subscriptions with Bill Negotiation & Subscription Cancellation**, get started today.

GET STARTED FOR FREE

‚ñ†Experian credit report and FICO¬Æ Score*
Check your FICO¬Æ Score and credit report anytime, anywhere‚Äîit won't hurt your credit. Get every 30 days. See what factors help or hurt your FICO¬Æ Score, and actions to take for better credit.

‚ñ†Experian Boost¬Æ√∏
Raise your FICO¬Æ Score* using bills you already pay, like your cell phone, utilities, video streaming services and eligible rent payments.

‚ñ†Credit monitoring
Stay informed with push notifications if your FICO¬Æ Score* changes, accounts are opened in your name or new inquiries appear on your credit report.

‚ñ†Marketplace^
Compare credit card, personal loan or car insurance options matched to your unique credit profile. Apply with confidence for cards labeled ‚ÄúNo Ding Decline‚Ñ¢‚Äù that won‚Äôt ding your FICO¬Æ Score if you aren‚Äôt approved^^. You could save money with a personal loan or save over $1,007+/year on car insurance^^^.

PREMIUM BENEFITS

‚ñ†Bill Negotiation & Subscription Cancellation**

You could save up to $631/year and time when we negotiate your bills!! We'll even cancel subscriptions you no longer want.

‚ñ†Experian CreditLock***

Protect against identity theft by locking your Experian credit file. We‚Äôll alert you real-time if someone applies for credit in your name while your file is locked.


TERMS

See experian.com/legal for Terms of Use Agreement & Privacy Policy.

√∏Results will vary. Not all payments are boost-eligible. Some users may not receive an improved score or approval odds. Not all lenders use Experian credit files, and not all lenders use scores impacted by Experian Boost¬Æ.

*Credit score calculated based on FICO¬Æ Score 8 model. Your lender or insurer may use a different FICO¬Æ Score than FICO¬Æ Score 8 or another type of credit score altogether.

**Results will vary. Not all bills or subs are eligible for negotiation/cancellation. Savings are not guaranteed, and some may not see any savings. Experian members for whom Experian completed at least one negotiation and canceled at least one subscription averaged $631/year of anticipated savings. 

***Experian CreditLock is a separate service from Security Freeze: experian.com/freeze/center.html. Learn about the differences between them: experian.com/blogs/ask-experian/whats-the-difference-between-freezing-or-locking-my-credit/

^Based on FICO¬Æ Score 8 model. Approval is not guaranteed. Some may not see savings from improved interest rates. Offers are not available in all states. 

^^Applying for ‚ÄòNo Ding Decline‚Ñ¢‚Äô credit cards won‚Äôt hurt your credit scores if you aren‚Äôt initially approved. Initial approval will result in hard inquiry, which may impact your credit scores. 

^^^Results will vary and some may not see savings. Average savings of $1,007 per year for customers who switched and saved.

¬©2025 Experian. All rights reserved. Experian. Experian and the Experian trademarks used herein are trademarks or registered trademarks of Experian and its affiliates. The use of any other trade name, copyright, or trademark is for identification and reference purposes only and does not imply any association with the copyright or trademark holder of their product or brand. Other product and company names mentioned herein are the property of their respective owners. Licenses & Disclosures: experian.com/help/cm-licenses-and-disclosures.html
