summary: Your Big Financial Friend

scraped_reviews.content: The app earns 4-star. The chronically repetive, pushy, notifications, and current over-the-top targeted advertising earns a "0." Notifications options are on or off; no separation of credit alerts and pushy marketing. I know Experian will cancel my unwanted subscriptions, present me the best credit cards, and teach me how to improve my credit rating ad nauseum. There needs to be an opt in or out for each - separately. And the innumerable, overly long ads reminding me to log into the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gary. We‚Äôre sorry that we didn't meet your expectations. If you'd like to share anything on how we can improve, please reach out to us on social media for assistance. Thanks. -Moneake

scraped_reviews.content: PROS: With a stable connection, the app is easy to use. The ability to see all 3 bureaus in one spot is very neat. Individual credit reports are fairly organized. CONS: Subscriptions are too pricey. Why should I pay the price of a hulu subscription when the benefits dont equal the price? The number of notifications I received claiming my credit score has increased when it, in fact, has not, is incredibly bothersome. I dont like generating traffic for apps that provide misleading information.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Justice. We‚Äôre sorry that we didn't meet your expectations. We would love to help you with this. Please reach out to us on social media for assistance. Thank you. -Vivian

scraped_reviews.content: 3 stars is a little generous seeing as I just called customer service to delete my account entirely. I had upgraded to the credit lock feature which is $4.99 a month, and for the past few months, the payment has been declined repeatedly despite plenty of funds available. I finally called on the issue today, & the automated system wouldn't give me a human to help until I asked to delete my account, despite the app having told me to call in the first place. Don't tell me to call if you won't help
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Marcelina. We‚Äôre sorry that we didn't meet your expectations. We would love to help you with this. Please reach out to us on social media for assistance. Thank you. -Vivian

scraped_reviews.content: WORST APP EVER!!! They don't even deserve the one star. I set up an account, told me it didn't exist. Finally got it to regonize my account. Requested the pin code via text, never came, tried multiple times. Then when I was finally able to log in a different way all it wanted to do was offer me my free credit report. If I tried to do anything else like freeze my credit it would log me out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: ‚ÄØ‚ÄØHi Jen. Thanks for reaching out to us. We are happy to help. Can you please reach out to us via social media on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram? If you do not have access to social media, please contact us via the Contact Us section on your membership. We‚Äôd be happy to help you further. Thank you. -Lori

scraped_reviews.content: Easy to navigate, explains credit and credit ratings well. The only thing I have run into that kind of sucks is that it doesn't have my bank in its lookup so I can't connect my accounts. It would be great to transfer funds from one to the other. Lastly, the charge to get money from an ATM is ridiculous including the ATM charge and experians it costs me $6 for every transaction.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Heather. Thanks for the rating. It‚Äôs great to hear that you are satisfied with our app. Please send us a message through your membership or reach out to us on social media for assistance.‚ÄØThank you. - Karen

scraped_reviews.content: Has become useless over the last few months. I cannot log into the app, it says that my credentials are invalid. I can use the exact same credentials to log into the website. I've tried logging in via the SSN and phone number method, but I never get the authentication code‚Ä¶ even though I get the code without issue logging in on the website. I've cleared the cache and data and I've completely uninstalled and reinstalled. There is no fix. Trashed the app since there is nothing I can do with it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jo. We‚Äôre sorry that we didn't meet your expectations.‚ÄØWe would like to help you with this. Please send us a message through your membership or reach out to us on social media for assistance.‚ÄØThank you. - Karen

scraped_reviews.content: I pay the 2.99 a month. Almost every week I have to reconnect my accounts. And as slow and buggy as this app is it's at least a 5min ordeal per account. And sometimes after 5min it will say you don't have an internet connection and you get to start over. I will change my review. It's just frustrating having to link everything back up. But even the website doesn't respond very well for me either. Update. My bank was disconnected from boost again and according to experian I took a 16 point hit.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Thank you for your feedback. Some banks do require us to connect and reconnect more often. It is a security feature with the bank to make sure you agree often. -Katherine

scraped_reviews.content: App is ok. Simplify it. Less ads. If we need it, we will get it. My issue is with their Smart Money boost. Not recommend. This service not only made my payment have late fees but also a return fee. It kept declining my bill payment even though the funds were in my account. I am trying to BUILD credit, not get BAD credit. I just closed that account. I can't chance it happening again. Especially since they didn't even offer to cover the extra fees their service caused.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: ‚ÄØHi there. Thanks for reaching out to us. We are happy to help. Can you please reach out to us via social media on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram? If you do not have access to social media, please contact us via the Contact Us section on your membership. We‚Äôd be happy to help you further. Thank you. -Lori

scraped_reviews.content: Experian is by far the worst of the 3 major credit reporting agencies. Arbitrarily, out of nowhere, you will get a 22 or 23 point drop in your credit score for absolutely no reason, and, if you're lucky, it will show up in a few weeks or months as being restored, again, for no reason other than it was taken from your score at a whim of theirs. "No good deed goes unpunished". While the other two credit score agencies are correctly reporting your credit score increases, from Experian, crickets.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dan. Thanks for your feedback. We understand how frustrating unexpected changes in your credit score can be. Credit scores are calculated based on data reported by lenders, and fluctuations can occur due to factors like credit utilization, payment history, or account changes. We reflect the information provided to us. -Katherine

scraped_reviews.content: The app is great if your looking at your credit scores . As for customer support and technical support Experian is the worst out of all three credit reporting agencies. The absolute worst üò´. If you live in the real world and from time to time change your phone number or email address good luck getting it done on this app .You're not going to be able to get anything done in their system or even reach a representative so you are stuck locked out of your account with no way to receive any help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brent. We‚Äôre sorry for the inconvenience you‚Äôre experiencing while trying to reach a representative. We would love to help you with this. Please reach out to us on social media for assistance. Thank you. -Katherine

scraped_reviews.content: Love that it keeps me up on my scores. it also gives you alerts and updates on credit habits. I like the card offer details too, but I wish there was a way to turn it off. I'm not looking to get a credit card. when I open the app I wish it was not the first thing that pops up. that annoys me. if and when I want a card, having that section is perfect, but I don't need it popping up all the time, hence your 4 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kim. We‚Äôre sorry that we didn't meet your expectations.‚ÄØWe would like to help you with this. Please send us a message through your membership or reach out to us on social media for assistance.‚ÄØThank you. - Karen

scraped_reviews.content: I just downloaded the app. Sadly, I can't get past the 1st part of joining/signing up. I put in the info and clicked "Get Started" to send a link to my phone. I click the link and it opens a webpage that says "All set" you can return to the app to continue singing up. Okay, I go back to the app it's still on the screen that says check the message sent to (***) ***-9999. Hmmm... I tried to hit cancel which does nothing. Maybe I should've went with Credit Karma instead.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Marcey. We apologize for the difficulties you experienced while registering with us. We would love to help you with this. Please reach out to us on social media for assistance. Thank you.-Katherine

scraped_reviews.content: 07/13/22 - Easy to use and provides essential information that we all need. And it's free! 10/23/25 - My first review was 3 yrs ago and I am still using their free account. It's exactly what I need to monitor my credit and get suggestions on how to raise my score. My review hasn't changed. The app is excellent, easy to use, and you don't get bombarded with ads or asked to pay for premium. Thank you, Experian. I appreciate this app and what the company offers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lori. Thanks for the rating. It‚Äôs great to hear that you are satisfied with our app. -Karen‚ÄØ

scraped_reviews.content: Experian is easy to navigate & track your credit. You have the option to track all 3 credit bureaus in one app for a monthly fee, if you choose. They have a couple different payment options available. I've not tried any of the subscription versions as I have another app that tracks the other 2 credit bureaus. I'm happy with what I have access to in the free version & maybe in the future give one of the subscription options a try.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Holly. It's great to hear that you‚Äôre enjoying your membership. We appreciate your feedback. Thanks. -Lori

scraped_reviews.content: Experian is a place for credit card offers, loans or to upgrade your experian membership to premium and be charged $25/mo. While the most important info, your credit, is very vague and doesn't help. Credit karma has better detail. Seems to be about 70% offers, 30% Your vague credit report, Its very aggravating filtering through it. It lists my credit cards in 1 spot, but not under "Credit" which is where it seems to affect my score. Also, they dont send a password reset to your email.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Marie. We‚Äôre sorry that we didn't meet your expectations.‚ÄØWe would like to help you with this. Please send us a message through your membership or reach out to us on social media for assistance.‚ÄØThank you. - Karen

scraped_reviews.content: Having errors in experian boost. can't disconnect boost account and also the boost account will not properly connect. Getting nowhere with customer service. Haven't gotten contacted like I was told. App keeps saying it will disconnect if I don't reconnect but it hasn't. I feel like customer service should be able to do it so I can redo it from a fresh start but I get nowhere when I ask to do so. Very frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Barry. We‚Äôre sorry that we didn't meet your expectations.‚ÄØWe would like to help you with this. Please send us a message through your membership or reach out to us on social media for assistance.‚ÄØThank you. - Karen

scraped_reviews.content: I've never given a one-star rating until today. scraped_reviews.replyContent: ‚ÄØHi there. Thanks for reaching out to us. We are happy to help. Can you please reach out to us via social media on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram? scraped_reviews.content: Very happy that I can freeze & unfreeze my credit. Very unhappy with "all or nothing" in-app push notifications. Although your credit score is lower on this site vs Chase Bank or others offering a credit score using a different algorithm, it's a bit more reality vs that ego boost you feel. 5 stars & highly recommended!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Chris. Thanks for the feedback. We are delighted to hear that you like our app and found it to be useful. -Vivian

title: Google Docs
description:
Create, edit, and collaborate with others on documents from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Docs app. 

Work together in real time
‚Ä¢ Share documents with your team
‚Ä¢ Edit, comment, and add action items in real time

Create anywhere, anytime‚Äîeven offline
‚Ä¢ Capture spontaneous ideas on the fly
‚Ä¢ Get things done, even on the go, with offline mode
‚Ä¢ Save time and add polish with easy-to-use templates

Edit and share multiple file types
‚Ä¢ Open a variety of files, including Microsoft Word files, right in Google Docs
‚Ä¢ Frictionless collaboration, no matter which application your teammates use
‚Ä¢ Convert and export files seamlessly

Google Docs is part of Google Workspace: where teams of any size can chat, create, and collaborate.
Google Workspace paid subscribers have access to additional Google Docs features, including:
‚Ä¢ Use Gemini in Docs to quickly draft and edit content
‚Ä¢ Draft outlines, blog posts, briefs, and more on the go
‚Ä¢ Create unique images to customize your documents
‚Ä¢ Improve your writing with AI-powered suggestions

Learn more about Google Docs: https://workspace.google.com/products/docs/

Follow us for more:
‚Ä¢ X: https://x.com/googleworkspace
‚Ä¢ Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
‚Ä¢ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace

scraped_reviews.content: This app is my primary source of nightly writing, and it's gotten harder and harder for me to stick with. The mobile text correction is extremely obnoxious and seemingly can't turn off. It seems like I spend more time correcting the automatic "corrections" than actually writing. For example, it'll change my were/we're's and of/if's when it shouldn't. With every update, this app seems to become worse.

Sincerely how hard would it be to be able to add space before or after paragraphs on mobile? Right now all you can do is change line spacing, which isn't what I want. I don't want to look at a wall of text, I'd like to clearly see where my paragraphs begin and end. Also there's strange autocorrect errors (not even close) and it sometimes decides to capitalize random letters. Not sure what's causing these bugs but I wouldn't be surprised if it's AI integration, which is useless üôÑ

My go-to word processor for years ‚Äî but recently Google seems bent on fixing it til it breaks, to the point where I'm going to need to look for alternatives. Specifically, limiting which font sizes can be selected and auto-formatting bullet points when I type a ‚Ä¢ character at the beginning of a line are beyond annoying. Not being able to select A5 page size is an issue too, just not a new one. My days of easy word processing on mobile seem to be over, and I'm fuming mad about it.

This is a very good app. As some reviews said, it's good for writing. I TOTALLY agree. The fonts, the color, everything. the only thing is that sometimes in the computer. I go back in the app and when I wanna type in it, it shows me this sort of box that I have to write in. so. whenever I want to write, I have to use the little box. but it happened a few times. not sure why that happened. but whatever. Overall a great app!

If you think this app is going to let you use Google docs, just throw that misconception out the window right now. The text sizes available to you are limited and jump wildly. You cannot have size 16pt or 20pt font, only 14, 18, and 24. You also cannot change the colors of your text except from a premade selection of colors smaller than even the suggested colors page available to you in browser. This is just what I found trying to make a simple single page document under 500 words with 2 colors.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cammi, thanks for sharing your valuable feedback. We'll pass this along to our team. Appreciate it!

scraped_reviews.content: I was loving this program, but since the last update, when I try to share/ export, I choose Gmail and it looks like it always did with the documentat the bottom of the email, but the document doesn't go with the email. I've tried everything I can think of, sending the document between my own email accounts. I get the email without the document and then a "failed to send" message with no explanation.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jean. We suggest you clear apps cache on your device: Settings - Apps - Docs - Storage & cache - Clear cache. If that doesn't help, you may post your query in the Docs Community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Heaven forbid you have a file that's "too long." It'll constantly throw an error reminding you that it can't detect the grammar because the text is too long. If that wasn't annoying enough, apparently there's a hard character limit where the app straight up won't let you edit files anymore. I remember 50 pages being a soft limit on the desktop version before it would really chug, but apparently 7000 words is too much for this app. I guess I'll need to find something else to take notes with

Very good for writing on the go. However, I have a few complaints to make: - The search function is not precise enough and tends to return "recent" and "most-visited" documents instead of documents that actually contain the words I am looking for. - The grammar/typo correction lacks the "ignore" and "add to dictionary" options. - You can't select custom colors. You should try fixing those issues instead of pouring money into that intrusive failure AI of yours that no one wants to see.

I don't want to sound like a broken record by repeating what other people have said but I have to voice my concerns. The tabs feature is the best feature on the web version, and I was ELATED when they finally added it to the app version. HOWEVER, they removed it just as fast and that is just so disappointing since I write on the go most of the time. I don't exactly want to use chrome on my phone just to use Google docs in a functioning way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Thanks for sharing your valuable feedback. We'll pass this along to our team. Appreciate it!

scraped_reviews.content: Won't let me open any large docs. Used to be very simple, but has become extremely clunky. The autocorrect only targets correct sentences, not misspelled words or incorrect grammar. You can't edit the font size well, can't add space before paragraphs properly, can't auto line number easily, images are hell to work with, & whenever you try to open a doc in web, you have to fight it to keep it in web to skip the majority of these issues

Site is great, app is terrible. Lacks basic features, frequently buggy, etc. I don't know why the rating is so high; most of the time there's this bug where the keyboard doesn't activate so I can't write anything, I need to reload until I does. Now there's a bug where the option to edit doesn't even appear (on my own documents!). This app is just useless

I love the ease of being able to edit docs on my phone. But I continually lose access to editing my own documents, some of which were made on the device I was using, and can only edit them again by reinstalling. It sucks. edit: after downloading the update and following the publisher's recommended fix for this (clearing the in-app cache, sometimes taking it a step further and going and clearing the app's cache in the phone settings), the frequency of my uninstalls has gone down. Not totally.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Megan. You may post the query in Docs community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Not impressed. Have had it freeze up twice. It's been installed for one day. Shouldn't have to clear the cache! Luckily I didn't lose my document. The Print function is hidden in the three dots, under a tab called Share and Export. Why?? Took me forever to find it. Put it out front and easy to find like MS Word does. Could not resize the image in my doc. No arrows ever appeared after multiple attempts. Finally went to Google Photos and resized that way. Google really dropped the ball here.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dorothy. We'd like our users to have the best possible experience with the Google Docs app. We'll share your feedback with our product team. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Every couple of days, I lose the ability to edit my documents. I have tried restarting the app, my phone, clearing the cache, and following every possible fix given on the help website. Nothing has worked, and the only thing that fixes it is uninstalling and reinstalling the app. Edit: Did as recommended and posted on the help forum, and received suggestions for things I had already tried or things like "open it on desktop!" If I wanted to use docs on the computer, I wouldn't have the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Aaron. You may post the query in Docs community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: It's decent if all you want to do is view documents. If you're trying to get any work done on your phone, it's impossible. Two key features that are missing: ability to insert image from Google drive (current only options are gallery, camera, and web) and paste without formatting.. current long press doesn't even show that as an option. Seriously considering just paying for Microsoft Office at this point.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jamison. Thanks for sharing your valuable feedback. We'll pass this along to our team. Appreciate it!

scraped_reviews.content: It's good for what it is, but it would be a whole lot better if I didn't have to reinstall it once every other week because it randomly decides I'm not allowed to edit a document I was editing an hour ago. All my other documents? Fine. Just not the one I want to edit. Cache clears, signing out and back in, making sure no other device has the editor for that doc open... doesn't mean a thing until I uninstall and then download it again. I wonder if that artificially boosts the app's popularity...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tyr. You may post the query in Docs community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for writing my stories for years. It normally does what it's supposed to do, but for the second time the keyboard won't pop-up on my phone. This is also specifically a Google docs problem, my keyboard pops up and works just fine on different apps. I looked it up and I'm not the only one who has had this problem. I was able to copy my writing onto another Google doc and it works just fine. Still, I wish y'all would look into fixing the glitch!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We suggest you clear apps cache on your device: Settings - Apps - Docs - Storage & cache - Clear cache. If that doesn't help, you may post your query in the Docs Community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app! but recently, it keeps lagging and crashing. I don't know if it's because of the latest update, but it's driving me insane considering I'm trying to write a book on it, and I'm already 56 capters in. I'm not running any apps in the background either, and I've checked my internet connection (even though it should still work offline) and I've got no issues there. I've tried closing and reopening the app, and it's still lagging. I hope that if it's just a bug it gets fixed soon.

I've been using Google Docs since I was in elementary school. I've used it to write all my essays and have finally written a book using the application. But, while my stories obviously are automatically updated and synced on my Chromebook, when I go to continue my work on my phone, the app doesn't sync my progress between my two devices. This is a recent and frustrating development. I've had to delete and re-download the app twice nnow. Is this a bug or a bigger issue? What the heck?!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jeya. In order to find your documents in the app, we suggest you check if the account has synced: on your device, open settings - About phone - Google Account - Account sync - Docs (check for the last sync date). If not, toggle the option off and on and see if that works. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I have used this app on my Android phone for a long time. All was going well until today. When I open my documents to continue my work, it won't allow me to type once I turn off the view only mode. I have cleared the cache, updated the app, force closed then reopened the app and even upgraded my google storage but it's still not working. I have to rely on working on-the-go so this has caused a major issue for me

I pretty much love everything about it. Sometimes it can get laggy, but it's a fair trade for all the features- especially never having to worry about saving my progress! I still have to explore some of the options but it's perfect for writing which is all I bought the device for anyway. I'd like to see some more fonts, love the colored backgrounds- helps with eye strain after writing for a couple hours on white backgrounds. Edit: spell check doesn't seem to be available... maybe I just can't find it? I think it use to be there.

It randomly capitalizes words as I am writing mid-sentence. This is the only app it happens on, so it's not an issue with my phone or keyboard. I also wish the scroll bar could be turned off. Since it's on my dominant hand side, I bump it often, which sends me to another part of the document. Otherwise, it's nice to be able to easily access Google Docs on my phone. The formatting options are more robust than I expected for an app, and nothing is lost in converting back to the desktop version.

Not optimized well at all. On any big documents it takes ages to type anything, the lag itself causes typos, it's like the app is trying to remember every page at once instead of, maybe, just the pages you're on. Outline feature is also not implemented well, from my experience. Unlike desktop where you can click and skip to headings, the outline on mobile only appears when you scroll, to just tell you where you're at. Better than nothing, but not nearly as useful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kris. We suggest you clear apps cache on your device: Settings - Apps - Docs - Storage & cache - Clear cache. If that doesn't help, you may post your query in the Docs Community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Docs has been my go-to program for several years primarily because I can write on my phone when I don‚Äôt have my laptop. Only now, the app no longer syncs. I have the final chapter of a book I've been working on, and the app only shows the original draft I started a month ago, despite numerous edits. I've uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times, but it still won't sync to the most recent version of the doc. This was never a problem before. It's maddening not to be able to write on my phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Meredith. You may post the query in Docs community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: A joy to have if you like daily a uninstall and reinstall! The random capitalizations, replacements of words, the suddenly being unable to edit the docs (both online and offline), as well as the merged words when trying to delete something make this app a nightmare to use (yes I wanted "the" to become "theverye"). I've tried for months to deal with it, but it's become borderline unusable! Honestly has become the worst part of my day whenever I open it. Fix it and I'll happily edit my review.

While I adore this app for allowing me to write on the go, it is very janky to write on, making it harder to write quite often. Most recently, I have struggled with knowing where my cursor is, as even when the blinking line is placed where I want it, I could start typing and suddenly realize that it's actually in the last place it was. This is not an issue I am able to solve with any consistency, leading to minutes wasted. I wonder if I am alone in this or not. If I am, that's far more worrying.

There are so many dumb things about this app I can't fit them all into 500 characters. It can't handle formatting, it can't display background colors properly, can't handle page margins, can't show a pepper desktop view, can't arrange images and text properly, the majority of the editing options are missing... it's just not at all an effective way to work with documents. I'm so tired of fighting this dumb app I just give up. Google is just fundamentally incapable of producing decent software.

Decent replacement for Word, especially as it can read, edit, and create Word documents. However. It is missing the option to adjust spacing between paragraphs, which is present on the desktop website (which works fine on a tablet if you make your browser request the desktop website). There is no good reason to exclude this formatting option in the mobile app, especially when in many other respects a tablet is a passable replacement for a laptop. It also needs support for text boxes.

I hate that this app is necessary. There should be absolutely no reason I can't use a mobile web version. Table of Contents doesn't work. It only pulls up the first Header and won't let me see the rest. Editing text is very fincky. If I highlight some words because I want to change the font/color/size, and then click on the button to do that, my keyboard flys up and blocks half the options (which I can't scroll to see more of). No automatic saving either.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Eren. We suggest you clear apps cache on your device: Settings - Apps - Docs - Storage & cache - Clear cache. If that doesn't help, you may post your query in the Docs Community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Always loved being able to open a doc on the app that I started on the computer, but lately I keep getting a box pop-up that tells me "cannot fix grammatical errors. Text is too long." Whatever that means. It's annoying & constantly pops up in the middle of my documents whether I'm proofreading or editing. It's always there, please fix that! So for now, the app is being deleted until that's fixed & I'll just have to use my computer to edit & proofread. It's rather unfortunate.

Getting REALLY tired of " Cannot detect more grammar errors. Text is too long" notification popping up literally nonstop. It'll pop up that message for two seconds, fade, and then pop up again. I get it. My doc is long, and I'm still trying to write more, please either give us a way to turn that off or fix the amount of times it pops up PLEASE.

One of the best apps for writing. Documents may be viewed from different devices, and when there's no internet! the built-in autocorrect is a little annoying, though. It doesn't interrupt the usage of the app, however, it sometimes mark things is grammatically incorrect when they shouldn't be. That's a very small nitpick, this is overall a great app for writing.

I've used and enjoyed this app for years, but this synchronization error message I've been getting the last few days is driving me nuts. I've uninstalled, reinstalled, logged in and out, cleared the cache and the data multiple times and it still pops up. And the whole time my docs have continued to sync without issue. It covers whole lines and text for extended periods and won't go away even though there is no sync issue. Please fix this.

It was working fine for years for me. I even pay for extra storage. Then suddenly over the last day or so, I keep getting an error. "Synchronization error. Please try again later." I tried everything from uninstalling, restarting my phone, turning off transfer files over wifi only, refreshing. Nothing works. I have the latest verison. There is no fixing.

Usually it's a good thing to have around, but lately it's been saying it "can't retrieve information/check your connection" (spoiler: my connection is fine) or that there's a synchronization error. Like everyone else, I've done everything suggested to fix it. I have plenty of space on my drive. It isn't me that's having the issue. I thought the update fixed it, but no. It's still an issue.

It works fine most of the time. But there's this persistent bug that drives me crazy. While typing, sometimes it will randomly autocorrect and combine three or four words into a jumbled mess, which forces me to undo and retype. I've tried uninstalling, updating, and messing around with the settings, but there's no fix I can find. Hoping devs will see this and fix it.

I have been using this app for the last several years. It was always fine to use until here about a month ago, when the ability to edit my files disappeared. I am only on one Google account, no one else has access, and the little edit button that used to be on the lower right hand corner is gone. I see several other reviews saying the same thing. This desperately needs to be fixed. After it is, maybe I'll review it and rate it higher.

Search could be better, the app a little faster, and more features, but other than that it's all good. Maybe docs, sheets, etc could all be combined into one app? It could be alot more secure, offer encryption. I'm tempted to downgrade my rating. Really I'm just hoping Google docs, etc become more mainstream, accepted everywhere type of thing, but I hope they don't sacrifice security, or options. So far, it honesty is pretty good. Can't wait for improvements.

There are times my docs from the PC won't sync up with the phone correctly, but it all feels kind of botchy like it's going to start syncing and pause halfway if the wifi goes off, and not save any of my progress. Of course it never does that. But I worry. Recently it has been downloading the same files forever and doesn't seem to ever stop, which drains my battery quite a bit. But I love Google docs, even when it's slow or doesn't sync properly. Best app for writing.

App is good, for the most part. But for some reason, whenever I try to delete other's shared documents from my account, they reappear when I open the app again and don't stay deleted. I don't think that's supposed to happen, and it gets annoying having to do it over and over again. There are other bugs that inconvenience the experience but not as noteworthy as this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. You may post the query in Docs community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Docs is the most helpful word-processing app I have ever owned! It is very simple to use and has a huge variety of purposes you can use it for: book writing, resumes, letters, group projects, even typography if you know how to do it right. And it is a lot faster, takes up less space and is less laggy than it's competition, Word. Really recommend for your phone or handheld (and no, im not getting paid for this, Google is still pretty sketch in it's other dealings)

This app is fantastic overall, but I keep facing a significant issue with the font size options. For example, there's a jump from "14" to "18" with no "16" in between, leading to an inconvenient and noticeable gap. It would be great if this could be addressed, and the font size options could be improved. I really appreciate what this app offers, but enhancing the flexibility of font sizes would make a huge difference!

AS A WHOLE, it can be useful. but there are many things that people might find irritating when trying to use it. Mobile platforms cannot disable spell checking and grammar checking, for example. Although there are many good quality of life tools, the failure to enable search basic features costs a star. additionally, content is censored when they don't find it appropriate. this would be acceptable if they were more consistent in applying their standards. -1 star. 3/5.

When they say 'work offline' they mean 'watch the work you've done offline vanish and the document you've been working on become inaccessible'. Their autocorrect also doesn't accept the existence of the word 'then' and can't be turned off, so you have a reason to scream in frustration while writing, before you even find out about the major problem.

I've used both the desktop and app versions religiously for years, but recently the app has become buggy to a degree that it's hard to use. Random letters will capitalize mid-sentence, adding bullet points to a document may break the previous document structure and when typing certain(correct) words such as "chooses", the document will switch the word to say, "chosen" without me selecting that substitution. I've been careful with how I type but perhaps I'm missing something.

I like this app a lot and use both mobile and desktop versions, it just has a few problems. I would really like to be able to set an indent on the mobile app to separate my paragraphs (like book format, rather than double-enter). I'd also like to know how many pages I've written when on the mobile app, not just the word count. Also, for whatever reason, lately the app has been locking me out of editing my own docs, forcing me into view mode. The only way to fix it is to uninstall and reinstall.

I've had an increasingly bad time with Docs over the past few months. Deleting too quickly often results in the app creating phantom words combining the old and new things I type. I can no longer move the cursor on my screen; when I try, it sends me to the top of the document. Now over half the time when I open documents I can't get the keyboard to open. I use Docs to write specifically because I can go between my computer and phone, so if I can't type, what's the point in this app??
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rachel. We suggest you clear apps cache on your device: Settings - Apps - Docs - Storage & cache - Clear cache. If that doesn't help, you may post your query in the Docs Community and get help from our experts: https://goo.gle/3o58rPT. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I LOVE THIS APP AS A YOUNG WRITER. I have no money for fancy programs, being only 13. But, it helps me practice my writing skills. The word count is a REALLY neat feature, I love all of the fonts and the customization features. For school, it's really easy to share and collaborate for free. This is my favorite go to writing app. I can't explain it enough. There's also 0 ads, I've never seen one anyways. I've used this since 5th grade AT LEAST. I 10000% recommend it to anyone of any age.........!

Synchronization error you need to go to app settings and clear the data. Its very annoying and I can only make it stop for a little bit before it comes back in about 10 minutes. What I wish is the grammar error stops popping up, I'm writing fanfics, not a college essay. If there was a way to turn off both notifications, that would be great. But for now one star to get attention.

Great, lacks 1 anecdotal feature. I like it, you can type across multiple devices no matter where you are. It has advantages over word just as word has advantages over it. The docs app is more mobile than the word app. I definitely prefer it to word with how I use it. The problem comes when I hook a keyboard and mouse to my phone (note 9). When I click it doesnt work on somethings and the scroll wheel doesn't work when in the app. I like using my phone instead of my laptop, but might use word.

title: Microsoft OneNote: Save Notes
description:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices with Microsoft OneNote.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate with Microsoft OneNote today.

Homepage & Quick Capture Bar
‚Ä¢ Find all notes from your connected accounts in one place to easily create, find, & act on your notes
‚Ä¢ Now with Samsung Notes integration
‚Ä¢ Capture text, voice, ink or images to your notepad with Quick Capture
‚Ä¢ Capture notes in ink. Click the pen button & write down your thoughts

Scan Pictures & Extract Text
‚Ä¢ Notes Scanner: Scan documents, pictures, or files to extract notes
‚Ä¢ Capture images to extract text from documents, files, & more
‚Ä¢ Apply different filters to change colors, add ink, crop images & more

Audio Notes
‚Ä¢ Take accurate voice notes with voice dictation
‚Ä¢ Click the Mic button to begin recording, then click it again to end recording & save the file
‚Ä¢ Dictate notes in 27 languages (note some languages are in preview) & use Auto-Punctutation to automatically format your notes

Capture Content & Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw & clip things from the web to add to your notebook
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want

Take Notes & Achieve More
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important & custom labels
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices & lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen & lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos

Collaborate & Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, & draw attention to important points
‚Ä¢ Take notes & save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast & powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family & works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more

Write notes, save ideas & keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 9.0 or later.
‚Ä¢ A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
‚Ä¢ OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
‚Ä¢ To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization‚Äôs Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft‚Äôs privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement
